item.text: sku thams cad kyi snang ba ston pa/ dbang rdzogs pa rang byung chen po'i rgyud bzhugs so// rgya gar skad du/ kA yA lo kod+di Sh+ta b+hi Shiny+tsa ma hA swa yaM b+hA tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ sku thams cad kyi snang ba ston pa/ dbang rdzogs pa rang byung chen po'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dbang thams cad kyi bdag nyid pad+ma he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis bstan pa'i dus gcig na/ rig pa'i snang ba yongs su gsal ba'i gzhal yas na/ rig pa'i rtsal gyi dbang gi mnga' bdag des/ 'di skad ces bstan to// snang ba'i rig pa khyad par can// kun tu snang ba rnams nyon cig/ rig pa'i gnas lugs 'gags pa med pa'i dbang// bya ba rgyun du spyod pa'i dbang// 'das pa rjes su bzung ba'i dbang// ma 'ongs gnad la 'gel ba'i dbang// da lta smin par byed pa'i dbang// ma rdzogs rdzogs

par byed pa'i dbang// thams cad bzlog par byed pa'i dbang// gso byed yo byad nyid kyi dbang// 'du byed ro langs gser bsgyur dbang// thal byed ro bsreg 'khor lo'i dbang// sgrub byed ral gri mtshon cha'i dbang// smin byed sdom pa rnam bzhi'i dbang// thams cad dbang gi 'khor lor bstan pa'o// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ rang rig b+han d+hA 'bar ba'i gzhal yas nas// bcom ldan 'das dbang thams cad kyi bdag nyid/ pad+ma he ru ka zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ de yang bcom ldan 'das de nyid dbu gsum pa phyag drug pa/ zhabs bzhi bgrad pa/ sku la dur khrod kyi rgyan sna tshogs kyi brgyan pa/ glang chen gyi pags pa dang/ klu rigs bzhis dbu dang yan lag brgyan pa/ zhing chen dang rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ bskal pa'i me ri sna tshogs sku las 'phro ba/ phyag na mtshon cha gar yang ma nges pa bsnams pa/ zhabs re re la lcags kyi rta rmig gsum gsum byung ba/ dbu re re la rta mgo ljang zhur re re rta skad phyogs bcur sgrogs pa/ zhal nas pad+ma ta kr-i ta yi sgra sgrogs pa// dbang thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid 'gro ba yongs la bskur ba/ sku mdog le brgan dbang gi dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa/ zhabs kyi 'og tu ta kr-i ta khro bo chen po brgyad po brdzis pa/ lte ba na rta mgrin dmar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ thugs ka na gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje sku mdog sngon po/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas rdo rje tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du gsor zhing/ g.yon sdig 'dzub dang zhags pa bsdams pa/ dpung par hU~M ka ra dkar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas na gsod pa'i sta re phyar ba// g.yon na phur ba 'dril ba'o// rta mgo'i steng na rdo rje sems dpa' dkar po/ g.yas rdo rje rtse dgu thugs kar 'dzin pa/ g.yon dril bu dku la brten pa'o// de lta bu'i bcom ldan 'das de la/ 'khor dpag tu med pa'i tshogs 'di lta ste/ pad+ma he ru ka la sogs rigs kyi khro bo lnga dang/ yum krod+hI shwa ri ma dang/ rdo rje sems dpa' dang/ rnam par snang mdzad dang/ rin chen 'byung ldan dang/ snang ba mtha' yas

dang/ don yod grub pa dang/ sangs rgyas spyan ma dang/ mA ma kI dang/ gos dkar mo dang/ dam tshig sgrol ma dang/ nam mkha'i dbyings phyug ma dang/ rdo rje'i rdo rje dang/ rdo rje las dang/ rdo rje chos dang/ rdo rje rnon po dang/ rdo rje ral gri dang/ rdo rje be con dang/ rdo rje tho ba dang// rdo rje mai tri'o// 'joms ma reg dang/ 'joms ma yid dang/ 'joms ma dri dang/ 'joms ma ro dang/ 'joms ma dus dang/ 'joms ma chen mo 'byung ba lnga dang/ 'joms ma chen mo snang ba ma'o// lha dbang dang/ mi dbang dang/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang/ byol song gi dbang po dang/ yi dwags kyi dbang po dang/ dmyal pa'i dbang po chen po dang/ 'bras bu snang ba'i ston pa chen po'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mkha' 'gro ma dang/ rdo rje'i rigs dang/ rin po che'i rigs dang/ pad+ma'i rigs dang/ las kyi rigs dang/ dbyings kyi rigs dang/ ye shes kyi rigs dang/ las kyi rigs dang/ sha za'i rigs dang/ khrag 'thung gi rigs dang/ rus pa mur ba'i rigs dang/ mkha' 'gro dang/ shugs 'gro dang/ stobs 'gro dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba dang/ thabs kyis 'gro ba dang/ snang ba zhon nas 'gro ba dang/ 'byung ba la zhon nas 'gro ba dang/ sgyid kyis 'gro ba dang/ dus bzhi la 'gro ba'o// sa brgyad pa la gnas pa dang/ dgu pa la gnas pa dang/ bcu pa la gnas pa'i 'khor ro// klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang/ 'jog po dang/ mthas yas dang/ dung skyong la sogs pa'o// phyag na rdo rje dang/ rta mgrin dang/ gshin rje gshed dang/ 'jam dpal dang/ phyag rdor zhi ba dang/ spyan ras gzigs dang/ rigs kyi khro bo bsam gyi mi khyab pa'o// grul bum gyis rgyal po dang/ mi'am ci'i rgyal po dang/ lto 'phye'i rgyal po dang/ lha ma yin gyi rgyal po dang/ dri za'i rgyal po dang/ 'byung po thams cad kyi rgyal po dang/ sha za'i rgyal po dang/ yi dwags kyi rgyal po dang/ sa la gnas pa dang/ chu la gnas pa dang/ rlung la gnas pa dang/ me la gnas pa dang/ nam mkha' la gnas pa'i 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pas bskor pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal chen po de nyid dregs pa can thams cad dbang du sdud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas 'khor dpag tu med pa'i rigs rnams dang/ thabs cig tu bzhugs so// zhes rdzogs pa rang byung chen po'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// rgya gar skad du/ sarba sin d+hu hu ka ra ya sing nA ma/ bod skad du/ khrus thams cad kyi lung zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas 'khor de rnams kyi nang nas/ gsang ba'i bdag

nyid rdo rje rnam 'joms kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye kye bcom ldan dbang gi bdag/ khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems can la// rnam rtog dri ma bsam yas pas// sgrib pa rnam pa gnyis sbyangs pa'i// thabs chen mtshon pa'i yan lag dang/ sems can dri ma can dag gi/ rtogs pa sbyangs pa'i khrus chen dang// khrus kyi sgrub pa gsung du gsol// de nas pad+ma he ru kas// rnam 'joms nyid la bka' stsal pa// kye ma rdo rje rnam 'joms nyon// ngas bstan legs par yid la zung// khrus kyis rnam rtog sbyong byed na// shin tu dben pa'i gnas dag tu// phyi mtshams tshul bzhin bya ba dang// spyi bshags la sogs rab tu bya// de nas dkyil 'khor 'dom gang la// ba yi rnam lngas sbyang bar bya// tsan+dan la sogs dri zhim pos// chag chag rab tu btab nas ni// thig ni gzhung dang mthun pa ste// shin tu rgyas par gdab bya ste// de nas tshon sna lnga yang dgye// dbus ni zlum po'i pho brang du// pad+ma mdzes pa 'dab brgyad bri// pad+ma lte ba sngon pos bkang// 'dab ma rnams ni mdzes tshon no// de yi phyi rol gru bzhi ste// sgo dang bcas pa dag tu bri// gru chad ljang gu mdzes pa ste// sgo rnams rigs dang 'dra ba'o// sgo yi mtha' ma zlum po ste// rdo rje ra bar bcas pa bri// zlum po'i kha dog dmar po bya// bar khyams nag po dag tu bya// de nas dkyil 'khor de nyid la// rdzas ni 'di ltar dgod par bya// pad+ma'i lte ba'i dkyil dag tu// bum pa mdzes pa gcig bzhag ste// tshon skud lnga yi gzung thag gdags// pad+ma'i 'dab ma re re la// lha bshos re re gzhag par bya// dkyil 'khor phyogs mtshams brgyad nyid du// phur pa bcu la khro bo sngags// phyogs bcu nyid du rab tu bkod// phyogs skyong bcu la gtor ma bcu// yi dwags 'byung po'i gtor ma dang// rigs drug rnams la gtor ma gcig/ chos skyong 'khor dang bcas pa dang/ ma mo rnams la gtor ma gcig/ dbus su dpal gyi gtor ma bca'// sgo bzhir ral gri bzhi yang gzug/ gru bzhir mda' bzhir me long bzhi// dar sna dag kyang gdags par bya// khrus chu'i bum pa gcig ni gru chad de// bum pa de dag rnams la yang// sman kyi yo byad sna tshogs dang// ka ra bu ram la sogs dang// gser dang man shel nor bu dang// rin chen sna lnga ci snyed dang// rgya mtsho'i tshwa dang lan tshwa dang/ tshwa sna ci snyed yod pa dang// spos dang tsan+dan gla rtsi dang// dri zhim pa yi spos rnams dang// mar dang sha dang ro zhim dang/ 'bras dang nas dang 'bru rnams dang// shing thog la sogs 'bras bu rnams// bum pa dag gi snying por gsungs// ras dkar dri med gtsang ma yis// mgul chings dag ni bya bar gsungs// de nas dkyil 'khor de nyid la// ras

dkar mdzes pas gdugs su bya// yungs kar sA lu ljang pa yis// bum pa'i kha rgyan bya bar gsungs// de nas bcom ldan dbang chen la// rnam 'joms nyid kyis yang zhus pa// kye kye bcom ldan dbang chen sku// dkyil 'khor rdzas nyid de ltar na// sgom thabs mchod pa'i rim pa gsungs// bcom ldan pad+ma he ru kas// rdo rje khro bo de nyid la// stobs ldan nyid kyi bka' stsal pa// kye ma nyon cig rnam par 'joms// sgrub pa chen po de nyid la// 'jug dus tshes chen bco lnga la// bsgrub pa'i zhag grangs rab ni bdun// 'bring po zhag lnga tha ma gsum// de ltar bsgrub pa byed pa'i tshe// dang po dbang gi bro brdung zhing// de tshe rnal 'byor chen po rnams// bsgoms pa'i rim pa 'di lta ste// pad+ma dbang gi dkyil 'khor rnams// skad cig tsam la rab tu bskyed// dbus su pad+ma he ru ka/ dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi ste// g.yas kyi zhal ni ljang gu ste// g.yon ni sngo la dbus ni dmar// phyag drug g.yas kyi dang po na// dgra sta bsnams shing skye rtsa gcod// 'og ma gnyis kyi phyag mtshan ni// mdung thung ral gri bsnams pa'o// g.yon pa gsum gyi phyag mtshan ni// bam dbyug thod pa sdigs mdzub ste// dbu yi steng na rta mgo gsum// rta skad sgrogs shing dbang skad 'tsher// me ri sna tshogs 'phro ba'i me// de lta bu yi dbang chen nyid// bdag nyid thugs ka'i dkyil 'khor du// yi ge hrIHnyid dmar po bsam// de nyid 'od du zhu ba dang// bdag nyid pad+ma dbang du bskyed// de nas hrIHhrIHzhes brjod pas// bdag nyid steng du chad par bsam// de nas rta mgo gsum du bsam// de nas badzra hrIHzhes brjod// de nyid 'od du zhu ba dang// bdag nyid dpal chen mdun dag tu// rdo rje rnam 'joms bsgom pa'o// de nyid sku mdog phyag mtshan ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog sngo// g.yas pas bum pa dkar po bsnams// rdo rje rgya gram bum pa'i kha nyid bcad pa'o// g.yon pas sdigs mdzub phur pa 'dril// klu dbang rigs bzhis sku la brgyan pa'o// de ltar gsal bar bsgom pa dang// bsnyen pa gtso bor sngags 'di brjod// oM pad+mAn+ta kr-ita badzra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba hU~M hrIHsngags de brgya rtsa brgyad brjod pas// rnam 'joms sku ni grangs med bsam// rdo rje rnam 'joms de dag gi/ thugs ka'i yi ge sa bon las// khrus kyi lha mo grangs med bsam// stong gsum thams cad khengs par bsam// khrus kyi lha mo de dag ni// sku mdog dkar mo 'od zer can// g.yas pa rnams ni bum pa ste// g.yon pa rnams ni sdigs 'dzub bo// de nas bcom ldan bde chen des// rnam 'joms nyid la lung bstan pa// kye ma rdo rje rnam 'joms nyon// gsang sngags khrus kyi sgrib sbyang

sngags// khyod kyis 'dus pa'i tshogs la smros// de nas rnam 'joms de nyid kyis// gsang sngags khrus kyi tshig 'di smras// na maHtsaN+Da badzra kro d+hA ya hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ de skad sngags de lan nyer gcig/ brjod cing bcom ldan dbang nyid bsam// de las 'od zer rab 'phros pas// khams gsum rgyud drug sems can gyi// rnam rtog sgrib pa sbyangs par bsam// de nas khrus kyi lha mo rnams// gsal ba 'od dang ldan gyur nas// bdud rtsi'i bum pa de dag gis// nang nas bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun babs// de nyid stong gsum khyab pa las// bdag dang mtha' yas sems can gyi// sdug bsngal thams cad med pa dang// sgrib pa thams cad bkrus par bsam// phyi dang nang gi nad rnams kyang// lha mo de dag thams cad kyis// bdud rtsi'i chu yis bkrus par bsam// rgyun du de ltar bsam bzhin du// spyi chog gzhung dang mthun par bya// rgyun du bgrangs pa'i sngags 'di'o// oM badzra tsaN+Da sarba A shud+d+ha raM yA// sarba pA pa pi sho d+ha ho raM raM khaM raM raM/ badzra tsaN+Da raM raM/ de ni rgyun 'bul dag tu bzlas// de nas bsgrub pa'i tha ma la// rigs kyi slob ma de dag la// dbus kyi bum pas dbang bskur bya/ khrus kyi bum pas khrus nyid bya// gtso po'i bum pa de nyid du// dpal chen de nyid sku bstan pa// slob bu'i spyi gtsug dag tu bzhag/ 'og ma'i sngags 'di nyid lan bdun brjod// de nas rdo rje slob dpon des// che ba'i glu 'di rab tu blangs// hU~M bdud rtsi dag pa'i ye shes sku// chos nyid mkha' mnyam ye shes bum// rnam rtog kun sbyong ye shes chu// rig pa 'od gsal snying por bcas// mkha' gsang mnyam sbyor lan tshwa'i ro// rnam dag dri med bcud len sman// 'dod yon las grub rin po che// rin chen 'od 'bar dri zhim spos// gso byed rdo rje lo ma'i chu// 'dod pa tshim byed 'bras bu dang// bsnyen 'dril thugs rje'i dar dpyang dang// 'bras bu bcud kyis gtams pa yi// chos nyid mnyam pa'i bum pa yis// skal ldan 'di la dbang bskur bas// chos nyid rang stobs rnyed nas kyang// dbang chen sku dang ldan par shog/ oM ma hA kA la sha sid+d+hi badzra hU~M:de nas khrus kyi bum pa yis// slob ma de la khrus byas te// spyi gtsug dag tu bzhag la yang// sngags ni 'og ma lan bdun brjod// de nas khrus kyi bum pa de// rnam 'joms nyid du gsal bar bsgom// de nas rdo rje slob dpon des// che ba'i glu 'di brjod par bya// rnam dag dri med ye shes chus// bkrus pas rnam rtog sdug bsngal bral// rnam rtog dri ma las sbyongs shing// sangs rgyas zhing khams rab 'byams kyi// ye shes chu rgyun babs nas na// khyod kyi rnam rtog byang gyur nas// phyi dang nang gi sdug bsngal rnams// thams cad zhi

bar gyur nas kyang// ye shes snang ba gsal bar ston// dag pa'i ye shes bdud rtsi 'dis// dri ma'i skyon rnams byang ba dang// mi gtsang la sogs nyams pa kun// shel sgong lta bur gyur nas ni// rnam 'joms nyid kyi sku gsung thugs// rigs kyi bu la rdzogs par shog/ oM tsaN+Da badzra kro d+ha kA ya hU~M hU~M hriHde nas gtor mas dbang bskur bya// gtor ma gtong zhing dkyil 'khor bsdu// zhes rdzogs pa rang byung chen po'i rgyud las/ khrus kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// rgya gar skad du/ ma hA su ka sa pi ya dur na mA/ bod skad du/ gshin gyi gnas lung chen mo zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal mnyam pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma'i rgyal po de nyid kyis/ sems can tshe 'das pa'i sems/ rig pa ngo sprad pa'i cho ga dang/ rigs drug nas drangs shing lam ston pa 'di gsungs so// phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i lha dang/ klu dang/ lha ma yin dang/ mi dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams la rab tu bos te 'di gsungs so// kye 'dus pa'i tshogs phal cher nga la nyon cig sems can thams cad sdug bsngal la chags shing/ sdug bsngal la spyod pa'o// tshe 'das pa'i sdug bsngal dang/ rnam rtog sbyong ba'i phyir/ ngas tshe 'das pa bar do las 'das pa'i lam du lung bstan pa 'di bstan gyis/ legs par nyon cig ces gsungs pas/ de nas 'khor rnams rab tu dga' ste 'di skad brjod do// e ma ho// legs so bdag cag rnams kyi legs par bzung/ dpa' bo chen pos bka' stsol cig/ de nas dbang chen de nyid kyis// nye ba'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa/ kye kye 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs nyon// gnas kyi cho ga chen mo ni// nga yis lags par bshad par bya// sems can las kyis mnar ba yi// dbang po rab 'bring tha ma gsum// shin tu rgyas pa 'di lta ste// dbang po nyi shu rtsa gcig go/ yang gsol pa/ sems can las kyi mnar de yi// bar do'i gnas lugs ci ltar lags// rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// sems can kun gyi lam chen ni// bar do'i snang ba chen po yin// rnam pa bzhi ru nga yis gsungs// rang bzhin gnas pa'i bar do dang// chos nyid rang snang bar do dang// rmi lam 'dzin pa'i bar do dang// srid pa 'khyams byed bar do'o// rang bzhin gnas pa'i bar do la// chos nyid gsang ba'i don rtogs nas// gang la ma chags shes rab pha rol phyin// de nas lus 'di bor ba dang// chos nyid rang snang bar do la// gnyis su med par gnas nas ni// zhag ni rnam bdun sdod par nges// de tshe sems can chen po de// chos nyid ma la rab gnas te// sems dang rig pa'i ye shes

gnyis// zhag bdun bar du rab tu bral// chos nyid rang yul mthong ba'i phyir// de nas zhag bdun lon pa dang// sems kyi sa bon langs pa dang// lhun grub chen po rab 'das nas// rmi lam bar do chen por 'gro// de tshe sngon gyi bag chags dran// de tshe gnas kyi cho ga gsungs// gnas kyi cho ga chen po rnams// phyag rgya 'khor los mtshams bcad bya// de nas bud+d+ha he ru kas// dbang chen nyid la don zhus pa// kye ma dpa' bo dbang gi bdag/ gnas lung chen po bsgrub pa yi// dkyil 'khor cho ga gsung du gsol// de nas dbang chen de nyid kyis// zhus pa'i tshig 'di bka' stsal pa// gnas lung bsgrub pa 'di lta ste// tshe 'das lus brjes gnas de ru// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi ste// dri sna gsum gyis chag chag gdab// de nas tshon thig byin gyis brlab// bcu drug thig dang ldan byas la// de nas tshon nyid rab tu dgye bar bya// pho brang gru bzhir ldan pa la// tshon rtsi mthing ga dag gis dgar// phyi rim zlum po dag tu gsungs// rdo rje'i ra bar bcas pa bri bya zhing// pho brang bsnol ma'i bar dag ni// dmar po dag gis rab tu bkang/ de yi phyi rim gru bzhi ste// sgo dang bcas par rab tu bshad/ sgo ni rigs dang mthun pa la// bar khyams sngon po dag tu bya// gru chad ljang gu mdzes pa'o// de yi phyi rim zlum por gsungs// zla gam bzhi ni dmar po'o// kye ma bcom ldan dbang gi bdag/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor de nyid la// mngon pa'i rdzas ni ji ltar lags// dpal chen khyed kyis bka' stsol cig/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor de nyid la// dbus kyi pho brang steng dag tu// bum pa mdzes pa gcig bzhag ste// ras dkar gtsang mas mgul tshangs bya// nang du chu+u gtsang dag gis dgang// kha rgyan ci 'byor dag gis bya// shar phyogs dag tu gtor ma gcig/ rak+ta bdud rtsis bran la bzhag/ lho phyogs gtor ma phud kyis bran// nub kyi rak+ta dag gis bran/ byang du bdud rtsi'i dri chus bran// byang shar mtshams su lan chags gtor// sha sna tshogs tshad dag dang ni// dkar gsum mngar gsum la sogs dang/ nya sha dag dang sgo nga dang// khur pa la sogs zas sna rnams// ci 'byor pa yis gtor ma brgyan// 'bras chang gro chang yos chang dang// bu ram chu dang kar chu dang// dar ba zho dang mar khu yis// gtor ma de nyid bran te bzhag/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor de nyid la// sgo bzhi ral gri bzhi yang gzug/ gru bzhir mda' bzhi me long bzhi// dar sna bzhi yang gdags par bya// de nas dkyil 'khor de nyid la// zhi khro'i sku yi dkyil 'khor ram// gang yod steng du dgram par bya// de yi steng du ras dkar gtsang ma yis// gdugs ni rab tu 'bubs bar bya// ras

dkar gtsang ma de nyid la// yi ge a nyid dkyil du bri// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor de nyid la// mthing nag dar gyi yol ba bre// dkyil 'khor de yi shar sgo ru// dri ma dag ni dgod la bzhag/ pho la gzhu dang dong ral dang/ pho yi chas su ci yod bzhag/ mo la 'phang dang skur ma dang// mo yi cha rkyen ci yod bzhag/ de nas dri ma de dag la// gshin gyi ming byang bstan pa ni// shog gu dar la rab bris nas// mda' 'phang dag la btags la gzug/ de nas gtor ma cha gsum gtang// phyi chog la sogs mchod pa lnga/ gzhung dang mthun par rab byas nas// zhi ba'i phrin las rdzogs par bya// de nas khro bo'i gzhung bsrang la// gshed byed bskrad pa'i cho ga bya// de nas dri ma de nyid la// slob dpon ting 'dzin ldan pa des// pho mo gang yin rnam shes dgug/ raM yaM khaM gis bsreg sbyang bkrus// de nas sngags 'chang de nyid kyis// e ma ri zhes rab brjod pas// snod bcud 'jig rten thams cad ni// mthing nag gru gsum e ru bsam// gshed byed thams cad brlag par bsam/ de nas dri ma de nyid la// de ba bi shud+d+ha ri ni rab brjod pas// zhi khro'i lha tshogs de dag kun// dri ma tshe 'das lus la gzug/ de nas dri ma de nyid ni// lha tshogs rnams su gsal ba dang// tshe 'das de yi lus po la// mdzes pa'i rgyan cha dag gis brgyan// dar dpyangs dag dang gdugs kyis dgab// de nas rdo rje slob dpon des// dbang chen stabs su bzhugs nas ni// tshigs bcad 'di skad brjod par bya// e ma ho// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ni// yon tan phrin las zag pa zad// zad mi shes pa yi bden pa dang// gzhan yang bdag cag rdo rje slob dpon dang// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i bden pas/ gshin po tshe las 'das pa 'di/ rigs drug gang na gnas kyang rung ste/ ngan song gsum gyi sgo chod cig matho ris su sgo 'byed pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/ skad cig la mchis par gyur cig gzhan yang 'di la gnod par byed pa'i bdud dam/ bgegs gang yang rung bas/ 'di la gnod par ma byed cig/ gal te gnod par byas na/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang chen gyi byin rlabs kyis/ thal ba rdul phran bzhin du gyur cig de skad ces brjod cing sngags 'di gsum brjod do// oM bi sha kro d+ha ha na ha na ha la ha la hU~M phaT/ ces brjod cing/ nyung kar la bsngags la phyogs bcur gtor ro// de nas 'dzab tu bgrang ba'i sngags 'di bro brdung zhing bzlas so// oM pad+mAn+ta kr-ita badzra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba hU~M hrIHsngags de las ni 'od 'phros pas// rta mgrin dmar po grangs med 'phros// 'gro drug gnas nas drangs par

bsam// de nas dri ma'i snying ga nas// rta mgrin de dag thams cad kyis// bzung nas gnyis med lha ru gsal// de nas b+hud+d+ha he ru kas// dbang bdag nyid la don zhus pa// kye ma bcom ldan dbang chen sku// tshe 'das sems can de dag ni// ngan song gsum nas drangs pa'i phyir// cho ga'i sbyor ba gsung du gsol// de nas pad+ma he ru kas// de dag rnams la bka' stsal pa/ de nas zhi ba'i 'dzab dbyangs bgrangs// oM AHhU~M badzra d+h+r-i kra muM d+hA twi shwa rI/ lAM dA+e Sha ra ti/ bAM ra ga ra ti s+t+waM/ mAM mo ha ra ti/ AM a ro lika/ de skad brjod cing gzugs la bstim// ye ge de dag re re yi// 'od zer rab tu 'phos pa yis// shes bya'i rnam rtog sgrib pa dang// blta ba gol ba'i sgrib byang bsam// de nas sngags kyi 'od zer des// tshe 'das lus la phog pa dang// lus ngag yid gsum sgrib byang nas// lus kyi dngos po med par bsam// de nas tshe 'das dngos po de// yi ge nr-i du gyur nas ni// de nas hU~M du gyur par bsam// de las 'od zer 'phro 'du las// badzra A:hU~M rab brjod pas// rdo rje gyur nas skye 'jig bral// de ltar skye ba med bsams nas// dkyil 'khor bzhengs su+u gsol ba yi// cho ga mnga' gsol byin brlab bskyed// raM yaM khaM gyis bsregs sbyangs las// bskyed pa'i sngags 'di lan gsum brjod// b+h+rUM bi shud+d+he b+han+d+ha dz+nyA na tsakra b+h+ruM// de nyid 'od du zhu ba las// gzhal yas khang ni rab tu bsam// 'khor lo rin chen gzhal yas khang// b+han d+ha ye shes rnam par bsam// rgya khyon dpag tu med par bsam// de yi nang du bsam bya ba// sngags 'dis rab tu bskyed par bya/ a tsan+d+ra maN+Dal hU~M/ ma sUr ya maN+Da la hU~M/ paM pad+ma maN+Dal hU~M/ hU~M traM ti ra baM la sogs pa'i// zla ba'i dal dang nyi ma'i dal// pad+ma stong dang ldan pa yi// bdag nyid rab tu bsam par bya// ti ra baM la sogs pa yi// phyogs skyong gdan yang rab tu bsam// de yi steng du dbang chen bsam// phyogs mtshams kun tu khro bo bsam// de ltar dkyil 'khor bzhengs nas ni// dkyil 'khor bzhengs su gsol ba yi// cho ga 'di skad brjod par bya// dbang zhu rab tu gon nas ni// mgo la dar dpyangs rab bcings nas// rdo rje'i glu chen 'di skad blang// hU~M rnam dag ye shes gzhal yas khang// stong pa ye shes b+han d+ha'i chang// gsal ba ye shes thig ldan pa// mkha' mnyam rgya khyon dpag tu med// 'od zer lnga ldan mu khyud bcas// rang rig ye shes 'khor lo'i dbyibs// rnam dag ye shes klong yangs dkyil// dur khrod me ri sna tshogs 'phro// yaMHye shes rlung gis rnam rtog thams cad gtor// skye med ye shes shes rab dbyings su sgrol// raMHye shes me yis rtog pa sbar sbur bsreg/ shes rab ye shes bskal

pa'i me ltar 'bar// khaMHye shes chu yis nyon mongs rnam lnga bkrus// ye shes chu yi rgya mtsho rba rlabs 'khrugs// laMHchos nyid sa yis snang srid 'khor 'das 'degs// chos nyid mi 'gyur theg pa'i sa rnams bgrod// keMHye shes keM gyis gti mug 'bras bu gting// chos nyid ma skyes stong ba'i 'bras bur ldan/ b+h+rUMH/ ye shes rnam dag pho brang dkyil 'khor 'dir// rgyal ba rnams la bzhengs bzhugs mi mnga' yang// stong nyid theg ldan rgyal ba'i gshegs khang 'dir// thams cad gshegs nas brtan par bzhugs su gsol// hU~M/ rig pa'i rang bzhin yi ge hU~M gi ngang// gru bzhi ye shes bzhi dang ldan gyur nas// chos nyid gtor ma zhal zas bdud rtsi hU~M// rig pa'i ye shes yi ge oM du gsal// rnam rtog rgyun gcod thig bcu drugakyang 'dug chen 'bras bus mdzes// bdud rtsi gtor ma bsreg sbyang bkrus// oMH/ ye shes lnga ldan rig pa'i ye shes oM// ye shes rang snang sna tshogs lnga ldan pa// ye shes bcud ldan thams cad gtor mas tshim// pho brang rab mdzes rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// sgrub rdzas byin gyis brlab cing brtan par bzhugs// sgo bzhi rab mdzes ye shes phyogs bzhir gsal// ye shes rang snang 'khor lo lta bu'i dbyibs// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor ye shes pho brang 'dir// khro rgyal thams cad brtan par bzhugs su gsol// oM badzra maN+Dal sur ste s+t+wam/ de ltar dkyil 'khor cho ga bstan// dkyil 'khor cho ga rab rdzogs nas// brda' sgo dbye ba'i rim pa bya// tshe 'das las kyi sems can de// dkyil 'khor de yi shar sgo nas// pho brang nang du tshud par bsam// de nas glu chen 'di skad brjod// hU~M/ shar lho nub byang sgo bzhi nas// rig pa'i ye shes sgo 'byed kyis// shes rab chen po'i sgo phye zhig/ rig pa'i ye shes sgo phye bas// sems kyi rnam rtog dri ma bral// tsit+ta'i dkyil 'khor sgo phye bas// ye shes snang ba phyogs bcur gsal// sgron ma mig gi sgo phye bas// rig pa'i ye shes rtog med gsal// sems kyi yi ge nr-i gnas pa// gsal ba'i ye shes mig phye bas// rig pa'i ye shes hU~M du gyur// ye shes gsal ba'i sgo phye bas// dkyil 'khor pho brang mngon par snang// 'dir ni dkyil 'khor gsal gyur bas// ye shes thams cad dbab tu gsol// sa man+ta badzra sa twa hU~M// kye ma bcom ldan dpal chen sku// tshe 'das rigs kyi bu de nyid// dkyil 'khor lha tshogs de dag gi/ zhal ni gang gis blta bar 'gyur// dbang chen nyid kyis lung bstan pa// kye ma nyon cig he ru ka/ rdo rje slob dpon gsang ba des// tshig bshad 'di dag brjod byas na// dkyil 'khor lha yi zhal mthong 'gyur// de nas dkyil

'khor shar sgo nas// dri ma 'dzin pa'i mi dag gis// dri ma ngag dang bcas pa yis// dkon mchog gsum la phyag gsum 'tshal// de nas rdo rje slob dpon des// tshig ni 'di skad brjod par bya// ho mi gnas pa yi ye shes chen po'i bdag nyid zhi khro gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bcas pa dang/ bcom ldan pad+ma dbang gi dkyil 'khor gyis/ tshe 'das 'di la zhal bstan du gsol/ byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ dbang bskur du gsol/ mthu bstan du gsol/ sgrib pa sbyang du gsol// gnas spar bar mdzad du gsol/ oM badzra sarba ka badzra hU~M/ de nas ting 'dzin rab brtan pas// sngags kyi 'od zer ldan 'phros pas// tshe 'das nyid la dbang bskur bas// de nas byin dbab bshags pa bya// pad+mAn+ta kr-ita bro brdung zhing// ru lu gar gyis mchod pa 'bul// de nas dbus bum byin gyis brlabs// bum pa'i nang du lha rnams bskyed// bum pa mdzes pa de nyid la// dkyil 'khor lha tshogs gsal ba dang// dang po'i gnas su bzhag par bya// mchod dang bshags pa byed tsam na// tshe 'das nyid kyis byed bar bsam// de nas byin dbab byas pa dang// lha dang dkyil 'khor je gsal bsgom// phud dang gtor ma byin gyis brlabs// de nas rdo rje slob dpon des// ting 'dzin gsum la 'bad par bya// de ltar ting 'dzin rab gsal bas// dkyil 'khor sgo bzhir dbang bro brdung// de nas dbang gi zhwa gon la// mchod pa chen po 'di skad brjod// hU~M mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni// sems kyi yid bzhin sprin tshogs kyis// mnyen 'jam reg na bde ba dang// sangs rgyas zhing khams rab 'byams su// sangs rgyas rol mo sna tshogs dang// dbyibs legs rdzing bu ro mchog bsil// ye shes rol mo'i rgyan ldan pa// chos kyi glu dang ye shes gar// snang ba'i bro dang sangs rgyas gsung// tshangs pa'i gsung dang ru lu'i sgra// dbang gi stabs dang pad+ma'i gsung// dbang mchog byin rlabs chen po yis// hU~M bla bre rgyal mtshan lhab lhub dang// bdug spos mar me tsan+dan dri// 'dod yon la sogs rin chen gyis// rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams la mchod// sil snyan zhal zas gzhal yas khang// mdzes par bris shing spras pa dang// sems dang chos dang glu chen po// dbang chen dkyil 'khor nyid la 'bul// rin chen rgyan dang yo byad chu// zhi ba'i tshogs la mchod par 'bul// a la la ste mchod par bzhes// nang gi mchod pa'i phyag rgya ni// dri chen rdo rje che mchog dang// byang chub sems dang rak+ta'i dbang// dri chu rdo rje sgrib sbyangs chu// bdud rtsi yon tan las grub gter// thogs pa med par mnyam sbyor nas// dbang chen sku la mchod par 'bul// tshe dang gal phye

dza gad dang// drag po tshims byed kun tu rgyug/ gtsang ma'i phud dang gtor ma yis// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor kun la mchod// tshil chen snang gsal chen po dang// drag po'i rgyan cha sna tshogs dang// dbang chen bro dang ru lu'i sgra// khro rgyal rnams la mchod par 'bul// rnga chen dang ni dril bu'i sgra// cang til g+haN+De pi wang sgra// mchog chen dung dang gling bu dang// ting ting shag dang kar ko tra// cha lang la sogs sgra rnams dang// lha dang klu yi sgra skad rnams// mthun sbyar gnyis med mchod pa 'bul// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro// reg bya la sogs 'dod yon lnga// bcom ldan dpal chen nyid la mchod// dkyil 'khor tshogs dang mchod rdzas kyis// gnyis med bsdus te mnyam sbyor nas// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor kun la mchod// rgyal srid rdzas dang yo byad dang// sna tshogs mchod pa chen por 'bul// a la la ste bzhes su gsol// 'byung po kun la mchod pa ni// lan chags mchod pa'i phyag rgya ni// gtor ma ye shes rnam dag dang// zas kyi ro mchog sna tshogs pas// sbyangs pa'i lan chags bral gyur cig/ nya sha dang ni phag pa'i sha/ shwa ba'i sha dang dgo ba'i sha/ bya rgod sha dang 'dab chags sha/ stag sha dom sha spre'u'i sha/ khyi sha sre mong byi la'i sha/ ba sha bong sha rta sha dang// rkyang sha la sogs sha sna rnams// 'bul lo lan chags rnams la 'bul// 'dod chags lan chags bral gyur cig/ ri dwags sha sna phul ba yis// yid kyi lan chags bral gyur cig/ 'dab chags sha sna phul ba yis// sems kyi lan chags bral gyur cig/ sder chags sha sna phul ba yis// lus kyang lan chags bral gyur cig/ sems can rkang med sha phul bas// lus ngag yid gsum dri ma lan chags bral gyur cig/ sha yi rigs rnams phul ba yis// lan chags thams cad bral gyur cig/ 'bras chang gro chang yos kyi chang// rgun chang shing thog chang dang ni// bu ram chang dang lan tshwa'i chu// mos chu bsil chu gur gum chu// rgya mtsho lteng ka lu ma'i chu// ka ra dang ni sbrang rtsi'i chu// khrag dang zho dang dar ba yi// btung ba'i mchod pa 'di phul bas// lan chags thams cad bral gyur cig/ mngar gsum dag gi chu phul bas// 'dod pa'i lan chags bral gyur cig/ chang gi rig mchog 'di phul bas// zhe sdang lan chags bral gyur cig/ dkar gsum dag gi chu phul bas// klu rigs lan chags bral gyur cig/ lan tshwa'i chu rnam phul ba yis// gnyan gyi lan chags bral gyur cig/ chu sna ji snyed phul ba yis// sa bdag lan chags bral gyur cig/ hU~M sha dang mar dang khur ba dang// dza gad gtor ma phul pa yis// lha klu gnod sbyin dri za dang// lto 'phye sa bdag rigs

rnams dang// grul bum gnyan gyi rigs rnams dang// byol song klu yi rigs rnams dang// yi dwags sha za'i rig can dang// stobs chen bdud kyi rigs rnams dang// btsan dang rgyal 'gong 'khor bcas dang// ma mo dang ni gshin rje dang// khyed rnams kun gyi lan chags ni// skad cig nyid la bral gyur cig/ tshe las 'das pa'i sems can 'di// sems kyi mdud pa myur du khrol// lan chags rkyen gyis zas nor longs// tshe 'das rigs kyi bu 'di dang// lus dang grib mar ma 'grogs par// ngan song gsum gyi lam ma bstan// sngags 'chang bdag gi ngag 'di nyon// dbang chen nyid kyi bka' ma bcag/ hU~M nyon cig ltos shig 'byung po rnams// nga ni pad+ma dbang chen te// thams cad nga yi dbang du sdud// dregs pa can rnams spa bkong byed// gnod byed snying la bro brdung ste// gshed byed thal bar brlag pa'i bro// sri chen dbang du sdud pa'i bro// bregs pa gnad la bor ba'i bro// nga yi bka' 'di ma bcags par// lan chags gtor ma 'di longs la// rang rang gnas su byer bar gyis// rang rang gnas su byer nas kyang// tshe 'das gshed du ma byed par// ngan song lam gyi sgo chod cig/ yon bdag rigs rgyud 'di rnams la// phyin chad sdang bar ma byed cig/ oM pad+mAn+ta kr-ita badzra kro d+ha hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ sngags de bzlas shig yungs kar gtor// mchod pa'i gzhung rnams rdzogs pa dang// tshogs kyi mchod pa rab tu bya// tshogs chen mchod pa de dag kun// tshe 'das de yis drangs par bsam// de bzhin gzhung bzhin rdzogs par bya// de nas bdun tshigs dang po la// dang po'i cho ga 'di dag brjod// sngags 'di brjod cing spro bar bya// de nas glu chen 'di skad brjod// tshe 'das mdun du bsam pa'o// hU~M nyon cig tshe 'das rigs kyi bu// khyod kyi rnam rtog ngas sbyang gis// nga la gus par phyag 'tshol cig/ sems kyi the tshom nyid sol la// bde ba'i stan la rab 'dug la// sngags 'chang nga yi ngag 'di nyon// tshe 'das bya ba'i rigs kyi bu// 'di nas 'jig rten 'og 'di na// dmyal ba bya ba 'jigs rung ba// sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ mi bzad khyod kyis myong bar 'gyur// zhe sdang rgyud las log pas na// sdug bsngal de las bsgral bya'i phyir// bzod pa'i chu bo 'di longs shig/ oM du si na ra ka sa mA dza hU~M/ de nas dri ma de nyid la// dbang gi dkyil 'khor lnga bsams la// spyi gtsug zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te// lce la pad+ma 'dab brgyad bsam// snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam// lte bar rin chen zur brgyad bsam// rkang mthil e nyid zur gsum bsam// de lta'i dkyil 'khor de dkyil du// dang po la ni a dkar po// gnyis par

su nyid ser por bsam// gsum par nr-i nyid nag por bsam// bzhi par pre nyid ser po ste// lnga bar du nyid dung kha'o// drug pa tri nyid nag po ste// de ltar gnas pa'i rang bzhin de// dbang nyid bskur ba'i rang bzhin gyis// dang po yi ge oM gyur bsam// gnyis pa AHlA gsum pa hU~M// bzhi pa swA ser kun tu snang// lnga pa hA ru gyur par bsam// drug pa hrIHnyid bsam par bya// de ltar bsam par bum pa yi// chu yis dri ma bkru bar bya// bum pa dri ma'i steng du bzhag/ dbang nyid bskur bar rab bya// dmyal ba'i gnas nas thon par bsam// de nas 'di skad dbyangs blang ngo// hU~M nyon cig dgongs shig rigs kyi bu// tshe 'das bya ba rigs kyi bu// 'di nas 'jig rten 'og na ni// yi dwags 'jig rten bsam mi khyab// bkres dang skom kyi sdug bsngal ni// mi bzad khyod kyis myong bar 'gyur// de las bsgral bar bya ba'i phyir// nga ni bcom ldan dpal chen te// yi dwags sdug bsngal ngas bsgral gyis// sbyin pa'i chu bo 'di longs shig/ a su nr-i pre du tri hU~M/ a aH/ bskyed rim bskur thabs gong dang mthun// yi dwags sdug bsngal bral bar bsam// de nas byol song sdug bsngal yang// de yi sbyong tshig 'di skad do// hU~M tshe 'das rigs kyi bu khyod nyon// nga yis bstan pa 'di la nyon// bstan pa 'di la ma zhugs na// 'di nas mngon snang yul 'di na// byol song bya ba'i sdug bsngal ni// mi bzad khyod kyis myong bar 'gyur// de las bsgral bar bya ba'i phyir// nga ni pad+ma he ru kas// snang ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam mi khyab// rang rig gsal ba'i sgo dbye bas// snang gsal ye shes me long ltos// sdug bsngal mtha' las ngas bsgral gyis// byol song rnams kyi sdug bsngal ni// nga yis phral bar bya ba'i phyir// shes rab chu bo 'di longs shig/ oM kA ya badzra tsakra a su nr-i pre du tri hU~M a aH/ de ltar 'jig rten rab gsal bas// byol song sdug bsngal bral bar bsam// de nas rim kyis drang ba ni// lha yi yul nas drang ba dang// lha ma yin dang rgyud lnga nas// mi yi gnas su drang bar bshad// de nas mi yul rin chen nas// gnas spar ba yi cho ga dang// dbang bskur cho ga rgyas par bya// de nas slob dpon gsang ba des// ngan song gsum nas rab drangs nas// tshe 'das gnas lnga dag tu yang// 'bru lnga'i dbang bskur 'di skad brjod// hU~M ngan song gsum gyi phung po lngar// dpa' bo 'bru lnga'i phra bkod de// rgyu lnga 'khor ba'i lam rgyun gcad// thams cad rgyal ba'i sras por bya'o// dbang chen gsang ba'i ngang nyid nas// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med pas// srid gsum zos kyang nga ma 'grangs// khams gsum 'thung kyang nga ma ngoms// stong gsum thams cad

bsgral ba'i zhing// ma skyes pas na 'gags pa 'jig/ rang bzhin med pas bsgral ba'i rgyu// sems nyid yongs pa'i mkha' klong du// stong gsum ma lus ston pas na// 'bum gyi char yang mi phod de// nam mkha'i gar khyab rig pas khyab// rig pa'i ngang bzhin chos kyi sku// phyi nang gnyis ka sems su bsgral// rig pa'i rang bzhin mya ngan 'das// skye shi gnyis ka rgyud nas dag/ yod med gnyis kyi mtha' las 'das// cir yang snang la gzung du med// med pa ma yin snying po'i ngang// ma zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das// gcig pu nyid la ye shes gsal// blo ldan gang zhig skal che bas// 'di ni bsgral ba'i lung zhes grags// tshe 'das bya ba rigs kyi bu// 'di na ma chags gnas su gshegs/ ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ badzra s+pha ra na hU~M phaDa/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de nas rU tra nag po'i ting nge 'dzin gsal la// nyon mongs lnga las bskyed pa yi// rU tra sdig chen 'di byung bas// 'di nyid rab tu gnan par bya// de nas ltung ba bshags gyur nas// chags pa bral bas 'di skad brjod// hU~M lha zhes gzhan du bstan pa yang// tshig gi tha snyad tsam du zad// rig pa'i ngang la gnyis med pa'i// rtogs pa'i don la gcig tu bstan// tsit+ta'i dkyil du gnas bcas pas// stong gsum thams cad gzhal yas khang// yid kyis dkyil 'khor lha bkod de// skye 'gro ma lus rgyal ba'i sras// byang chub sems su dbyer med pas// ci ltar snang ba kun tu bzang// kun gzhi ye nas rtog med mnyam// phyi nang snod bcud chos kyi sku// 'di las gzhan pa'i sangs rgyas ni// bu gcig gzhan du ma tshol cig/ rdo rje dbang nyid 'di longs la// skye med byang chub dran par gyis// oM AHhU~M/ badzra zhi ka badzra hU~M a/ shin tu nye ba'i mi dag gis// pho la gzhu mo rgyud bzang gi/ mchog ma dag la dar sna btags// de nas gzhu de rab tu bdung// de nas mda' yang rab btang la// rdo rje slob dpon gsang ba des// gsang ba'i thabs kyi glu 'di blang/ mo nyid yin na 'phang nyid gsor// de nas 'di skad brjod par bya// hU~M stong ba nyid kyi klong dkyil du// pha rol phyin bcu'i shes rab dbyings// cang shes 'phrul gyi ting 'dzin gzhu// brgyan pa'i rin chen mchog ma gter// gsung ni ka la ping ka'i rgyud sprengs bzhin// mtha' gnyis bral ba'i ye shes snyug ma las// yi dam nang du sgrol yid bzhin nang du sgron ma'i ye shes zhags/ zer ba yang byung/ ma'i mkha' 'gro zhabs// tshul bzhin thugs las byung ba'i ar gsum ma// nga dang bdag tu ltos pa'i ngan song bcom// rgyud drug nyon mongs 'khor ba'i gnas bsgral te// byang chub snying bsgril yig drug byin rlabs te// sku la thim nas rgyal ba'i sras su gyur// ye shes

mchog gi sa la gnas thob nas// rigs lnga gsal ba'i gral du gzud par bya// e ma rigs kyi bu khyod nyon// khyod kyi rnam shes nr-ir bcas pa// bdag nyid bcom ldan dpal chen gyis// rnam shes hU~M du bsdus nas ni// phaTaHkyis gsang ba'i dbyings su 'phangs// oM AHhU~M swA hA hrIHsarba ta na sho d+ha hU~M hU~M phaT phaT:tiSh+Tha lhan/ de nas phung po bstan pa yis// cho ga'i sbyor ba rab tu gsungs// slob dpon ting 'dzin ldan pa des// rig pa'i ye shes hU~M ldan pas// chos nyid ma yi rtsa rgyud nas// spyi gtsug bde chen 'od du zhu// de las 'od 'phros sangs rgyas zhing// sras dang bcas pas phyogs bcur gang// zhing khams lus la brgyan par bsam// de nas rigs lngar skyed byed pa'i// sbyor ba'i glu chen 'di skad do// oM bcom ldan rgyal ba rigs lnga la// 'di yi phung po lnga bstabs pas// gnyis med sbyor ba'i mkha' dbyings su// sa bon hU~M las bskyed gyur cig/ rigs kyi yab lngar bskyed gyur nas// thugs rje phyogs bcur 'gyed par shog/ hU~M yum chen dbyings phyug lnga rnams la// 'di yi 'byung ba lnga bstabs pas// gnyis med sbyor ba'i mkha' dbyings su// sa bon hU~M las bskyed gyur cig/ dbyings phyug lnga ru bskyed nas kyang// thugs rje phyogs bcur 'gyed par shog/ sems dpa' chen po brgyad rnams la// 'di yi rnam shes brgyad bstabs pas// gnyis med sbyor ba'i mkha' dbyings su// sa bon hU~M las bskyed gyur cig/ sems ma chen mo brgyad rnams la// 'di yi yul brgyad bstab pa yis// gnyis med sbyor ba'i mkha' dbyings su// sa bon hU~M las bskyed gyur cig/ khro bo chen po bzhi rnams la// lus kyi skye mched bzhi bstabs pas// gnyis med sbyor ba'i mkha' dbyings su// sa bon hU~M las bskyed gyur cig/ khro bo bzhi ru skyes nas kyang// rang gsal 'od dang ldan gyur cig/ khro mo chen mo bzhi rnams la// phyin ci log rtog bzhi bstabs pas// gnyis med sbyor ba'i mkha' dbyings su// sa bon hU~M las bskyed gyur cig/ khro mo bzhi ru skyes nas kyang// rang gsal 'od dang ldan gyur cig/ hU~M bcom ldan kun bzang yab yum la// 'di yi yid chos gnyis bstabs pas// gnyis med sbyor ba'i mkha' dbyings su// sa bon hU~M las bskyed gyur cig/ kun bzang yab yum bskyed nas kyang// rang gsal 'od dang ldan gyur cig/ bcom ldan thub pa drug rnams la// gnyis med rig pa'i thugs dkyil du// sa bon hU~M las bskyed gyur cig/ oM s+pha ra Na phaDa:hU~M s+pha ra Na b+h+rUM/ a s+pha ra Na hU~M/ da ni sa lam gnas mchog bstan// de nas bcom ldan mngon rdzogs des// sems can lha ru bskul ba 'di// rab tu brjod cing bka' stsal to// lha rnams skul byed cho ga

ni// thams cad gnyis su med par bskul// mnyam med mchod pa 'di skad do// oM sngon gyi thugs dam chen po ni// sems can 'byams klas ma lus kun// sangs rgyas zhing du dag sbyangs pas// phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig/ gser zhun lta bur gnas pa la// sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs// gsum gyis byin brlabs 'od kyi 'bru// yab yum gnas su btegs nas kyang/ sbyor ba'i lhums su phaT kyis 'phangs// thugs kar thim nas sku yi dbyibs// rdo rje lam byung yum gyi mkha'// gnyis med dbyings su gnas spar nas// lha rnams snying po so so'i sgras// 'di la byin gyis brlab tu gsol// oM sarba badzra ta kr-ita g+h+ri rna a yaM s+pha ra Na phaT:su tri dzaHde nas chos kyi dbyings chen du// rigs lnga sbyor ba'i brdas bskul bsam// tshe 'das las kyi sems can de// tshon gang 'od 'bar sku ru bsam// de nas gnyis med rab gsal ba'i// glu chen 'di skad rab tu brjod// hU~M mu tig dkar po dri med dang// tsan+dan dmar po dri med gnyis// byang chub sems kyi thig le gsum// rtogs pa'i klong du 'dres pa la// mi zhes bya ba sangs rgyas yin// sangs rgyas gzhan du ma tshol cig/ btsal kyang rang gi don mi rnyed// rtog med mnyam med rig pa'i ngang// dngos med stong gsal 'ja' tshon sku// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od lngar gsal// rdzogs pa chen po'i gnas lugs kyi// byang chub sems la ma yengs na// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'di la rdzogs// dper na mun la snang byung bzhin// chos nyid rang snang 'di bltas pas// rgyud drug sems can thams cad kun// sangs ma rgyas pa gcig kyang med// tshe 'das sgrib pa byang gyur nas// sangs rgyas sras su dbang bskur ro// oM badzra tiSh+Tha sa ma ya mu dra hU~M/ bo d+hi tsit+ta sid+d+ha ku ru a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M/ sngags kyi 'phro 'du'i ting 'dzin brtan// de ltar ting 'dzin gsal gyur nas// rtogs pa'i glu chen 'di skad do// e ma byang chub sems kyi klong brdal bas// kun bzang rig pa'i rang bzhin las// sangs rgyas med cing sems can med// lha dang lha min 'dre yang med// 'khor ba med cing myang 'das med// rig pa ye shes gcig pu nyid// 'khor 'das gnyis su btags pa med// nga dang bdag med mngon sangs rgyas// de phyir sangs rgyas sras nyid do// tsit+ta badzra sa ma ya hU~M/ de nas chos nyid bum pa des// dri ma dag la dbang bskur ro// sangs rgyas zhing las mi g.yo ba'i// dbang bskur cho ga 'di skad do// oM gnyis med gsal ba'i oM nyid de// gnyis med dbyings nas b+ha gar thim// yum gyi mkha' la gnas pa der// bo d+hi tsit+tas dbang bskur nas// yi ge 'bru gsum byin gyis brlab// rigs nges rgyas

pa'i sras su bya// phyin chad 'gro ba'i don bya'i phyir// bskul ba'i sa la gnas par bya'o// yongs la dbang bskur dbang gi mchog/ gang la ma chags 'dod dgur bsgyur// gnyis su med pa'i pho brang du// spang len med par dbang bskur ro// bum pa zlum po'i pho brang du// snod bcud ma lus dbang du bsdus// thig le chen po'i rgyas btab// sems can thams cad sangs rgyas yin// tshe 'das 'di ni rgyal ba'i sras// ngan song 'khor ba'i blta ba bsal// rnam par rtog pa'i 'dod pa bcom// rang gi ye shes lung gis gsal// sngar 'das sangs rgyas bzhugs pa bzhin// rnal 'byor rdo rje che ge khyod// rgyal ba kun gyis bsngags par mdzad// sngon gyi de bzhin dbang gnas shog/ rgyal ba'i sa las mi g.yo zhing// rang gi sa la gtan du 'dug/ rat+na ma gu+u sa man traM traM/ oM lAM hU~M mUM swA maM aM pAM hA tAM/ ma hA shUn+ya tA dz+nyA na/ badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de ltar dbang bskur ting 'dzin gsal// de ltar rgyal ba mnyes byed pa'i// sngags 'dis thams cad mchod bar bya// de yang tshe 'das sangs rgyas des// bdag nyid slob dpon gsang ba la// mchod chen sngags 'dis mchod par bsam// oM su ra to badzra na maHba b+hu ba b+hu hrIHoM su ra to badzra na ra hrIHoM su+u ra to na mo bud+d+ha hrIHoM su ra to badzra na ha hrIHoM su ra to badzra g+han+d+he hU~M/ oM su ra to dug ma ru ka ra guM guM/ oM badzra su ra to badzra mo ke taM taM/ oM su+u ra to badzra pi shing du tir a AHoM su ra to badzra shri hri hrIHoM e ma hA su ra to badzra ba ni se na tra pi ni se ni twa thA/ oM he ma hA su+u ra to badzra gI tI ti/ oM he ma hA su ra to badzra n-i t+ye se le/ oM su ra to badzra rU pa dza dzaHoM su ra to badzra shab+da su ke hU~M hU~M/ oM su ra to badzra g+han+d+he su ki baM baM/ oM su ra to ma hA ra sa ho hoHde nas mchod chen rdzogs par bya/ 'di ni gnas dang bdun tshigs dang// gshed byed dbral ba'i cho ga'o// de nas dkyil 'khor sgo bzhi nas// rdo rje dbang bskur bya ba ni// rdo rje mched kyis 'bod par bya// gnas chog gzhung bzhin byed pa na// bsgrub pa rab 'bring gsum du bya// ro de yod na mchog tu gsungs// de la khrus bya dbang rdzogs bya// gnas kyi rim pa byed pa na// rab gnas brtan par bzhugs pa dang// gnas spar ba yi mchod pa bya// bdun tshigs dag tu byed pa na// zhag gcig dag gis thon par bya// mchod pa'i las rnams ci 'byor bya'o// tshogs dang zhal zas sna tshogs dbul// sangs rgyas rnams dang byang sems mchod// zhag bdun lon pa'i tshe na yang// bdun tshigs dang po 'di ltar bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor bsdu bar bya'o// phyi chog nang chog gzhung bzhin bya'o// gnas dang bdun tshigs gnyis su med pa'o// zhes rdzogs par rang byung gi

rgyud las/ gnas dang bdun tshigs bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// rgya gar skad du/ pa ru pa ru pi pu ri nA maHbod skad du/ rnal 'byor pa tshe 'das pa'i bdun tshigs bar ma'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang gi lha la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid la/ rigs lnga'i lha tshogs rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye kye bcom ldan dbang chen sku/ bar do yi ni snang ba la// zhag ni ci tsam thogs par 'gyur// mos pa'i 'khor la gsung du gsol// stobs chen nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// kye ma nyon cig 'dus pa'i 'khor// sems can rnams kyi lam chen ni// chos nyid rang snang bar do la// zhag bdun bar du gnas par 'gyur// de ni rang rang snang ba'i yul// sems dang rig pa zhag bdun bral// de tshe rnam rtog 'gyu med gsal// de nas zhag bdun lon pa dang// sngon gyi bag chag sad nas ni// sems la snang ba phra rags 'byung// de tshe bdun tshigs dang po yis// bag chags khad kyis 'bri par gsungs// de ni rmi lam 'dzin pa'i bar do'o// de nyid zhag bdun gnas pa'o// de tshe sems kyi rnam rtog ldang// snang ba'i cho 'phrul de dag kun/ ban bun yad yud lang long 'ong// de tshe shes pa gya gyur gnas// dper na mi dga' ba yi mi dag la// tshig ni 'jam por smra ba yis// mi dga' spangs nas bde spyod ltar// de tshe bdun tshigs gnyis pa 'dis// tshe 'das rigs kyi bu de yi// shes pa bzung nas bde la gnas// de nas srid pa bar do der// zhag bdun gnas shing sdug bsngal dran// tshe 'das shes pa rang dbang med// pha rol dag gis 'phrog pa dang// rang dbang med pa'i spyod pa 'byung// de nas zhag bdun lon pa dang// bdun tshigs tha ma'i dbang bskur bas// mtho ris go 'phang gsum thob 'gyur// de ltar bdun tshigs byas pa na// rang rang sdug bsngal gnas su 'grol// de ltar bdun tshigs byas pas na// dmyal bar 'gro ba'i mi dag kun// byol song gnas su 'dren pa'o// yi dwags gnas su skye ba rnams// lha ma yin gyi gnas su 'dren// byol song gnas su skye ba rnams// lha yi gnas su 'dren par byed// cha mnyam dag tu skye ba rnams// mi yi gnas su 'dren par byed// lha dang mi ru skye ba rnams// sa la gnas pa'i rigs su skye// byang sems rigs su skye ba dag/ bla med go 'phang 'thob par gsungs// de phyir bdun tshigs cho ga bshad// bdun tshigs bar ma'i sbyor ba yi// cho ga mdor bsdus yan lag dang// dkyil 'khor rdzas dang yo byad rnams// nye ba'i 'khor la bshad du gsol// de nas rnam grol de nyid kyis// nye ba'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// 'dus pa'i

'khor tshogs legs par nyon// bdun tshigs mchod pa 'di nyid la// sgrib sbyong las kyi dkyil 'khor bzhengs// dkyil 'khor bzhengs su gsol nas ni// dbus su dpal gyi gtor ma bca'// lan chags gtor ma gong dang mthun// dkyil 'khor de yi shar sgo ru// dri ma de nyid rtsa ru yang// lha bshos mdzes pa bcu gsum bzhag/ shin tu gtsang ma'i gtor ma bzhag/ mchod pa rnams lnga nyid kyang dbul// phyi chog nang chog gzhung bzhin bya// dge ba'i las rnams ci nus bya// tshe 'das nyid kyang byed par bsam// rig drug gnas nas drang ba dang// skye ba med par lam bstan bya// sangs rgyas sras por dbang bskur zhing// zhing khams de las mi g.yo ba'i// rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga bya// de nas mchod chen 'di skad brjod// hU~M gsang ba ye shes mchod chen 'di// gar dang ye shes phyag rgyar gsal// mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor sprin tshogs ni// gnyis med 'khril dang yid bzhin gter// yid du 'od dang mdzes pa yi// 'od zer sna tshogs 'phro ba dang// ye shes sgo dang rab ldan pa'i// ma nyams bkod legs dbyibs nyid dang// gsal 'tsher lhun sdug pho brang 'dir// 'khor bcas rab 'bar gshegs su gsol// oM e h+ye hi sa ma ya mu dra s+t+waM/ oM gdan bting lags so bcom ldan 'das// nyi zla rin chen sna lnga dang// pad+ma rab mdzes stobs ldan pa'i// glang chen rta dang rma bya'i khri// nam mkha' lding dang seng ge dang// nyi zla gsal ba'i gdan bting ngo// sna tshogs yid 'ong gdan bting ngo// sa ma ya pra b+han tsakra tiSh+Tha lhan// hU~M shin tu mdzes pa'i gdan dang ni// rang snang 'od gsal gzhal yas 'dir// bla ma sangs rgyas sras bcas dang// rigs lnga khro rgyal yab yum rnams/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol// pad+ma ka ma la ya s+t+waM/ oM dmigs med mkha' mnyam rdo rje snying po'i sku// AHbcom ldan mgon po rdo rje ye shes sku// hU~M brjod med bsam bral rdo rje chos kyi sku// bya ba rdzogs pa'i 'gyur med sa la gnas// ye shes bcom ldan rtog med chos kyi sku// 'dzin med chos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// oM 'gag med rdo rje'i don nyid 'dzin pa ste// AHthugs rje'i spyan ldan longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// hU~M mu khyud pho brang lnga ldan dkyil 'khor na// sku lnga rtog med so so'i mtshan 'dzin pa// 'gyur med don ldan rigs lnga'i ye shes sku// tshom bu lnga ldan gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor ston// yab lnga yum lnga sku lnga mdun rgyab med// ye shes thugs rje'i spyan ldan longs spyod sku// stong gsal longs spyod sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// oM thugs rje'i stobs kyi 'gro ba pha rol sgrol// AHsku mdog khro bo'i cha lugs gad rgyang can// hU~M dbu gsum thor

tshugs gcig tu bcings pas 'khor rnams skrag/ phyag drug phyag mtshan tha dad bsnams pas dgra bgegs 'dul// sku la chas brgyad gsol zhing ma mo dbang du sdud// thugs rjes 'gro ba 'dam nas 'dren mdzad bcom ldan sman gyi bla// pha rol stobs kyis 'dul ba'i khro rgyal hU~M sgra can// ma rig 'joms pa'i thugs rje'i 'od po che// sna tshogs sprul pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// oM sku gsum don ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi mes// AHthugs rje'i stobs bdag gzhon nu nyid kyi sku// hU~M sku gsum ye shes rdzogs la phyag 'tshal bstod// oM AH hU~M/ bdag cag sdug bsngal chen pos zin pa la// thugs rje'i lcags kyus 'dzin pa sku drin che// bdag cag 'dod pa'i tshad pas gdung ba la// thugs rje'i chu rgyun 'bebs pa sku drin che// bdag cag 'khor ba'i gcong rong dog mor lhung ba la// thugs rje'i zhags pas 'gro ba 'dren mdzad pa// thabs ldan ye shes sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag cag ma rig mun pa'i dbang du 'khyams pa la// rnam dag sgron me 'degs la phyag 'tshal bstod// bskal pa dpag tu med par lam stor bar// sa mkhan rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// dang po'i nor bu ma rnyed rtag tu stor// gzhal yas ston mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// las dang nyon mongs rgyud drug 'khor ba yi// chu bo sgrol mdzad gru la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje sems dpar sprul nas 'gro don mdzad// ye shes mnyam nyid sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho dpag tu med pa nas// thugs rjes 'dren mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// sku mchog 'bar ba'i ye shes rnam par dag/ sangs rgyas thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal bstod// a ti sha badzra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ ho mi gnas pa'i ye shes kyi mnga' bdag rnams dgongs su gsol/ tshe las 'das pa che ge mo 'di byang chub kyi snying po la ma gnas pa'i bar du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku bstan pa/ gsung bstan pa/ thugs bstan pa/ yon tan bstan pa/ phrin las bstan pa mi zad pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku mngon par snang ba dang/ mi snang ba dang/ gsung grags pa dang bcas pa dang/ grags pa med pa dang/ mdo sde dang/ 'dul ba dang/ mngon pa dang/ thugs rtog pa dang bcas pa dang/ rtag pa med pa dang/ rab tu byung ba dang/ khyim pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang/ sems rab tu byung ba dang/ tshul khrims rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa dang/ chos kyi sku thams cad dang/ sprul pa'i sku thams cad dang/ longs sku thams cad dang/ ngo bo nyid kyi sku thams cad dang/ dkyil 'khor kyi lha tshogs thams cad la/ bdag rdo rje slob dpon dang/ tshe las 'das

shing 'phos pa'i che ge mo zhes bya bas/ gus pa'i tshul gsum gyis phyag 'tshal lo// skyabs su mchi'o// skye ba med pa rdo rje'i sku thob par mdzad du gsol/ thabs kyis 'khor ba'i chu bo las bsgral du gsol/ ye shes thogs pa med ba'i spyan lnga bstan du gsol/ lha'i sku thams cad mngon par snang bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas slob dpon gsang ba'i dbang thob pa des/ ting 'dzin la gnas par byas nas/ mchod pa rnam pa lnga la sogs ci 'byor ba'i mchod pa 'bul lo// tshigs bcad gong ma de bar bar la gtang bar bya'o// de nas slob dpon de nang gi phrin las gang yang rung ba gzhung bsrang ngo// dkyil 'khor thams cad gsal bar bsgom/ de nas gong gi mchod pa rnams dang rigs drug gnas nas drang pa'i cho ga yang bya'o// len chags gtor ma'i cho ga yang bya'o// tshe las 'das pa'i rigs kyi bu la dbang bskur ba dang// gnas sbar ba'i cho ga yang bya'o// chos kyi sku'i gnas su brtan par bzhugs par bsam zhing// rigs drug gi gnas nas yang nas yang du drang ngo// mchod pa thams cad kyi sngags ni/ oM pra b+hany+tsa kra tha yA stA/ badzra pU dza ho/ ma hA ka ru Ni kA yA sa ma yA mu dra/ badzra d+hu pe d+hu/ badzra puSh+pe pu/ badzra gan+d+he gan/ badzra nIrti hU~M/ badzra gI tI trIHbadzra tir sa dza ho/ badzra A lo ke hrIH/ badzra ha ha he he hri hri/ badzra ma hA sarba kun la rag sha he/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma yA/ ma hA mu dra A/ de ltar sngags chen de brjod nas/ mchod pa chen po 'di skad brjod/ oM bde bar gshegs so bcom ldan 'das// bde bar gshegs so khro rgyal tshogs// hU~M bde bar gshegs so a ra li// rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i ye shes kyis// srid pa rgyal mtsho mtha' yas kun// kun bzang mchod sprin mchog tu rol// oM a la la ho// rigs lnga khrag 'thung bcas pa la// snang zhing srid pa'i chos rnams kun// kun tu bzang po'i mchod par 'bul// 'gro ba'i don du bzhes su gsol// tshe las 'das pa che ge mo 'di dang/ bdag cag rdo rje slob dpon dang/ mched dang lcam dral 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyi sgrib pa gnyis sbyangs/ tshogs rnam pa gnyis rdzogs nas/ thugs dam rgya mtsho yongs su bskang bar gyur cig/ nyams chag thams cad sor chud par gyur cig/ rkyen dbang thams cad bzlog par gyur cig/ bdud kyi dpung rnams choms shig/ tshe las 'das pa gshed dang bral bar gyur cig/ tshig de rnams ni mchod pa kun gyi bar bar du shes par bya'o// da ni rgyal srid sna bdun gyis mchod pa ni// hU~M mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni// sems kyi yid bzhin sprin tshogs gtib// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad zhing// mnyen 'jam reg na bde ba yis// traM/ sna tshogs rin po che

yi gzhi// mdzes par bris shing spras pa dang// kun 'byung rin chen phung po 'bar// dbyibs legs rdzang bu ro mchog bsil// b+h+ruM/ rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs dang// rgyan dang dpag bsam ljon pa'i tshal// hrIHglu dbyangs tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra// tra/ bla bre rgyal mtshan na bza' gdugs// do shal dpung brgyan se mo do// bza' dang btung ba'i tshogs rnams kyis// rang la mdzes par brgyan pa dang// lha dang lha mo rdul snyed pas// bro gar la sogs bsam yas kyis// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams bkang nas// bla ma dkyil 'khor tshogs la 'bul// 'gro ba'i tshe 'das don du bzhes su gsol/ zhes kun la 'dres don du bzhes su gsol// traM/ zhing 'dir rin chen sna bdun gyis// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams bkang nas// dngos grub 'bras bu 'dod pa'i phyir// nyin re shes rab can gyis mchod// phyi yi sbas pa gsang la sogs// nang gi mchod pa mchog 'di rnams// phyag rgya sbyor ba'i tshul bzhes la// tshul bzhin rgyas par dbul bar bya'o// tshe 'das don du bzhes su gsol// traM rat+na bU dza badzra swa b+hA wa at+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ da ni dug lnga ye shes lnga'i mchod pa 'bul te/ hU~M stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// srid gsum sems can thams cad kun// zhe sdang spyod pa'i las gang rnams// rdo rje rigs kyi las spyod de// dmigs pa sgrol ba'i mchod par bzhes// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// srid gsum sems can thams cad kun// 'dod chags spyod pa'i las gang rnams// pad+ma rigs kyi las spyod de// thams cad yab yum gnyis med sbyor// tshe 'das don du bzhes su gsol// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// srid gsum sems can thams cad kun// gti mug spyod pa'i las gang rnams// bde gshegs rigs kyi mdzad spyod de// tshe 'das don du bzhes su gsol// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// srid gsum sems can thams cad kun// nga rgyal spyod pa'i las rnams kun// rin chen rigs kyi las spyod de// dmigs pa'i dam tshig mchod par bzhes// tshe 'das don du bzhes su gsol// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// srid gsum sems can thams cad kun// phrag dog spyod pa las rnams gang// las kyi rigs kyi las spyod de// dmigs pa'i dam tshig mchod par bzhes// tshe 'das don du bzhes su gsol// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug che// nga rgyal phrag dog spyod pa rnams// rdo rje theg par rab rtogs te// mchog gi mchod par bzhes su gsol// tshe 'das don phyir bzhes su gsol// a la la ho=dug lnga ye shes lnga yi mchod pa 'di phul bas// tshe las 'das pa che ge mo dang/ bdag cag rdo rje slob dpon

dang/ mched dang lcam dral 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyi sgrib pa rnam pa gnyis byang/ tshogs rnam pa gnyis rdzogs nas/ thugs dam yongs su bskang par gyur cig nyams chags sor chud par gyur cig/ rkyen rnams bzlog par gyur cig/ bdud dpung choms shig/ tshe 'das gshed dang bral bar gyur cig/ da ni phyag rgya bzhi'i mchod pa dbul te// hU~M nam mkha'i mtha' klas 'jig rten nas// srid gsum sems can ma lus kun// gzugs su snang ba ji snyed pa// sna tshogs phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor te// sku mchog phyag rgya'i mchod par bzhes// sgra ru grags pa ci snyed pa// thams cad ma lus sngags kyi tshig/ gsung mchog phyag rgya'i mchod par bzhes// sems kyi rtogs pa ci snyed pa// ting 'dzin 'bum phrag bsam yas pa// thugs mchog phyag rgya'i mchod par bzhes// dge dang mi dge'i las gang rnams// thams cad sangs rgyas mdzad spyod de// las kyi phyag rgya'i mchod par bzhes// kun nas kun tu thams cad kun// dngos po la sogs brtan g.yo kun// thams cad rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor te// bde gshegs phyag rgya'i mchod pa bzhes// da ni bdud rtsi'i mchod pa dbul te/ hU~M bde gshegs rigs kyi thugs dam bskang ba ni// dri chen ngad ldan spos kyi bsung mchog 'di// gti mug shes rab 'bar bar byin brlab mdzad slad du// bud+d+ha rigs kyi thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ hU~M rdo rje rigs kyi thugs dam bskang ba ni// mu tig dkar po dri med byang chub sems// thams cad bskyed pa'i rgyu ste 'khor ba 'dzin// zhe sdang bdud kyi rigs rnams zhi bar mdzad slad du// rdo rje rigs kyi thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ hU~M pad+ma rigs kyi thugs dam bskang ba ni// rak+ta zla gam dri med byang chub sems// thams cad bskyed pa'i rgyu ste 'khor ba 'dzin// 'dod chags len pa med pa'i rigs pa ste// sbyor ba rnam par dag pa mdzad slad du// pad+ma rigs kyi thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ hU~M rin chen rigs kyi thugs dam bskang ba ni// sha chen shes rab 'bar ba'i byin rlabs kyis// khams gsum ma lus dbang du bsdus nas kyang// nga rgyal bdud kyi rigs rnams zhi bar mdzad slad du// rin chen rigs kyi thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ hU~M las kyi rigs kyi thugs dam bskang ba ni// rdo rje las kyi chu ste pany+tsa a mr-i ta// phrag dog chen po'i las kyis rgyu sbyang ste// las kyi rigs kyi thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ de nas byang chub sems kyi mchod pa 'bul te// oM dri med rnam dag nam mkha'i rang bzhin la// AHlog rtog mtshan ma mang po'i sprin phung rnams// hU~M ye shes nyi zer 'od kyi rab bsal te// dag pa'i don du rtogs te mchod par 'bul// A+oM dam rdzas bdud rtsi lnga

dang ye shes lnga// AHsku lnga chos lnga'i rang bzhin dbyer med cing// hU~M de bzhin dag pa nyid kyi dag pa nyid mchod nas// chos nyid la yang chos nyid thim par 'bul// shes rab sems ma yum gyi gzhal yas su// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus mchod bkod de// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med sbyor mchod kyis// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor tshogs la mchod par 'bul// A+oM ldan dkar la 'tsher ba'i yon tan las// AHldan dmar la dngas pa'i byin rlabs kyis// hU~M ldan bde chen gar mdzad gar gyi dbang phyug che// bde chen sku la dbang gi mchod pa 'bul// A+oM dag cing gsal ba shel gyi dkyil 'khor du// AHphra zhing mnyen pa gser gyis lug rgyud bzhin// hU~M dbyer med dbyings su gcig pas na// byang chub sems su rtogs nas rig pa nyid la mchod par 'bul// A+oM bkra shis mtshan ldan rdo rje ka pA la// AH'phrul zhal yid 'ong ri mos brgyan pa 'di// hU~M 'od dang du ba sgra dang dri la sogs// dbyings nas bton nas dbyings su mchod par 'bul// tshe 'das don du mchod pa bzhes su gsol// thabs dang shes rab gsang ba byang chub sems kyi mchod par phul ba la sogs pa'o// da ni rmad du byung ba gtor ma'i mchod pa 'bul te 'di skad do// hU~M rnam dag sgrib spangs srid gsum skyon bral ba'i// ston ka'i zla gsal dri med zhal mnga' zhing// bcom ldan bde gshegs dkyil 'khor can// zhi khro 'khor bcas ma lus thams cad dang// dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad bskyed pa'i yum// shes rab lha mo rigs kyi yum la sogs// rnal 'byor sgrub dang rig 'dzin thams cad la// tshe 'das don phyir mchod cing phyag 'tshal lo// mi mnyam mnyam pas nam mkha' khyab pa dang// bsod nams ye shes tshogs kyis rab brgyan pas// yid bzhin sku mchog yon tan mtha' yas gter// shes rab dkyil 'khor ma lus thams cad dang// phyag brnyan 'du 'phro rngam pa'i tshogs la sogs// rnal 'byor chen pos mchod pa mang po 'tshal// dgyes pa rol mo'i mchod pa 'di bzhes la// oM gzhong pa rnam dag chos kyi dbyings// gtor ma ye shes phyag rgya'i tshogs// tshe dang gal gnyis mthun bsdebs nas// rak+ta dmar gyis thig bkye zhing// mi bzung gtor ba'i gtor ma 'di// 'bul ni bla ma lha la 'bul// mchod ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mchod// sbyor ldan tshogs su bkram ste 'bul lags sam// tshe 'das don du bzhes su gsol// oM AHhU~M ma hA ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha ho/ b+ha ling+ta kha kha khA hi/ a la la ho/ rmad du byung ba'i mchod pa'o// da ni gar gyi mchod pa dbul bar bya ste// oM pad+mAn+ta kr-ita ha ya grI ba hU~M/ ru lu ru lu hU~M phaT/ de ni ting

'dzin gsal ba dang/ 'di skad de/ hU~M bcom ldan pad+ma he ru dang/ pad+ma kro d+hI shwa ri la// 'bar ba'i gar gyis bskor ba ni// srid gsum 'jom mdzad dbyings phyug gau ri ma// dam tshig dbyings mchog skul byed tsau rI ma// stong gsum rgyal mdzad rgyas byed pra mo ha// ma lus za byed rder phyar be tA lI// bde chen zhing du 'dren mdzad puk+ka sI// bsgral nas zhal du stobs mdzad g+hasma rI// thugs rje'i 'jig rten sgrol mdzad sma sha nI// 'bar ma stong gsum stongs mdzad tsaN+Da lI// gar dang dbyangs kyi mchod pa 'dis// tshe 'das sgrib pa byang gyur nas// dpal gyi thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ bdag cag g.yar dam bskang gyur cig/ hU~M bcom ldan pad+ma he ru dang// pad+ma kro d+hI shwa rI la// phra men gar gyis bskor ba ni// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal gcod byed sing ha mA// 'chi bdag bdud kyi sde bcom byA g+h+ri ma// dur khrod bgegs kyi tshogs bcom sr-i ga lA// rdo rje bdud 'dul za byed shwa na ma// mgyogs ma khrag 'thung snyog byed gr-i D+ha ma// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal tshe 'phrogs kaM ka ma// yon tan yid bzhin bdag nyid kA' ka ma// 'gro ba'i don mdzad khrag 'thung u lU ma// gar dang dbyangs kyi mchod pa 'dis// tshe 'das sgrib pa byang gyur nas// dpal gyi thugs dam bskangs gyur nas// bdag cag dbyar dam bskang gyur cig/ phra men thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ hU~M bcom ldan pad+ma he ru dang// yum chen kro d+hI shwa rI ma// sgo ma gar gyis bskor ba ni// rta gdong dkar mo lcags kyu 'dren// phag gdong nag mo mche zhags 'phen// nyi zla dmar mo lcags sgrog sdom// thal byed ljang nag dril 'khrol dgyes// gar dang dbyangs kyi mchod pa 'dis// tshe 'das sgrib pa byang gyur nas// dpal gyi thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ sgo ma'i thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ bdag cag dbyar dam bskang gyur cig/ a la la ho// gar dang ye shes mchod pa 'di phul bas// tshe las 'das pa'i che ge mo 'di dang// bdag cag rdo rje slob dpon dang/ mched dang lcam dral 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyi/ sgrib pa rnams pa gnyis byang/ tshogs rnam pa gnyis rdzogs nas/ thugs dam rgya mtsho yongs su bskang bar gyur cig chag nyams thams cad sor chud par gyur cig rkyen dbang thams cad bzlog par gyur cig/ bdud dpung choms shig/ tshe 'das gshed ma dang bral bar gyur cig/ de nas bstod pa'i rgyal po glu ye shes kyi mchod pa byung ste/ 'di skad do// hU~M gtum chen dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar// 'od zer nyi ma 'bum gyis brjid// khro gnyer glog stong 'gyu ba bzhin// mche ba zang yag za byed che ho// hU~M phaT rngams pa'i nga ro 'brug stong sgrogs// thug choms ri rab 'bum snyil skad// a la la yi gad rgyangs

can// bshug pa'i mthor rlung g.yeng ba che ho// hU~M khro bo shes rab 'od po che// ye shes dkyil 'khor kun tu gsal// 'bar ba'i ye shes kun tu 'joms// sna tshogs ye shes thig le che ho// hU~M khro bo'i rgyal po sprin chen po// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor char chen 'bebs// dkyil 'khor yid bzhin 'byung ba'i gter// sna tshogs 'od kyi thig le che ho// hU~M bdud kun gyi ni bdud chen po// bdud kyi bdud ste bdud rnams 'joms// 'jigs pa'i tshogs kyang 'jigs byed pa// 'jigs byed chen po thig le che ho// hU~M rdo rje brag ste sra chen po// rdo rje chu bo sdud chen po// rdo rje me ste kun 'bar che// rdo rje'i rlung ste 'thor rlung che// ho// de yan chad mchod pa chen po'i rim pa'o// 'di man chad tshogs dang bstab pa bya'o// ho he ru+u ka yi gnas chen po// dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad nas// dpal chen khrag 'thung 'khor dang bcas// dur khrod mchog gi gnas 'di ru// zhing chen gsar rnying ti rar bcas// dmar gyi ar+g+ha rgya mtshor bskyil// mkha' 'gro 'bar ba'i tshogs bcas kun// ma lus gshegs nas bsnam du gsol/ A+oM dza hU~M baM ho/ shrI he ru ka i dam/ puSh+pa/ d+hU pa/ A lo kag+han+d+ha khakha khA hi khA hi/ dza hU~M baM ho/ shrI he ru kam hA badzra pra be sha ya/ A bi sha ya pra tits+tsha ho// shrI ba na kha kha khA' hi khA hi/ shrI ban tsa khA hi khA hi/ da ni tshogs bsgral bar bya ste// mche ba'i phyag rgya bcas la 'di skad do// hU~M nga ni za byed chen po ste// khams gsum ma lus bsgral ba dang// gdug pa ma lus 'dul ba dang// sha rus la sogs bza' bar bya// nga ni khrag 'thung chen po ste// 'khor ba'i dra bar chags pa yi// dmar chen bskyil ba'i rgya mtsho la// 'khor gyi phra men tshogs dang rol// ma rungs 'dod la ma chags shing// dam tshig nyams dang dgra chen po// thugs rje byams dang ldan pa pos// ngo mthon stobs kyis bsgral bar bya/ dza hU~M baM ho/ shri he ru ka ma hA sarba duSh+tan/ sa ma ya/ mu dra mA ra kha kha khA hi khA hi/ hr-i da ya/ pi pA hU~M phaT/ dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ shrI he ru ka/ ma hA badzra sa ma ya mu dra/ ma hA mAM sa/ ma hA rak+ta/ ma hA ba su ta/ ma hA pany+tsa a mr-i ta/ kha le kha le/ kha hi/ hU~M b+h+yo hU~M b+h+yo hU~M b+h+yo hU~M b+h+yo hU~M b+h+yo/ de ltar mchod pa'i gzhung rdzogs nas// sdig pa bshags dang gsol ba gdab// rigs drug gnas nas drang bar bya// dkyil 'khor bsdu zhing mchod rdzogs bya// gsang sngags tshig dang dgongs pas bsdu// phyag rgya dang ni sngags tshig go/ zhes rdzogs pa rang byung chen po dbang bskur gsang ba'i rgyud las/ rnal 'byor pa tshe 'das pa'i bdun tshig gnyis pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o////

etext.item:
29
1 rgya gar skad du/ badzra du rli ma hA su ka na mA/ dob skad du/ tshe las 'das pa rnams kyi bdun tshigs tha ma la rang rang gi zas gtad shid kyi rlung chen po zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 'od srung la phyag tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma dbang chen nyid dang/ 'dus pa'i tshogs kyi bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi/ rnal 'byor pa tshe 'das pa rnams kyi bdun tshigs tha ma la/ rang rang gi zas gtad ma'i cho ga 'di gsum so// kye ma 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams nyon// ngas ni snang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bstan gyis// legs par nyon cig// de nas nye ba'i 'khor rnams stan las langs nas 'di skad brjod do// e ma ho// legs so legs so legs par gsungs// bdag cag rnams kyis nges bzungs nas// phyi rabs rnams la nges par bstan// de nas rnal rol de nyid kyis// nye ba'i 'khor la bka' stsaal pa// kye kye 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs/ bdun tshigs tha ma'i cho ga ni// mchod pa gong nas byung ba bzhin// 'gyur med gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs// dkyil 'khor de yi shar phyogs su/ 'gro drug drang ba'i dkyil 'khor bya// maN+Dal nar mi lho byang du// thig ni ling rtse drug tu bya// dang po mu khyud 'bur lnga bri// dbus ni nag po dag tu bya// tha ma gru bzhi lam pa ste// de yi steng na rin po chen// dmigs ni dmar po dag tu bya// tha ma gru bzhi lam pa'o// de yi steng du zlum po yi// kha dog dud kha dag tu bya// phyi rim grub bzhi dag tu bya// de yi steng du thod ris te/ kha dog ljang gu dag tu bya// tha ma gru bzhi lam pa ste// de yi steng du 'dab ma brgyad// kha dog ser po dag tu bya// phyi rim gru bzhi lam pa'o// de yo steng du 'khor lo'i dbyibs// rtsibs bzhi dag ni mdzes pa'i tshon// phyi rim grub bzhi dag tu bya// dang po'i dkyil di yi ge tri nyid nag po'o// gnyis pa la ni yi ge pre nyid dmar// gsum par duHnyid dud kha bri// bzhi par yi ge su nyid ljang gu'o// lnga par a nyid dkar po bri// drug par yi ge n+r-i ser bri// maN+Dal de dag re re la/ gtor ma sna tshogs re re bzhag/ dang por me chu bsil g.yab bzhag// gnyis par rin chen sgrom bu'i gzugs// gsum par shes rab p oti'i gzugs// bzhi par mdung thung go cha'o// lnga par pi wang dung nyid gzugs// drug par gseg shang par bu'o// maN+Dal re re dag la yang// rang rang 'dren sgo'i lam yang dgod// drug pa dag la pho brang lam// thub pa chen po'i gzugs kyang bkod// mchod pa gong bzhin rdzogs par bya// rigs drug drangs shing dbang rdzobs bya// de nas dpa' bo de nyid la// nye ba'i 'khor gyis zhus pa// kye kye gcom ldan dbang chen sku// maN+Dal rim pa de ltar

item.text: dang/ bu ram dang/ spang rtsi la sogs te/ 'dod pa tshims byed kyi ro mchog drug dang/ drug dang/ zho dang/ 'om dang/ dar ba dang/ mar la sogs rtsi thogs sna dgu dang/ gro thug dang/ 'o thug dang/ 'bras thug la sogs te/ bro ba'i ro mchog bzhi dang/ de la sogs te ro mchog gi rnams pa kha ba dang/ mngar ba dang/ bskab dang/ sreg pa dang/ skyur ba la sogs ro mchog sna tshogs pa dang/ zas sna tshogs 'byor tshad kyi zas 'di gtad kyis longs shig/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la sogs te/ dag cing 'byor pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bar bsngo yis longa shig/ oM AH hUM s+wA hA/ lam ba sta b+ha du la yA/ a li u li tA li ta pa li ar+g+haM pra tItst+tsha ho/ zhes brjod cing drangs/ de nas rigs drug drug gnas nas drang shing dbang bskur/ zas sna dang skom nyid 'byor tshad dbul/ bden pa bdar/ chos bshad/ dge ba'i las ci nus bya/ spang skong bklag/ nye'u 'don bya'o// mchod sbyin gyi gtor ma gtang/ mchod pa ci nas bya/ bshags pa bya/ bshags pa bya/ gsol ba gdab/ sku gdung ring bsrel mchod pa bya/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub ses dpa' thams cad dang/ bcom ldan 'das 'das/ pad+ma dbang gi lha tshogs la phyag 'tshal shing/ gsol ba gdab/ de nas dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs kus nas/ dam sri mnan / tshe 'das pa la lam bstan/ gtor ma gtong/ dkyil 'khor bsdu/ phyis ldang mi nus pa'i dbang gis gzir mnan bya/ dkyil 'khor gi zhal bsro/ de nas dkyil 'khor gyis rlog la/ gseg ma'i sa bon btab la/ 'di ma skyes kyi bar du ma ldangs shig ces gzer mnan bya'o// zhes rdzogs pa rang byung chen po'i rgyud las/ rnal 'byor pa'i bdun tshig tha ma pa bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// rdzogs so// // rgya gar skad du/ ma lA sahu su ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ lam ston bsgom pa'i lung zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal gnyis med kyi rgyal po rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang gis bdag nyid la/ nye ba'i 'khor rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye kye bcom ldan pad+ma dbang gi bdag nyid chen po/ sems can 'khor ba las bsgral nas bde ba can gyi zhing khams su lam ston pa'i cho ga bshad du gsol/ de nas dpal chen nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// kye ma nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin// slon dpon gsang ba'i dbang thob des// maN+Dal drug pa'i gzhung rdzogs nas// lam bstan lung ni bstan par bya// mchod pa'i tshogs ni rab rdzogs nas// gsang ba'i slob dpon de nyid kyis// rigs drug gnas nas drangs pa yi// cho ga 'di ni brtsam par bya// maN+Dal zlum po'i steng dag nas// thub pa'i phyag mtshan blangs nas ni// tshig 'dis

sdug bsngal gnas nas drangs// hU~M ma rig 'khor ba'i rtsa ba ste// tshe 'das bya ba rigs kyi bu// 'di la chags par ma byed par// bde ba can gyi zhing du bzhud// zhe sdang 'di yis khyod re bslus// zhe sdang khyod kyi bdud yin pas// dang po srid par 'khyams pa yang// zhe sdang rang dgar spyod pas 'khor// da ltar sdug bsngal spyod pa yang/ zhe sdang bdag tu bzung bas nongs// nyon cig tshe 'das rigs kyi bu// zhe sdang bdag tu ma 'dzin zhig/ zhe sdang bdag tu 'dzin pa na// zhe sdang chen po'i rgyu bsags nas// ngu 'bod chen po'i gnas su 'gro/ sdug bsngal sna tshogs khyod kyis myong/ btso bsreg gnas nas thar thabs med// mtshon cha'i char dang me chen 'obs// 'ching dang 'tshod pa'i las rnams dang// 'gugs 'ching bsdams pa'i las rnams kyis/ yun ring thar ba'i gnas med pas// nyam thag sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur// de las grol bar bya ba'i phyir// bzod pa'i chu bo 'di longs shig/ oM na ra ka tri a su du pre nr-i s+pha ra Na phaT// e ma ho/ rigs kyi bu/ tshe las 'das pa'i che ge mo khyod nyon cig/ 'di nas 'jig rten 'di'i 'og na/ dpag tshad lnga brgya'i 'og rol na/ na rag dmyal ba'i 'jig rten bya ba shin tu sdug bsngal dang ldan pa tsha ba dang/ grang ba'i sdug bsngal 'ba' zhig cher spyod pa/ sems can nyon mongs pa zhe sdang cher spyad pa ltung pa'i gnas yod de/ de ru ci srid lhung srid na/ bskal pa lnga brgya'i bar du thar ba'i thabs med pas// der tshe las 'das pa khyod kyis nyon mongs pa zhe sdang la spyad pa'i dbang gis/ dmyal ba'i gnas der lhung srid na/ zhing khams de 'dul ba'i thub pa gshin rje chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba yod kyis/ de'i tshe khyod kyis sangs rgyas yid la dran pa dang/ chos yid la dran pa dang/ dge 'dun yid la dran pa dang/ yi dam yid la dran pa dang/ ting 'dzin yid la dran pa dang/ rdo rje slob dpon yid la dran par gyis la/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// dmyal ba 'dul ba'i thub pa chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// skyabs su mchi'o// zhes brjod cing skyabs su song zhigade nas yi dwags kyi thub pa blangs nas 'di skad do// hU~M 'khor ba'i rgyu ni ma rig pa// ma rig sems kyi rtsad bcad na// 'khor bar 'dzin pa yod ma yin/ kwa/ nyon cig tshe 'das rigs kyi bu// 'jig rten 'di 'dra sdug bsngal che// bde ba can gyi zhing du bzhud// 'dod chags 'di yis khyod re bslus// 'dod cing chags pa'i las rnams ni// byang chub snying po sgrib pa'i rgyu// dang po 'khor bar ltung ba yang// yid dang chos med snang ba la// med pa yod par spyad pas bslus/ 'dod chags rang

dgar spyad pas nongs// da ltar chags pa chen po yang// 'dod chags yul du bzung bas nongs/ nyon cig tshe 'das rigs kyi bu// 'dod cing chags par ma byed cig/ 'dod cing chags par byas pa na// 'dod chags yul snang dgrar langs nas// bkres skom sdug bsngal gnas su skye// sgrib pa gsum la rtag tu gnas// ser sna'i 'ching ba ma khrol bas/// zas kyis gdungs shing skom mi myong// yid ni gzhan 'gyur 'dug dbang med// yun ring thar bar dka' ba'i gnas// de ru khyod kyi shes pa ldang// sdug bsngal nyam thag myong bar 'gyur// de las grol bar bya ba'i phyir// sbyin pa'i zas nor 'di longs shig/ oM sarba du a su pre nr-i s+pha ra Na phaT/ e ma ho// tshe las 'das shing lus brjes pa'i che ge mo khyod nyon cig 'adi nas 'jig rten 'di'i 'og dpag tshad sum brgya'i 'og na/ bkres ldan chen po zhes bya ba'i// yi dwags kyi 'jig rten yod pas/ de ni 'dod chags shas cher spyad pa las chags pa yin pas rigs kyi bu khyod ji srid der lhung srid pas/ nyon mongs pa 'khor ba la mngon par chags pas ma zhen cig der ci srid lhung srid na/ bskal pa sum brgya'i bar du thar ba'i gnas med do// tshe las 'das pa khyod kyis nyon mongs pa 'dod chags la spyod pa'i dbang gis/ 'jig rten khams der lhung srid na/ zhing khams de 'dul ba'i thub pa kha 'bar ma zhes bya ba/ kha nas me 'bar ba/ phyag na rin po che'i sgrom bu bsnams pa// shin tu bkres pa'i ngang tshul can cig yod kyis/ de la skyabs su 'dong ba'i phyir/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas yid la dran par gyis shigachos yid la dran par gyis shiga'aphags pa'i dge 'dun yid la dran par gyis shigayid dam gyi lha yid la dran par gyis shigating 'dzin yid la dran par gyis shig slob dpon yid la dran par gyis la/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// dam pa'i chos la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// yi dwags 'dul ba'i thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// skyabs su mchi'o zhes brjod la skyabs su song zhigade nas byol song gi thub pa blangs la 'di skad do// e ma gson cig dgongs shig rigs kyi bu// tshe 'das bya ba'i rigs kyi bu// ma rig 'khor ba'i rtsa ba ste// 'khor ba 'di ni gti mug che// 'di na 'dug par ma byed cig/ bde ba can gyi zhing der bzhud// gti mug 'di yis khyod re bslus// gti mug rmugs pa'i rgyu 'di ni// shes rab sgrib pa'i rgyu yin pas// gti mug 'di la ma spyod cig/ dang po 'khor bar ltung ba yang// gti mug myos pa'i dbang gis nongs// da lta rang snang dngos med la// gti mug rang dgar spyod pas nongs// nyon cig tshe 'das rigs kyi bu// gti mug

rmugs par ma byed cig/ rmugs shing thos pa med pa na// thos bsam shes rab ma shes pas// byol song rmugs pa'i gnas su 'gro// rmugs shing dran pa med par 'gyur// gcig la gcig za'i sdug bsngal ni// gcig la gcig za khyod kyis myong// shin tu rmugs par byed pa yis// lus 'di yang yang 'pho bar 'gyur// de ru khyod nyid skyes gyur na// sdug bsngal nyams thag myong bar 'gyur// de las grol bar bya ba'i phyir// shes rab sgrom bu 'di longs shig/ oM sarba pre a su nr-i s+pha ra Na phaT/ e ma ho/ tshe las 'das pa che ge mo khyod nyon cig 'adi nas ri bo chen po'i mtshams bzhi na gling chen po bzhi bar bar na mun pa'i 'jig rten dpag tu med pa yod pas/ de tshor byol song gi rigs stong phrag du ma yod pa// de rnams gcig gi sha gcig gis za ba'i skal pa las bde ba skad cig kyang med par gnas pas/ de ni sems can nyon mongs pa gti mug shas cher spyad pa 'ba' zhig skyes pa'o// de na ltung ba'i gnas yod pas/ zhing khams der ma chags par/ de na byol song 'dul ba'i thub pa/ ru ru rmugs pa zhes bya ba seng ge'i ngang tshul can/ phyag na shes rab kyi po ti bsnams pa gcig yod kyis/ de la skyabs su 'dong ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas yid la dran par gyis shigadam pa'i chos yid la dran par gyis shig 'phags pa'i dge 'dun yid la dran par gyis shigayi dam gyi lha yid la dran pa gyis shigating 'dzin yid la dran par gyis shigardo rje slob dpon yid la dran par gyis shigasnying po yid la dran par gyis la/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// dam pa'i chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// byol song 'dul ba'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su mchi'o// zhes brjod cing skyabs su song zhigade nas lha ma yin gyi thub pa blangs la 'di skad do// hU~M tshe 'das bya ba rigs kyi bu// byol song yul na gti mug che// 'di nas steng na dpag tshad nyis brgya na// lha ma yin zhes bya ba yi// 'jig rten nyams dga' dang re spro// byol song yul du ma 'dug par// lha ma yin gyi gnas su byon// ma rig 'khor ba'i rtsa ba ste// rang rig ye shes rtog med pas// lha ma yin gyi yul de na// gnas pa'i sa med sdug bsngal ldan// de ru chags pa ma skye bar// bde ba can gyi zhing du bzhud// phrag dog 'di yis khyod re bslus// dang po 'khor bar ltung pa yang/ phrag dog rlung ltar 'tshubs nas nongs// da lta mnyam la phrag dog pas// rtag tu rtsod pa rgyun mi chad/ kA/ nyon cig tshe 'das rigs kyi bu// phrag dog 'tshub par ma byed cig/ 'tshub ma thag tu 'dzin pa na// rtsod ldan 'di la rab chags nas// yun ring sdug bsngal khyod kyis myong/ sdug bsngal

nyam thag myong bar 'gyur// de las grol bar bya ba'i phyir// bsam gtan go mtshon 'di longs shig/ oM sarba su a nr-i s+pha ra Na phaTaHhU~M a/ kye tshe las 'das pa'i che ge mo khyod nyon cig gnas la chags pa chen pos/ sdug bsngal khyod kyis myong bar gyur te/ lha ma yin gyi gnas na/ rtsod pa'i sdug bsngal bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ de ni sems can nyon mongs pa phrag dog shas cher spyod pa 'ba' zhig las byung ste/ rigs kyi bu khyod der chags par ma byed cig de na chags pa cher skyes pa na/ de na lha ma yin 'dul ba'i dbang po thags bzang ris byang sku la bsam gtan gyi go gyon pa/ phyag na bsam gtan gyi mdung thogs pa/ lha ma yin gyi ngang tshul can yod kyis// de la skyabs su 'dong pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas yid la dran par gyis shigadam pa'i chos yid la dran par gyis shiga'aphags pa'i dge 'dun yid la dran par gyis shigayi dam gyi lha yid la dran par gyis shigardo rje slob dpon yid la dran par gyis shigasangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// dam pa'i chos la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// lha ma yin 'dul ba'i thub pa thags bzang ris la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su mchi'o// zhes brjod cing skyabs su song zhigade nas lha'i thub pa blangs la 'di skad do// hU~M gson zhig dgongs shig rigs kyi bu// tshe 'das bya ba'i rigs kyi bu// lha min yul na phrag dog che// de na sdug bsngal bsam mi khyab// de yi steng na lha yi yul// nyams dga' dang spro yid 'ong dang// longs spyod sna tshogs 'di na yod// rgyan dang rol mo bsam mi khyab// lha min yul du ma 'dug par// lha yi yul du bde bar byon// hU~M ma rig 'khor ba'i rtsa ba ste// rang rig ye shes rtog med pas// lha yi gnas na 'dug sa med// longs spyod nyid la chags chags nas// ngan song gsum gyi gnas su ltung// de ru chags par ma byed par// bde ba can gyi zhing du bzhud// nga rgyal 'di yis khyod re bslus// lha yi yul na nga rgyal che// dang po 'khor bar ltung ba yang// nga rgyal ri bo brtsegs pas 'khor// da lta nga rgyal spyad pas na// dga' ldan lha yi yul du skyes// longs spyod 'khor la chags chags nas// ngan song 'khor ba'i gnas su ltung/ kwa/ nyon cig tshe 'das rigs kyi bu// nga rgyal rtog par ma 'dzin cig/ nga rgyal rtog par bzung ba na// longs spyod 'di la rab tu chags// longs spyod 'di la chags pa'i
