mthus// 'khor ba nyid kyi gnas su ltung// yun ring thar pa'i gnas mi thob// sdug bsngal nyams thag myong par 'gyur// de las grol bar bya ba'i phyir// brtson 'grus pi wang 'di longs shigaoM sarba a su nr-i s+pha ra Na phaT hU~M A/ e ma ho// tshe las 'das shing lus brjes

pa'i che ge mo khyod nyon cig lha yi gnas 'di na longs spyod 'khor ba'i rgyu la chags pas/ tha ma ngan song gsum du ltung bar 'gyur bas/ rigs kyi bu der chags par ma byed par/ zhing khams de na lha 'dul ba'i thub pa/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin zhes bya ba lha'i cha byad 'dzin pa/ phyag na pi wang dang rol mo bsnams pa gcig yod kyis/ de la skyabs su 'gro ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas yid la dran pa dang/ dam pa'i chos dang/ 'phags pa'i dge 'dun dang/ rdo rje slob dpon yid la dran par gyis la/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// dam pa'i chos la phyag 'tshal lau// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// lha'i dbang po brgya byin la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su mchi'o// zhes brjod cing skyabs su song zhig/ de nas mi'i thub pa blangs la 'di skad do// hU~M gson cig dgongs shig rigs kyi bu// tshe 'das bya ba'i rigs kyi bu// lha yi yul na nga rgyal che// nga rgyal rang dgar spyod pa'i phyir// 'di na cha mnyam byang chub nye// lha yi yul du ma chags par// cha mnyam mi yi gnas 'dir byon// hU~M ma rig 'khor ba'i rgyu yin te// 'di la chags bar ma byed par// bde ba can gyi zhing du bzhud// khong khro 'di yis khyod re bslus// khong khro bdag tu ma 'dzin cig/ khong khro bdag tu 'dzin pa na// dang po 'khor bar ltung ba yang/ khong khro rang dgar spyad pas nongs// da lta khong khro nyid sbyang na// mi yi sdug bsngal chen po 'gyur// yun ring sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur// de las grol bar bya ba'i phyir// tshul khrims phung po 'di longs shig/ oM sarba nr-i tri du pre su a s+pha ra Na hU~M phaTaHA/ e ma ho// tshe las 'das shing lus brjes pa'i che ge mo nyon cig mi'i gnas 'di ni bde sdug gi ra ba chen po ste/ 'di la ma chags par bde ba can gyi zhing du bzhud cig/ mi yi gnas 'di 'dul ba'i shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i zhabs kyi pad+ma las sprul pa'i mi'i cha byad can phyag na gseg shang dang par bu thogs pa de yid la dran par gyis la/ de la skyabs su 'gro ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ 'phags pa'i dge 'dun dang/ yi dam gyi lha dang/ rdo rje slob dpon yid la dran par gyis la/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// mi'i thub pa shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su mchi'o// zhes brjod cing skyabs su song zhigade nas mi'i gnas nas dri ma dkyil 'khor gyi phyi khyams mu khyud kyi steng du bzhag la/ rigs drug gi dkyil 'khor dbye bar bya'o/ de nas slob dpon gyis lam bstan pa 'di skad do// ho rigs kyi rgyal po pad+ma dbang gi sku la phyag 'tshal lo// tshe las 'das pa 'di la

gshed du byed pa dang// sgrib pa thams cad byang bar mdzad du gsol/ ho tshe las 'das pa che ge mo khyod nyon cig shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ mngon par dga' ba'i zhing khams na/ ston pa rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba/ skus 'dul ba'i chos ston to// rigs kyi bu khyod de ru skus 'dul ba'i chos nyon la/ phyi nang gi sgro 'dogs chod la/ bde ba can gyi zhing khams su bzhud cing/ lho phyogs na dpal dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i zhing khams yod de/ de na sprul pa'i sku de bzhin gshegs pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung ldan zhes bya ba yon tan gyis 'dul ba'i sgo nas chos bstan pa gcig yod kyis der rigs kyi bu khyod ma 'jigs par yon tan gyis 'dul ba'i chos nyon cig phyi nang gi sgro 'dogs chod la/ chos nyid ka dag gi zhing khams su bzhud cig nub phyogs na pad+ma brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i zhing khams yod de/ de na sprul pa'i sku snang ba mtha' yas zhes bya ba yod kyis/ des gsung gis 'dul ba'i chos ston to// der rigs kyi bu khyod ma 'jigs par gsung gis 'dul ba'i chos nyon la/ phyi nang gi sgro 'dogs chod la der ma gnas par chos nyid ka dag gi zhing du bzhud cig byang phyogs na las rab yongs su rdzogs pa'i zhing khams yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sku don yod grub pa zhes bya ba yod kyis/ des phrin las kyis 'dul ba'i chos ston gyis// de la rigs kyi bu khyod ma 'jigs par phrin las kyis 'dul ba'i chos nyon la/ phyi nang gi sgro 'dogs chod la/ chos nyid ka dag gi sar bzhud cig byang shar mtshams na stobs rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i zhing khams shin tu yangs pa zhes bya ba yod kyis/ zhing khams de na bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje bya ba yod kyis/ de la rigs kyi bu mthu stobs kyi dbang zhus la/ bdud dang nyon mongs ba zil gyis non la/ chos nyid ka dag gi sar bzhud cig shar lho mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ zhing khams thugs rjes brgyan pa zhes bya ba de na/ bcom ldan 'das thugs rje thams cad kyi bdag po/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhes bya ba yod kyis/ de la rigs kyi bu khyod 'jigs par ma byed par/ bcom ldan 'das de la rdzu 'phrul gyi dbang zhus la/ thugs rje phyogs bcur mdzad cing chos nyid ka dag gi sar bzhud cig lho nub kyi 'jig rten kyi khams na/ zhing khams 'jam pa'i mgon ces bya ba yod de/ de na bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la rigs kyi bu khyod ma 'jigs par chos thams cad kyi spyan khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i dbang zhus la/ snang srid kyi chos thams

cad bshad cing ka dag gi sar bzhud cig nub byang gi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ zhing khams yid 'khrugs pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba yod kyis/ de la rigs kyi bu khyod ma 'jigs par chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid bstan pa'i dbang nos la/ chos nyid ka dag gi sar bzhud cig steng gi phyogs na nam mkha' rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i 'jigs rten yod de/ de na bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i rgyal po zhes bya ba yod kyis/ de la rigs kyi bu khyod ma 'jigs par de la lta ba'i gnas lugs rdzogs pa chen po gzhi'i dbang zhes bya ba yod kyis/ dbang de nos la/ chos nyid kyi gzhi snang la bzhud cig 'og gi phyogs na zhing khams ma g.yos pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs chen po zhes bya ba yod kyis/ de la rigs kyi bu khyod ma 'jigs par/ de la rang rig mngon par snang ba zhes bya ba'i dbang yod kyis/ de las dbang de nos la chos nyid rang snang gi nam mkha' la bzhud cig phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi dbus na/ dur khrod chen po me ri 'bar ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de yang shin tu yangs pa 'jigs shing skyi bung ba/ skrag cing rngams pa cig yod de/ de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang gi rgyal po zhes bya ba yod kyis/ rigs kyi bu khyod de la ma 'jigs par bcom ldan de la rig pa rang gnas kyi dbang zhes bya ba yod kyis/ dbang de nos la/ chos nyid rang snang gi nam mkha' la ma 'jigs ma sngangs ma skrag par song zhigakye ma tshe las 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' khyod nyon cig nub phyogs kyi 'jigs rten gyi khams na bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas kyi zhing khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa yod kyis/ rigs kyi bu de seng ge'i 'gros kyis song la/ glang po che'i lta stangs kyis ltos shigamangon par dga' ba zhes bya ba'i tshal na/ byang chub mtha' yas kyi phugs// seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa zhes bya ba na/ 'phags pa nam mkha' mdzod ces bya ba/ shin tu skyi bung ba gcig yod kyis/ de la ma 'jigs par song zhigade 'das pa'i phyi rol na sangs rgyas mar me mdzad bzang po zhes bya ba brgyan 'od kyi phung po dang ldan pa yod de/ de khyod la snang bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de mthong ba'i dus su skus 'dul ba'i chos ston te/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku mtshan dang dpe byad du ma dang ldan pas/ sku dang gnyis su med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// kye ma tshe las 'das pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' khyod nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu chos chen po snang ba'i thugs rje 'das pa'i pha rol na/ rang rig pa'i snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yod kyis/ rigs kyi bu

der seng ge'i 'gros stangs kyis song la/ glang po che'i lta stangs kyis ltos shigarig pa 'dus ma byas pa'i snang ba zhes bya ba na/ chos nyid stong pa gsal ba chen po'i gnas seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa zhes bya ba shin tu skyi bung ba gcig yod kyis/ de la ma 'jigs par bya khyung nam mkhar lding ba'i 'gros kyis song zhigade 'das pa'i pha rol na/ thog ma'i sangs rgyas 'od mi 'gyur ba zhes bya ba yod kyis/ de khyod la snang bar 'gyur gyis/ de snang ba'i dus su sku gsum dbyer mi phyed pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// chos kyi sku skye 'gag thams cad dang bral bar bstan pas/ sku gsung thugs gnyis su med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sku brtan par gyis shigagasung brtan par gyis shigathugs brtan par gyis shigarig pa brtan par gyis shigades ni skye ba med par thal lo// de skad ces lam bstan par bya'o// gzhan dag gi phung po sbyang yang/ rigs drug gnas nas drangs pa dang/ lam bstan 'di ltar shes par bya'o// zhes rdzogs pa rang byung chen po'i rgyud las/ lam bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ ma hA sa ma ya tra ru pu ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ tshe 'das kyi gdung bsreg pa'i cho ga ro sreg thal ba'i lung zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang gi sku la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas pad+ma dbang gi sku la/ nye ba'i 'khor rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye kye bcom ldan dbang gi sku// sems can bag chags sbyang ba'i phyir// rnam rtogs sbyong ba'i thabs chen gsung/ zhes zhus so// de nas bka' stsal pa/ kye ma rdo rje 'dzin pa nyon// ngas bstan legs par yid la zung/ ro sreg cho ga byed pa na// ro yi khang pa legs byas la// ro ni sngos chu 'o mas bkru// de nas ro de khang par gzhug/ khang pa de yi mdun nyid du// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang pa gcig bya// chag chag gdab cing thig skud brlab// chag chag gdab pa'i sngags 'di'o// oM sho d+ha ya badzra AHhU~M/ thig skud byin brlab sngags 'di'o// oM badzra ka sa ra hU~M trUM/ sa tshon byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags 'di'o// oM AHhU~M swA hA/ de nas dkyil 'khor de nyid la// thig gdab byin brlab rdzogs pa dang/ tshon ni rab tu dgye bar bya// dbus kyi pho brang zlum po bya/ gru gsum mthing nag e ru bya// zla gam rnam gsum dbang chen dmar// zlum po mu khyud bar dag tu// yi ge hU~M nyid bri bar bya// zlum po de yi phyi rim du// pad+ma'i glo bur 'dab brgyad bya// kha dog dmar po dag tu

gsungs// glo 'bur bar ni ljang gus dgang// de yi phyi rim myu khyud zlum// me ri dag na byi bar gsungs// de yi phyi rim gru bzhi ste// sgo dang bcas pa rab tu bri// gru chad dkar po'i steng dag tu// byang shar mtshams kyi gru chad la// rdo rje rgya gram bri bar bya// shar lho'i gru chad steng nyid du// rin po che yi snye ma bri// lho nub gru chad steng du yang/ pad+ma mdzes pa 'dab brgyad bri// nub byang gru chad steng du yang// ral gri ljang gu bri bar bya// sgo ni rigs dang 'dra ba ste// sgo yi kha khyer zla gam la// bum pa rigs dang 'dra ba bri// de yi phyi rim zlum po ste// zla gam bzhi ni dmar por bya// zlum po de yi phyi rim du// 'khor lo rtsibs ni bco lnga bri// 'khor lo'i rtsibs mchan dag tu ni// yi ge phaTaHni re re bri// phyi rim zlum po dag tu bya// rdo rje'i ra ba bcas pa bri// phyi rim me ri dag tu'o// de ltar dkyil 'khor rab bris nas// dkyil 'khor de yi steng du yang// sgrub pa'i rdzas ni tshogs tshad bzhag/ pho brang gru gsum steng dag tu// dpal gyi gtor ma gzhag par bya// mu khyud phyi ma'i steng du yang// gtor ma cha gsum gzhung mthun bsham// dkyil 'khor de yi shar phyogs su// rigs drug dkyil 'khor steng du yang/ sha sna dag gi gtor ma dang// dkar gsum dag gis brgyan pa dang// mngar gsum dag gis brgyan pa dang// chu gtsang dag gis bran pa dang// khrag sna dag gis bran pa dang// bag zan khur pas brgyan pa'o// 'gro drug drang ba gong dang 'dra// phyi chog nang chog gzhung bzhin bya// de nas slob dpon gsang ba des// me yi lha dang mnyam sbyar nas// bcom ldan snang ba mtha' yas bsgom// me yi lha tshogs spyan drangs pa'i// sngags 'di rab tu brjod pa dang// me yi lha dang gnyis med bsam// de nas me lha bzhugs gsol dang// me yi dkyil 'khor gsal gdab dang// me yi lha nyid bsdu ba dang// me yi lha tshogs bstim pa dang// me lha nyid dang dam tshig bsre// me lha sbar ba'i cho ga dang/ de nyid byin rlabs sngags su bshad// de dag thams cad bskyed pa yis// sngags 'di rab tu bya bar gsungs/ oM re ma hA sa ma ya hU~M dza/ oM ma hA shu raM trag raM/ e ag+ne dz+wa la raM/ su raM sarba du ti tiSh+Tha sa ma ya lhan/ e raM dz+wa la raM/ phaT raM/ trag raM/ yam raM/ kham raM/ ma ma ra ga sha dz+wa la raM/ su ma raM/ ke ma raM/ b+h+ruM raM/ s+pha ra Na raM/ saM ha ra Na raM sUr+ya raM/ tsan+d+ra raM/ baM raM/ e ag+ne maN+Dal s+t+waM hU~M swA hA/ oM ma hA sa ma ya mu dra raM/ sarba ya du ling ting/ sang ha ra Na hU~M/ e ag+Ni sde ba su tri raM/ ha ha stam b+ha badzra badzra hU~M hU~M hU~M:oM Ar+ya d+harmA mu dra sa ya d+hu d+hu raM/ yaM raM hU~M phaTaH swA hA/ e raM/ dz+wa la raM/ phaT raM/ trag raM// hrIHraM/ pad+ma kro d+ha raM/ d+haM d+haM/ s+pha ra Na phaT raM/ gr-i h+Na gr-i h+Na raM/ ha na ha

na raM/ da ha da ha raM/ pa tsa pa tsa raM/ hU~M raM s+pha ra Na/ a raM s+pha ra Na/ swA raM s+pha ra Na/ hA raM s+pha raM Na/ oM raM s+pha ra Na phaT=oM AH hU~M raM raM raM/ hr-i da ya raM raM raM/ oM pad+mAn+ta kr-ita raM raM raM/ hu lu hu lu raM raM raM/ ma hA d+harma A/ sho d+ha ya/ ag+ni raM raM/ hU~M a a a/ de ltar sngags rnams rdzogs nas kyang// bdag nyid pad+ma dbang du bsgom// bdag gi mdun du snang mtha' yas// sku mdog dmar po 'od chags bsgom// pad+mAn+ta kr-i ta sgra brjod pas// bdag nyid dbang chen thugs ka gnas// rta mgrin dmar po gcig byung ste// rta skad thengs gsum brjod pa yis// srid gsum me ru 'bar bar bsgom// tshe 'das sgrib gnyis byang bar bsam// de nas dbang chen bdag nyid la// rang bzhin bstod pa 'di skad do// hrIHye shes rig pa nyid las skyes pa'i lha// rang byung thugs rje'i dpal la phyag 'tshal bstod// chos dbyings mkha' la skar tshogs spras pa'i sku// pad+ma he ru ka la phyag 'tshal bstod// zhal gsum phyag drug g.yas na mo// dkar ba'i mdog la bzhad pa che// zhal gsum phyag drug g.yon na mo// dmar ba'i mdog la thig le che// zhal gsum phyag drug dbus na mo// dmar nag mdog la khro gnyer che// dbus na rta mgo ljang zhur la// rta mgrin rgyal po rta skad 'tsher// lhang lhang tser tser phyogs bcur sgrogs// khams gsum ma lus dbang du sdud// spyan nas me yi tsha tsha 'phro// shangs nas 'thor ba'i rlung chen sdang// g.yas kyi rta skad thengs gcig gis// mya ngan 'das pa'i chos kyang ston// g.yon gyi rta skad thengs gcig gis// g.yar dam can la dngos grub ster// dbus kyi rta skad thengs gsum gyis// srid gsum ma lus dbang du sdud// sku mdog dmar nag dur khrod me chen 'bar// pags chen rlon pa'i g.yang gzhi'i sham thabs can// sprul nag stong gis brgyan pa'i gdengs ka can// tshangs pa chen po la sogs lha chen gyi// mgo bcad sbrel bas dbu yi rgyan du byas// thal chen khrag dang zhag gi tshom bus spris// 'jigs tshogs chen po dur khrod rgyan gyi gnas// dpa' bo chen po sgeg chen 'jigs// kha T+wAM rngai'u chung ral gri dgra s+t+wa dang// mda' gzhu mdung zung gser gyi zhags brkyang zhing// thod phreng rgyan du byas shing btsun mo'i tshogs la 'khril// dpa' bo chen po 'bar chen po// lha chen brgyad ni zhabs kyis mnan// klu chen brgyad ni gdan du bting// g.yas kyi phyag brgyad byung ba yis// lha chen brgyad kyi mgo bcad nas// b+han+d+ha brgyad ni rak+tas bkang// rU tra brgyad kyis dkrugs shing gsol// g.yon gyi phyag brgyad byung bas ni// lha chen brgyad kyi snying phyung nas// tsit+ta brgyad ni thabs kyis rol// dgra bo'i zhing chen khra la la// thod rus

rkang rus nyi li li// rak+ta'i rgya mtsho sngo dmar kyi li li// dbang phyug chen po bskyod tsam na// 'khor gyi ma tshogs las la b+h+yo// kang kang chum chum las la 'dus// oM pad+mAn+tA kr-i ta hU~M hu lu hu lu hU~M hrIHdza/ de ltar bstod cing las rnams rdzogs// de nas me lha'i cho ga bya// me nyid sbyangs pa'i ting 'dzin ldan// tshe 'das bag chags bsregs par bsam// phyi nang nyon mongs zad par bsam// chos nyid dbang dang ldan bya zhing// dkyil 'khor lha tshogs gsal bar bsgom// me lha bdag dang dbyer med bskyed// rig pa'i stobs dang ting 'dzin bskyed// rang rig mnyam la ma 'dres bsgom// me yi lha ni spyan drangs nas// me yi sgrib sbyong las 'di bya// sngags 'di brjod cing dbang po brdung// oM badzra satwa hr-i da ya/ badzra pA Ni hU~M phaT/ de skad brjod cing lha gsum bskyed// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod pa'i// me yi mchod pa rdzogs par bya// zhi ba'i mchod pa 'di skad do// hU~M snang srid nam mkha' stong pa'i hom khung du// 'byung ba sna tshogs snang ba'i me sbar bas// mtshan ma sna tshogs snang ba'i me byung ste// rnam shes phung po'i tshogs rnams bsregs sbyangs thim// hU~M dbus phyogs zlum po'i hom khung du// bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad las// chos kyi dbyings kyi me byung bas// gti mug rnam rtog bsregs sbyangs thim// shar phyogs zlum po'i hom khung nas// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' las// me long lta ba'i me byung bas// zhe sdang rnam rtog bsregs sbyangs thim// lho phyogs zlum po'i hom khung du// bcom ldan rin chen 'byung lngan las// mnyam pa nyid kyi me byung bas// nga rgyal rnam rtog bsregs sbyangs thim// nub phyogs zlum po'i hom khung nas// bcom ldan snang ba mtha' yas las// so sor rtogs pa'i me byung bas// 'dod chags rnam rtog bsregs sbyangs thim// byang phyogs zlum po'i hom khung nas// bcom ldan don yod grub pa las// bya ba grub pa'i me byung bas// phrag dog rnam rtog bsregs sbyangs thim// hU~M zhi ba'i me ni dkar la 'tsher// rnam shes dag pa'i zhing du sgrol// tshe 'das bya ba'i rigs kyi bu// khyod kyi ma rig ngas bsgral bas// chos nyid zhi ba'i don rtogs shog/ oM badzra shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ de nas ting 'dzin rab ldan bas/ mar la sogs pa ro bsregs khang bu'i nang du blugs la/ rgyas pa'-i me chog rdzogs par bya// hU~M srid gsum yum gyi b+ha ga'i hom khung du// lhag pa byang chub sems kyi me sbar bas// sprul pa ye shes gsal ba'i me byung nas// skye rga na 'chi'i sdug bsngal bsregs sbyangs thim// hU~M dbus phyogs gru bzhi'i hom khung du// yum chen nam mkha'i dbyings phyug las// de bzhin rigs kyi me byung bas// ma rig rtog pa bsregs spyangs

thim// shar phyogs gru bzhi'i hom khung du// yum chen sangs rgyas spyan nyid las// rdo rje rigs kyi me byung bas// yid kyi rnam rtog bsregs sbyangs thim// lho phyogs gru bzhi'i hom khung du// yum chen mA ma kI nyid las// rin chen rigs kyi me byung bas/ sems kyi rnam rtogs bsregs sbyangs thim// nub phyogs gru bzhi'i hom khung du// yum chen gos dkar mo nyid las/ pad+ma rigs kyi me byung bas// 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog bsregs sbyangs thim// byang phyogs gru bzhi'i hom khung du/ yum chen dam tshig sgrol ma las// las kyi rigs kyi me byung bas// zhen pa'i rnam rtog bsregs sbyangs thim// hU~M rgyas pa'i me ni ser la 'tsher// tshe 'das las la gnas pa 'di// skye med dbyings su sgrol ba'i phyir// rgyas pa'i me yis rtog sbyangs nas// skye med byang chub gnas su bzhud// tshe 'das rnam shes tshogs brgyad rnams// ye shes chen po'i me brgyad kyis// bsregs nas thal ba rdul du brlag/ sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor dam pa 'dis// chos nyid rgyas pa'i don rtogs shog/ oM rat+na e la raM/ de nas ting 'dzin rab ldan pas// zas phud gtor ma'i phud bsags nas// dbangagi me yi mchod rdzogs bya// dbang gi me tshogs 'di skad do// hU~M snang srid rdo rje 'bar ba'i hom khung du// rtog med ye shes raM gyis me sbar bas// skye med rtog pa'i klong nas me byung nas// rnam rtog mtshan ma'i bdud rnams bsregs spyangs thim// steng phyogs zla gam hom khung du// bcom ldan gzi brjid 'od 'phro las// ye shes chen po'i me byung nas// ngar rtog mtshan ma bsregs sbyangs thim// shar phyogs zla gam hom khung nas// bcom ldan pad+ma gsang ba las// kho dog lnga yi me byung bas// chags sdang drag po bsregs sbyangs thim// lho phyogs zla gam hom khung nas// bcom ldan pad+ma che mchog las// 'bar ma brgyad kyi me byung bas// bdud dang mu stegs bsregs sbyangs thim// nub phyogs zla gam hom khung nas// bcom ldan pad+ma las sku las// stong pa nyid kyi me byung bas// dngos po'i rnam rtog bsregs sbyangs thim// byang phyogs zla gam hom khung nas// rnal 'byor bdag las me byung bas// mtshan ma'i rnam rtog bsregs sbyangs thim// dbang gi me ni dmar la dngas// rnam shes brgyad la dz+wa la raM// phung po lnga la dz+wa la raM// tshe 'das las ngan sdig can khyod// dang po 'khor bar ci phyir 'khor// da lta gnas pa ci la gnas// tha ma chags pa ci la chags// khyod ni de las ma grol na// 'khor ba'i gnas las mi thar te// nga yis rnam shes bsregs nas ni// chos nyid dbang gi pho brang du// phaT kyis 'phangs la bstim bar bya// tshe 'das rtog pas bcings pa khyod// chos nyid dbang

gi don rtogs shog/ oM phaT ma e da du phaTaHraM/ de nas ting 'dzin rab ldan pas// dmar gtor phud dang bcas ba blug/ drag po'i me chog rdzogs par bya// mchod pa rgyas pa 'di skad do// hU~M 'byung ba lnga yi hom khung du// gsang ba sngags kyi me sbar bas// stong pa sna tshogs bsdus pa'i me byung bas// 'di yi phung po rnam lnga dz+wa la raM// hU~M ye shes klong yangs 'khyil ba'i hom khung du// dag pa ye shes chen po'i yam shing la// skye med chos sku chen po'i me spar bas// stong pa chen po'i me byung nas// 'di yi yul lnga dz+wa la raM// dpal chen he ru'i zhal gyi hom khung du// 'dzab dang snying po 'phro 'du'i me sbar bas// dag pa ye shes chen po'i me byung nas// 'di yi yul brgyad dz+wa la ram// snang srid yum gyi b+ha ga'i hom khung du// gsang ba ye shes yam shing la// lhag pa byang chub sems kyi me sbar bas// gsang ba ye shes thig le'i me byung nas// 'di yi 'dod chags dz+wa la ram// chos nyid 'gyur ba med pa'i hom khung du// rig pa rtog pa med pa'i yam shing la// ye shes sgron me gsal ba'i me sbar bas// snang srid chos sku'i me byung nas// 'di yi gti mug bsregs sbyangs thim// hU~M rtog med nam mkha' stong pa'i hom khung du// skye 'gro rtsi shing nags tshal yam shing la// sna tshogs ye shes chen po'i me sbar bas// 'di yi zhe sdang dz+wa la ram// chos nyid brdal ba chen po'i hom khung du// sna tshogs mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i yaM shing la// 'dzin med rtog med rang byung me sbar bas// ye shes stong gsal chen po'i me byung nas// 'di yi phrag dog dz+wa la ram// snang stong gsal ba yum gyi b+ha ga'i hom khung du// dag pa kha dog lnga yi yam shing la// ye shes chen po lnga yi me sbar bas// chos nyid yul lnga shes pa'i me byung nas// 'di yi nga rgyal dz+wa la raM// hU~M shar phyogs gru gsum hom khung nas// bcom ldan badzra he ru las// sed+ha brgyad kyi me byung nas// ma rig log rtog chen po 'di'i// glo snying nang khrol dz+wa la ram// lho phyogs gru gsum hom khung du// khro rgyal rat+na he ru las// phra men brgyad kyi me byung nas// mgo dang yan lag dz+wa la ram// nub phyogs zur gsum hom khung nas// khro rgyal pad+ma he ru las// yum chen lnga yi me byung nas// mig dang dbang po dz+wa la ram// byang phyogs zur gsum hom khung nas// khro rgyal karma he ru las// rin chen 'dus pa'i me byung nas// bar du gcod pa'i 'byung po 'di'i// sha dang khrag la dz+wa la ram// dbus phyogs zur gsum hom khung nas// khro rgyal bud+d+ha he ru las// ma mo 'dus pa'i me byung nas// ming dang rus la dz+wa la ram// hU~M khro rgyal rta mchog rgyal po yis// me yi lha dang mnyam sbyar nas// 'di yi mgo lus dz+wa la ram// e la ram/ dz+wa la ram/

phaT ram/ 'byung po dz+wa la ram/ bar du gcod pa'i 'byung po dz+wa la ram/ de nas ting 'dzin rab ldan pas// zas dang gtor ma phud blugs la// me yi cho ga rgyas par bya// 'di skad rab tu brjod par bya// hU~M nga ni ye shes bskyed pa'i lha// me yi lha tshogs spyan 'dren gyis// gnas 'dir rab tu gshegs su gsol// hU~M me yi ma ni gos dkar mo// me yi lha ni snang mtha' yas// me yi gtso bo dbang chen sku// me yi mtshan nyid sreg par byed// me yi yab ni tsha ba che// me yi snang ba dmar la dngas// me yi lha tshogs spyan 'dren gyis// gnas 'dir gshegs la dngos grub stsol// hU~M gti mug nam mkha'i me ni smug nag 'bar// zhe sdang me yi me ni dkar nag 'bar// nga rgyal sa yi me ni ser nag 'bar// 'dod chags chu yi me ni dmar nag 'bar// phrag dog rlung gi me ni ljang nag 'bar// me yi phung po nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// 'di yi nyon mongs lnga la dz+wa la ram// zhe sdang rus pa'i me ni phyogs bcur 'phro// 'dod chags sha yi me ni bskal par 'bar// phrag dog nang khrol me ni kun tu 'bar// nga rgyal chu rgyus me ni nam mkhar 'bar// gti mug khrag gi me ni sa gzhi khengs// me yi phung po bskal pa'i mtha' dang mnyam// ye shes me dpung phyogs bcur rab tu 'phro// 'di yi rnam shes tshogs la dz+wa la ram// hU~M ye shes chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas// ye shes 'od lnga'i me byung nas// 'di yi phung po lnga la dz+wa la ram// stong pa nyid kyi klong dkyil nas// ye shes rnam lnga'i me byung bas// 'di yi dbang po lnga la dz+wa la ram// chos nyid zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// tshom bu rnam lnga byung ba yis// 'di yi yul lnga dz+wa la ram// snang ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas// rigs kyi sku lnga byung ba yis// 'di yi chags sdang lnga po dz+wa la ram// dpal chen he ru ka yi thugs ka nas// ko'u rI ma brgyad byung ba yis// 'di yi rnam shes brgyad la dz+wa la ram// dpal chen he ru ka yi yan lag la// sgo skyong ma bzhi byung ba yis// 'jigs pa bzhi la dz+wa la ram// dpal chen snang ba chen po las// rigs kyi yum lnga byung ba yis// 'byung ba lnga la dz+wa la ram// dz+wa la raM ste mchod par rol// dpal chen gnas su mchod par rol// oM karma tiSh+Tha ya ni raM phaT/ dz+wa la ram phaTaHram/ e la ram/ de nas ting 'dzin nges par bsgom// de nas zan dang phud gtor de// nges pa'i glu chen 'di skad do// hU~M chos sku mkha' khyab dag pa'i byin rlabs las// rig pa'i rgyal po khro rgyal dbang gi sku// sku mdog dmar dngas me yi 'od ldan 'phro// de yi sku las 'od zer rab 'phros pas// ma rig 'joms pa'i me ni sna tshogs 'bar// zhe sdang 'joms pa'i me ni dkar nag 'bar// gti mug 'joms pa'i me ni smug nag

'bar// 'dod chags 'joms pa'i me ni dmar nag 'bar// phrag dog 'joms pa'i me ni ljang nag 'bar// nga rgyal 'joms pa'i me ni ser nag 'bar// me yi bskal pa mun nag glog ltar 'khyug/ dur khrod me ri sna tshogs kun du 'bar// nyon cig tshe 'das rigs kyi bu// sna tshogs me yis khyod kyi sdug bsngal sbyong// shes rab chen po yum gyi me byung bas// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ye shes chen por bslang/ sgrib dang nyon mongs nad rnams zhi bar mdzod// e ag+ni s+phar Na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ a a ram ram swA hA/ de ltar mchod pa'i rim rdzogs nas// bskang gso'i cho ga rgyas par bya// bshags pa bya zhing dbang rdzogs bya// gnas bsrung ba dang lam nyid bstan// gtor ma btang bzhin lha tshogs bstim// me lha bstim dang sngags nyid bzlas// rig pa bskul zhing stong nyid bsgom// chos sku ngos bstan gnyis med bsam// sku gsum gzhi rdzogs rang 'od sku// rang bzhin gsal snang rig pa'i ngang// chos nyid yul dang gsang mtshan 'phod// ming nas 'don zhing las grub bya// dkyil 'khor bsdu zhing sa rnams rlog/ phyis ni ldang med 'dre mnan gdab// dkyil 'khor gso zhing gsang sngags bzlas// rgyu rnams sbyangs shing skye rgyun gcod/ gnas nas spar zhing phaT ces bzlas// shes pa bsdu zhing hU~M gis bskyed// gshed byed bskrad cing gnas lugs bstan// sku gsum brjod cing thig ler gzhug/ zhing khams bstan zhing sku bstan bya// lha yi ngo bstan ye shes dbab// rgyu rkyen dbral zhing rig pa gcun// rang bzhin nyid dang ngo bo bstan// snang ba gsal zhing sgrib pa sbyang// gnyis med lha dang dbyer med bsam// dus dang gnas dang ye shes bstan// sa lam sbar ba rab tu bshad pa'o// zhes rdzogs pa rang byung chen po'i rgyud las// ro bsregs thal ba'i lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ b+har b+hi b+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ dur gdab tsha tsha'i lung zhes bya ba// bcom ldan 'das rig pa dbang gi lha la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di skad ces gsol to// kye kye bcom ldan dbang gi sku// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// sku gdung rten ni gang la bgyi// nye ba'i 'khor la gsung du gsol// zhes zhus so// de nas dbang chen de nyid kyis// gos sngon can la bka' stsal ba// kye ma gsang ba'i bdag po nyon// rnal 'byor ting 'dzin ldan pa yis// dben pa'i gnas su bder 'dug la// sku gdung rten dang mchod rten gdab// bdag dang gzhan gyi don yang rung// mthar phyin nges pa'i thabs 'di brtsam// dbang chen sku dang gnyis med cing/ spyan ras gzigs kyi ting

'dzin bsgom// sku mdog dkar po 'od chags pa// g.yas pas ut+pal phyag mtshan te// g.yon pas skyabs sbyin phyag rgya'o// 'od zer rab ldan bsgoms nas ni// sa rnams byin rlabs ldan par brlab// spyan ras gzigs dbang bskyed pa'i snying po ni// 'di yis sku mdog gsal bar 'gyur// oM e pad+ma d+hA hu ni rtI shwa rA ya/ a wa lo ki te hU~M/ des ni sku rnams gsal bar bsgom// sngags de lan brgyad brjod pa dang// spyan ras gzigs dbang gsal ba'o// de ltar lha dang ldan gyur nas// mchod rten gdab pa'i las 'di brtsam// shin tu gtsang ma'i sa phyogs nas// sa blang mchod rten rgyu nyid btsal// sa nyid rko ba'i sngags 'di'o// oM bai ro tsa na hU~M/ sngags de brgya rtsa brjod pa dang// oM las 'od zer rab 'phros pas// sa yi skyon rnams ci yod pa// oM las 'od byung zhu bar bsam// de nas 'dag pa brdzi ba'i sngags// 'di ni lan grangs brgya rtsa brjod// oM badzra bI ra hU~M phaT/ sngags de lan brgya brjod pa dang// hU~M las 'od du 'phros par bsam// de nyid 'od du zhu ba las// 'dag pa'i dngos po hU~M du bsam// bsam gyis mi khyab hU~M de yis// 'dag pa'i rtog pa sbyangs nas ni// rtog med 'od du rnam par bsam// de nas 'bi 'bi bya ba'i sngags// 'di yi ting 'dzin ldan par gsungs// oM AHhU~M/ yi ge de dag 'od 'bar bsam// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// sku yi yi ge oM du 'dod// gsung gi yi ge AHru gsal// thugs kyi yi ge hU~M yin pas// sku gsung thugs su gsal bar bsgom// de nas tsha tsha gdab pa'i sngags// 'd-i nyid rab tu brjod par bya// oM AHhU~M/ bai ro swA hA/ yA hU~M phaT/ de ltar tsha tsha btab nas ni// rab tu gnas pa'i gsang sngags bzlas// sngags 'dis rab tu gnas pa'o// oM e d+harma shA ta thA ga ta/ yo ni e baM tiSh+Tha lhan/ si ti hU~M hU~M/ des ni rab tu gnas pa dang// lha tshogs brtan par bzhugs par bsam// dbang bskur phyag rgya 'di lta ste// khyung gshog lta bu'i phyag rgya yis// dbang bskur brtan par bzhugs su gsol/ yed+har yin nam// de ltar byin brlab rdzogs nas ni// chu bo dag la tsha tsha bskyal// zhes rdzogs pa rang byung chen po'i rgyud las/ dur gdab tsha tsha'i lung bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// rdzogs so////

rgya gar skad du/ e dub ma bu ri kha ma hA ni su kha nA ma/ bod skad du/ ro langs gser du sgrub pa'i lung zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dbang chen rang gnas kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das dbang chen gyi sku'i spyan sngar/ bud+d+ha he ru kas/ ro langs gser du bsgrub pa 'di smras so// e ma ho// phyogs bcu'i lha dang klu rnams nyon// rnal 'byor gang zhig stobs ldan pas// dben pa'i gnas su rab song la// ro langs gser gyi sgrub pa brtsam// shin tu dben pa'i gnas der yang// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi bya// de nas chag chag rab btab la// phyi nang gsang ba'i mtshams nyid bcad// phyi mtshams gcad par bya ba ni// gnas kyi phyogs bzhi dag tu yang// rgyal chen dag la mtho bzhi ste// gtor ma cha re mtho rtsar btang// shog bu sor bzhi pa re la// rgyal chen bzhi yi sngags bris la// rang rang phyogs phyogs dag tu dgod// de ni phyi yi mtshams su bstan// nang mtshams bcad pa 'di lta ste// khro bo bcu yi sngags kyis bcad// gsang pa 'khor lo mtshon chas bcad// gtor ma cha gsum rab tu btang/ gtor ma cha gsum med pa na// gser skyems dag ni rgyas par btang// chab gtor nus tshad dag tu btang// de ltar mtshams bcad rdzogs pa dang// 'bru lnga'i cho ga rdzogs par bya// mchod rten brgyad ni gdab bya zhing// bshags pa chen po rdzogs par bya// de ltar sngon 'gro rab rdzogs nas// de nas nang du 'ong ba dang// dkyil 'khor chen po de nyid la// thig ni rab tu gdab par bya// rnal 'byor chen po gsum gyis bsgrub// rdo rje slob dpon gsang ba des// rdo rje rgyal pos bu mchog la// thig skud sna ni legs sbyin la// bar snang dag tu 'then nas ni// sring sring lan gsum rdo rjes bya// nub nas shar du kha bltas las// theg gcig dkyil du gdab par bya// de la sogs te thig rnams gdab// de nas tshon nyid rab tu dgye// zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu bzhengs// de yi steng du rdzas rnams bsag/ sgo la gri dang gra bzhir mda'// dar dkar yol ba dag kyang bya// dpal gyi gtor ma byang phyogs su// lho ru ma mo'i gtor ma gzhag/ shar du 'byung po'i gtor ma gzhag/ nub tu phud dang rak+ta'o// de ni dkyil 'khor bstan pa'o// de yang ro de len pa'i tshe// ro langs la sogs gdul bya'i phyir// 'chi bdag gshin rje gnas pa'i sar// sngags dang ldan pa'i mtshon cha brdeg/ de nas ro khur mi de la// myos pa'i chu yis rab myos bya// de nas ro de bsgrub par bya// dkyil 'khor pho brang dbus dag tu// brgyang shing dag dang ldan pa ste// skra bcings thor tshugs rnam gdag go/ rang rang rgyan cha dag gis

brgyan// dang po spos chu 'o mas bkru// de ltar dkyil 'khor steng bzhag la// bsgral ba'i thabs ni rnam gsum ste// tshe 'das don phyir bsgral ba dang// mthu rtsal dbyung phyir bsgral ba dang// nyams chag skong phyir bsgral ba'o// de ltar bsgral bar bya ba'i phyir// bsgrub pa rab 'bring gsum du bya// tshe 'das don phyir bsgral pa na// dbang bskur byin brlab bya ba dang// rigs drug drangs dang lam bstan bya// len chags gtor ma rgyun du btang// tshogs dang mchod pa rgyun mi gcad// dus bzhi'i tshogs ni sna tshogs btang// mthu rtsal dbyung phyir bsgral ba na// bsgrub pa zhag gsum byed pa na// zhag gnyis khro bo phrin las bya// de nas dkyil 'khor steng nyid du// slob dpon gsang ba'i rgya bkrol la// thun dang ral gri mtshon cha bsnams// rdo rje'i lus po nyid la yang// g.yang gzhi dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan// lag tu mtshon cha'i dbang bskur la// ske la ral gri rab btab la// gang la dmigs pa'i ming bris la// dmigs pa rab tu bsam par bya// ma nyes rabs rnams rab tu brjod// de nas mgo nyid chod pa dang// ha ha zhes bya'i sgra brjod cing// bstan pa 'jig pa bsad pa yi// legs so zhes byar rab tu brjod// de nyid 'breg pa'i sngags 'di'o// oM pad+mAn+t-i krit+ta kro ta hu+u lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ hU~M ha ha khA hi khA hi/ sngags de lan grangs brgya rtsa brjod// sngags rnams brjod cing dbang chen bsgom// dbang chen sku nyid gsal ba dang// rdo rje'i ging pho mtshan ldan des// mtshon cha'i tshogs rnams rdzogs pa dang// khro bo 'gying pa'i stabs kyis ni// dkyil 'khor rab tu bskor bya zhing// bsgral ba'i las rnams rdzogs par bya// legs par brjod pa gong bzhin no// rgyun du bgrang ba'i sngags 'di brjod// oM pad+mAn+ta kr-i ta badzra kro ta ha ya grI ba hU~M hrIHgsang ba'i sngags 'di mang du brjod// dbang chen yum dang bcas pa ste// de nas rdo rje ging po des// slob dpon dag la mgo nyid dbul// slob dpon gsang ba de nyid kyis// bde gshegs mkha' 'gro'i thugs dam bskang// de nas tsit+ta dbyung ba'i sngags// 'di skad drag tu brjod bya zhing// slob dpon tsit+ta phyung zhes bsgom// de nas rdo rje bshan pa des// sngags 'di brjod cing tsit+ta phyung/ sa ma ya ta hi/ tsit+ta hU~M 'dus kha dur mA ra ya hU~M/ sngags des tsit+ta drang bar bya// ging ba brtul zhugs ldan pa na// za zhing slon dpon de la dbul// de nas tshe 'das sbar ba dang// dngos grub blang ba'i sngags kyang bzlas// dngos grub len pa'i dus nyid du// ro de langs na dngos grub 'thob// de tshe langs pa de nyid la// bdag nyid dbang chen rab ldan pas// mtshon cha phur pa dag gis kyang// gnas dag tu ni gdab bya

zhing// sngags 'di brgya dang rtsa brgyad brjod// oM hrIHthA sarba siMd+d+ha badzra hU~M/ sngags des dngos grub 'thob pa'o// tshe 'das de nyid spar bya ba'i// sngags 'dis sbyor ba'i lhums su 'phang// oM d+h+raM ka dza e s+pha ra Na phaT phaT/ rigs lnga'i sras su dbang bskur ro// sngags 'dis dbang bskur bstan pa'o// oM swa lam du tring hri ta ya s+t+waM/ sku gsum rdo rje'i skur gyur nas// 'od lnga'i mu khyud bar du'o// 'od zer sku lnga 'bar bar bsam// de nas slob dpon gsang ba des// dbang bskur byin rlabs rdzogs pa dang// sha rnams legs par bsha' bya zhing// 'khor na gnas pa'i bu rnams dang// bdag nyid longs spyod spel bya'i phyir// mAM sa za zhing sngags 'di'o// oM AHhU~M hr-i da ya si ti hU~M phaT/ de ni longs spyod sngags su bstan// mthu rtsal dbyung phyir bsgral ba'o// tshe 'das don phyir bsgral ba na// bsgrub pa tha ma'i nub nyid du// ro yi rgyan dang brgyangs phog la// zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor steng dag tu// kha sbub dag tu bsnyal byas la// rgyab tu thig rnams legs btab la// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor rab bris la// mchod pa'i tshogs rnams rab rdzogs bya// slob dpon nyid kyis sna drangs la// dkyil 'khor ro yi tha ma bskor// pad+mAn+ta kr-i ta dbyangs blangs shing// dbang mchog bro ni rab tu brdung// rgyab kyi tshangs thig steng nas bya// rab tu bsha' zhing dbang rdzogs bya// sngags 'di'i 'od zer rab 'phros bsam// ru lu gar gyi mchod pa'i sngags/ sna tshogs mchod phyir sngags 'di'o// oM ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ sngags de'i 'od zer rab 'phros pas// sku dang gsung dang thugs nyid las// 'od 'phros sgrib pa sbyang bar bya// de nas bya byed zin pa dang// nang khrol rnam lnga mchod pa'i rgyu// mig dang rnam lnga mchod par 'bul// de ni tshe 'das don phyir ro// nyams chag bskang phyir bsgral ba ni// bsha' lugs gong dang mthun pa la// bsgrub pa nub ni gnyis 'das nas// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs nas ni// mchod pa'i yo byad ci 'byor bsag/ dkyil 'khor tha ma rab tu bskor// rang gi yi dam gang yin bsgom// bskang gso'i rdzas rnams gang yod sbyar// bshags pa bskang gso rgyas par bya// longs spyod sngags dang bya thabs rnams// gong du smos pa kho na'o// tshogs dang gtor ma rgyun mi gcad// bar chad bgegs rnams tshar gcod bya// gshed byed dbral zhing lam bstan bya// bskang pa'i rgyu dang sbyar te bskang/ tshogs dang mchod pa'i yo byad la// 'bru dang ting 'dzin ldan pas brlab// ma mo'i thugs dam rtag tu bskang// de ni nyams chag bskang lugs so// de ltar ro bsgrub rab tu brtsam// sngags 'di thams cad 'grub pa'o// oM sarba ka ru Na/ pad+ma badzra pA Ni/ badzra sa twa sa ma ya A

yaHa mr-i ta tir hU~M phaT swA hA// sngags de bzla zhing dngos grub blang/ srin lag mthe bong bar dag tu// dal gnyis mnyam zhing tsit+ta bzung// dus bzhi'i tshogs kyi tshe na yang// dngos grub blangs shing gser du bsam// de ltar ting 'dzin ldan pa yis// lo gnyis bsgrub pa byas pa na// lce nyid gser du 'gyur bar nges// lce nyid gser du gyur pa na// srid la ting 'dzin ldan pas blang// blangs la sprang rtsi'i chu dang sbyar// zhib par btags shing gsang sngags bzlas// de nas kun gyis bgos la bza'// zos na skye med byang chub thob// thun mong dngos grub thams cad thob// zas ni yin la dran pas tshim// lus la gos med gcer bur tshugs// gnyer ma med cing gzhon nur 'gyur// lo ni lnga brgya gzhon nur gnas// de nas tshe 'phos phyir mi ldog/ yon tan de ltar 'byung ba'o// zhes rdzogs pa rang byung chen po'i rgyud las/ thal byed ro langs gser du bsgrub pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// rdzogs so////
rgya gar skad du/ oM sarba pa na re ka d+harma su ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ chos nyid chab gtor gyi lung rnam par bsdud pa zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rta mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das dbang chen de la/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis bskor ba lan gsum byas te/ rgyu bsod nams kyi tshogs la brten nas/ 'bras bu ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pa 'di skad gsungs so// kye kye 'khor gyi lha klu nyon// gang zhig bsod nams 'phel 'dod pas// nga yi bstan pa'i lung 'di nyon// stong nyid rig pa'i stobs ldan pas// dben pa'i gnas su bder 'dug la// rig pa'i ye shes rang snang kyang// tshogs 'di bsags pas byang chub nye/ nga dang bdag tu ma 'dzin cing// stong nyid gsal bar rab bsgoms te// nges don chos spyod 'di bstan bya// rdzogs chen man ngag lung ldan pas// snod bstan pa dang bcud nyid bstan// mgron dang yon tan rgyas par bstan// sngags dang phyag rgya ting 'dzin bstan// rnam pa bdun ldan rnam 'byor pas// 'jam dpal snying po bsdus pa 'di// nyams dga' ba yi phyogs dag tu// rin po che yi snod dag gam// rab tu gtsang ba'i snod dag tu// chu gtsang 'o ma sbyar la blug/ rin po che dang tsan dan brdar// me tog 'bru dang sman gyis brgyan// gtsang ma'i sman dang phye la

sogs// ka ti dang ni pu tsa dang// dbang dang na ga sman gyi tshogs// ci 'byor pa yis snod dgang ngo// de ltar snod nyid rab gtams la// 'phags pa spyan drangs mchod pa 'bul// byang chub sems bskyed byams pa bsgom// 'gro la phan gdags snying rje bsgom// blta ba gsal gdab dga' ba bskyed// phyogs med rang gsal btang snyoms te// 'bras bu rang grol dmigs med do// de ltar sngon 'gro rdzogs nas ni// bdag nyid rnal 'byor thugs ka nas// yi ge a gcig chad pa las// bdag la sogs pa'i snod bcud ni// stong zhing bdag med chen por bsgom// de nas a de spar gyur pas// rin chen snod du phog par bsam// de rnams 'od du zhu ba las// snod kyi 'jig rten thams cad dang// gtor snod dri ma sbyang bar bya// de nas a de slar 'dus nas// gtor ma'i snod la thim gyur pas// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten khams// bdud rtsi dag gi rang bzhin du// mer gyis zhu nas gang bar bsam// de nas ting 'dzin rab ldan pas// a yi rang bzhin de nyid las// rang rang yi dam lha nyid kyi// sa bon gang yin gyur par bsam// de nas yi dam med pa na// wA gI shwa rar gyur par bsam// de nyid 'od du zhu ba las// 'jam dpal sku mdog gsal bar bsgom// bdag dang gnyis med gnas pa la// sangs rgyas zhing khams rab 'byams su// 'jam dpal sku ni grangs med bsam// yi dam snying po gang yin pa// bdag gi thugs kar thim gyur nas// bdag nyid yi dam lha ru bskyed// bdag nyid ting 'dzin gsal ba dang// yi dam snying po gang yin pa// yi ge dza ru gyur par bsam// de nyid 'od du zhu ba las// dza yis stong gsum gang bar bsgom// de dag rab tu 'phros pa las// 'phags pa spyan drangs 'gro drug bkug/ mgron rnams rab tu bkug pa dang// 'phags pa dkon mchog gsum po dang// de bzhin gshegs dang rgyal ba rnams// nam mkha' dag la lhags par bsam// ma mo mkha' 'gro chos skyong rnams// bar snang khams su khengs par bsam// 'gro ba rigs drug sems can rnams// sa gzhi rab tu khengs par bsam// de ltar mgron rnams spyan drangs la// sngags 'dis mgron rnams tshim par bsam// rigs kyi bu de ni 'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/ ma hA A be sha ya a/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ b+ha sa li/ dz+wa la ya/ sarba a mr-i ta kun+d+ha l-i ha na ha na hU~M/ sarba pre ta mud ta siM hU~M/ sngags de lan bdun brjod par bya// rdzogs chen phyag rgya gcig par 'bul// yongs su dag dang ma dag pa'i// thams cad 'dod pa bskang bar bsam// dang po 'phags pa dkon mchog mchod// gnyis pa dpal dang ma mo dang// chos skyong

srung ma la sogs mchod// gsum pa 'jig rten 'go lha mchod// bzhi pa rgyal chen bzhi rnams dang// tshangs pa brgya byin lha rnams dang// gza' dang rgyu skar thams cad mchod// lnga pa len chags mgron la'o// drug pa yi dwags mgron rnams mchod// bdun pas thams cad tshim par byed pa'o// de ltar bsngo ba rnams rdzogs nas// bsngo dang chos kyi sbyin pa btang// ye shes lnga yi 'od zer ni// dbang po lnga yi 'phro 'du las// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ldan pas// lha yi longs spyod lngar ldan zhing// thams cad tshims byed bdud rtsi 'dis// dkon mchog yon tan thams cad dang// rigs lnga sras dang yum du bcas// dbang chen lha tshogs thams cad dang// yi dam lha dang slob dpon dang// dpal dang ma mo mkha' 'gro dang// chos skyong srung ma 'khor bcas dang// dkyil 'khor lha tshogs kun la bsngo// srid pa'i mgron du gyur ba yi// rgyal chen bzhi dang gtsang rigs lha// tshangs pa brgya byin 'khor dang bcas// nye ba'i lha dang gza' rnams dang// sred med bu dang rgyu skar dang// phyogs skyong 'khor dang bcas la 'bul// len chags mgron la bsngo ba ni// mkha' la rgyu dang bar snang rgyu// ri rab gnas dang ngos la gnas// rgya mtshor gnas dang gling la gnas// sa dang chu la gnas pa dang// yid kyis 'gro dang gzugs kyis 'gro// lha klu gnod sbyin dri za dang// 'byung po'i tshogs dang sha za dang// gzugs can dang ni gzugs med dang// lto 'gro dang ni rkang 'gro dang// mi'am ci dang yi dwags dang// byol song rigs dang na rag dang// yi dwags rnams la zas dang skom// thogs pa med par 'byung 'gyur shog/ de dag rnams la ci rigs pa// rang rang 'dod pa tshim gyur cig/ kun kyang gnod pa ma byed par// longs spyod lnga dang ldan gyur cig/ ces rdzogs pa rang byung chen po'i rgyud las/ chab gtor gyi man ngag mchod pa longs spyod kyi le'u ste bcu pa'o// rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ sarba ma na ya su ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ thams cad zlog byed mtshon cha'i lung zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das stobs kyis rnam par 'joms pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rta mchog gis/ bar chad thams cad zlog pa 'di gsungs so// kye kye gsang sngags 'chang ba'i rigs// legs par nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin// bar chad thams cad bzlog 'dod na// nga yi gsang sngags 'di la zhugs// gsang sngags bzlas pa brtson 'dod na// dben pa'i gnas su rab phyin la// rang nyid yi dam lhar bskyed la// dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom// nyi zla gsal ba'i dal bskyed

cing// rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs ka'i dal// oM badzra satwa hU~M/ sngags de rab tu gsal bar bskyed// thugs ka'i dal gyi steng dag du// yi ge hrIH'bar bzhi bskyed de// de ltar rab tu gsal bar bskyed// de nas bskyed pa'i sngags 'di bzlas/ oM pad+mAn+ta kr-ita badzra ma hA kro ta ha ya grI ba hU~M/ gsang sngags de nyid bzlas pa yis// hrIHbzhi 'od du rab zhu nas// yi ge gsum ni zhal gsum ste// bcom ldan dbang chen de nyid ni// g.yas dkar g.yon sngo dbus ljang zhal// hrIHgsum steng du chags pa las// rta mgo ljang gu gsum du bsam// rta skad drag tu 'tsher bar bsam// g.yas g.yon dang po lcags sgrog 'dzin// g.yas kyi bar ma ral gri la// dgra sta dag ni tha ma'o// g.yon gyi bar mas gshol lam gtan// tha mas tho ba rab tu bsnams// zhabs bzhis sa bdag klu dbang gnon// sbrul dang thod pa'i rgyan cha ldan// dur khrod rgyan chas rnam pa'o// de ltar gsal bar bsgom pa'o// shin tu gsang ba'i sngags 'di'o// oM pad+mAn+ta kr-i ha ya g+h+ri ba hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ gsang sngags de nyid bzlas pa yis// rta mgrin bsam gyis mi khyab pas// sa gzhi bar snang gang bar bsam// stong gsum 'jig rten khengs pa'o// de ltar rab tu bsam rdzogs nas// dbang chen gsang ba'i thugs ka ru// phyag na rdo rje gsal bar bsgom// sku mdog sngon po zhal gcig pa'o// de ltar lha gsum bsgom byas la// klu la sogs pa'i gdon rnams bskrad// mchod pa'i las rnams ci nus bya// shin tu dben zhing nyams dga' bar// rnal 'byor dge sbyor don la brtson// gang dag mi yi rigs rnams la// sa bdag la sogs gdon zhugs na// de dag bcos shing bskrad pa'i thabs// brtag pa dag dang bcas 'di'o// kha dang sna dang mig dag dang// dbang po lnga nas zhugs pa dang// mgo dang rkang pa lag pa dang// yan lag lnga la 'jug pa'i sa// gsang ba'i gnas dang snying ga dang// pho kha smin phrag pus mo ni// klu rnams 'jug pa'i gnas su bshad// dbang po lnga la zhugs pa dang// 'bras bu sna rtser 'byung bar nges// rang ngam gzhan dag gang zhugs kyang// de nyid rab tu bcos pa'i thabs// sngags kyis bcos dang rdzas kyis bcos// sngags kyis gso ba 'di lta ste// gsang sngags gong ma'i rjes dag tu// drag sngags 'di nyid btags la bzlas// oM badzra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hU~M phaT/ sngags de rab tu bzla bya zhing// dang po zhi bas thar bya zhing// de yis thar bar ma gyur na// bgegs rnams bskrad pa'i sbyor ba bya// bag zan bzang po dag la yang// rmi lam dag tu gang byung ba'i// gzugs brnyan rgyas par bya ba'o// phyi dang nang gi nad rnams kyang// tsha grang gnyis las ma 'das

phyir// bdag gam gzhan dag bsrung ba yis// gang yang rung ba'i mi de la// grang ba'i nad dang ldan pa la// gzugs de sngo skya dag gis byug/ bal nag skra tshugs thur du'o// tsha ba'i nad nyid shas che na// gzugs kyi kha dog dmar ser te// ral pa skra tshugs gyen la bsgreng// bdag nyid bsrung ba byed pa na// bdag gi mal gyi 'og tu yang// gru gsum dag ni gting du brko// khru gang gting la thur du bya// chur la khru gang tshad du bya// khru yi ngos la khru byed tshad/ dur khrod sol bas nag por byug/ dong gi nang du gzugs brnyan gzhag/ dur khrod thal bas byugs la shing gis kha yang bcad// shing la ri rab 'khor yug bri// de yi steng du mal bcas la// rnal 'byor lha dang ldan pa yis// gsang sngags bzlas shing gnan par bya// gzhan gyi lus bsrung byed pa na// dkyil 'khor steng du gzugs de bzhag/ phyag na rdo rje'i gzi brjid kyis// nad pa'i lus kyi gdon bsdus nas// rma bya mdongs dang ldan pa'i sgros// nad pa'i lus la byab bya zhing// gzugs brnyan de la bstims par bya// bal nag skud pa sum bsgril gyis// nad pa'i lus la bskor bya zhing// gzugs brnyan dag gi lus la bcings// de nas lha yi dkyil 'khor sogs// zhag dgu bsgrub pa byas nas ni// lho'am nub tu sbyin bsreg bya/ gsang sngags bzlas pa nus tshad bya'o// phur pa dag dang rdo rje yis// gzugs de dum bur gtub bya zhing// bcom ldan me lha'i tshogs la 'bul// de nyid la ni brgya rtsa bya// des ni gdon las thar bar 'gyur// rdzas ni gu gul mu zi dang// gla rtsi chu dag gnyis su sbyar// rang gi dri chus chu byas la// lus la byugs pas 'byung po 'bros// des ni 'byung po'i gdon las thar// yan lag dag la zhugs pa la// 'bras bu rtsi log sha ro 'byung// gdon de nyid las thar ba'i thabs// gsang sngags gong dang 'dra ba las// mu zi tshil chen sha chen dang// gla rtsi ba bla ti tsha dang// yungs kar dur khrod thal ba sbyar// de la gsang sngags gdab bya zhing// dus bzhir lus la byugs bya zhing// chu gtsang sngags btab ltor btang zhing// mu zi gu gul dud pa yis// sna bug dag nas bdug par bya// sbrul dang sbal ba lcong mo dag/ kha dang sna nas thon par bsam// de ltar sbyor ba rab byas na// zla ba gsum gyis gdon las thar// gnas lnga dag tu zhugs pa na// 'bras bu smin ma byi bar nges// de las thar bar bya ba'i thabs// gsang sngags dag ni sbyor ba brtsam// gdon rnams thams cad 'joms byed pa'i// drag sngags gsang ba 'di nyid bstan// oM badzra krota h+ya g+h+rI ba nI laM/ badzra pA Ni mA ra ya myogs myogs/ nA ra ya sod sod// mA ra ya gtogs shig/ zung

zhag rab tu sod/ mA ra ya sod mA ra ya dza dza/ drag sngags de ni rgyun du bgrang// lha gsum yid la gsal ba yis// sngags de rgyun du bzlas na ni// 'byung po thams cad skrag par nges// bdun 'bum dag gis rab tu 'grub// dgra bgegs gang yang rung ba rnams// zla ba gsum gyis tshar gcod 'gyur// rma ni gang du byung ba der// sngags gdab mchil ma byugs par bya// de ltar rtag tu byas pa na// gnas lnga'i gdon las thar bar 'gyur// de ni gdon gyi gnas srung ste// gdon rnams 'jug pa'i gnas rnams ni// rnam pa bco lnga dag gis bshad// de dag gong du smos pa bzhin// 'jug sgo'i gdon las thar ba'o// yi dwags gdon 'di bsam yas kyang// rigs ni rnam pa gsum du 'dus// klu la sogs pa'i sa gdon dang// sha khrag mchod par 'dod pa'i rigs// 'byung po dur khrod gnas pa'i rigs// rnam pa gsum du nga yis bshad// 'jug pa'i gnas ni rnam pa gsum// rtsa dang khrag la 'jug pa dang// pags pa rus la 'jug pa dang// snying dang mgo la 'jug pa ste// de rnams gdon ni zhugs pa'i rtags// bdag gam gzhan bsrung skyes bu de// snga ma'i bzhin dang mdog dag las// bzhin mdangs med cing bsam pa chung// spyod pa gzhan du 'gyur ba ni// gang dag mdzes par spyod kyang rung// mi mdzes pa yi spyod kyang rung// dge dang mi dge'i spyod yul ni// 'phral gyis rkyen dbang ma yin na// gdon gyis zin pa'i mtshan mar bstan// de ltar gyur ba'i mi de la// zhi ba'i gtor mas mchod par bya// de nas bgegs de ma bskrad na// nad de 'phel nas ma rungs byed// de yang rang rang brtags pa ni// klu yi rigs kyis zin pa na// nad rnams grang bar 'byung bar nges// lus dang yan lag sbrid cing rengs// nad rnams lji zhing lus sems g.yengs// da ltar zhugs pa'i rtags rnams ni// klu yi gdon gyis zin par nges// ma mo'i gdon gyis zin pa na// tsha ba'i nad du 'byung bar nges// sems dang lus ni lji bas zin// dran pa nyams shing shed kyang rmugs// de ltar nad kyis zin pa na// ma mo'i gdon gyis zin par nges// 'byung po ro langs gdon rnams dang// rgyal po la sogs gdon rnams ni// sna tshogs gdon gyis zin gyur na// glo bur nad ni sna tshogs 'byung// de ltar nad kyis zin gyur na// 'byung po'i gdon rnams yin par nges// de ltar rnam gsum gdon dag ni// rang rang gnas su zhi ba'i thabs// klu yi gdon gyis zin pa la// chab gtor gtsang ma'i gtor mas mchod// ma mo'i nad kyis zin pa na// zhi ba'i sbyin sreg sha khrag mchod// khrag dang bcas pas mchod par bya// 'byung bo'i nad kyis zin pa la// kha

zas sna tshogs gtor mas mchod// de yis thar bar ma byung na// drag po'i sbyor ba brtson par bya// zhi rgyas dbang drag mngon spyod pa'i// las ni ci rigs sbyor ba brtsam// des ni gdon las thar bar 'gyur// klu yi gdon la rigs lnga ste// rgyal rigs dang ni bram ze'i rigs// rje'u rigs dmangs rigs gdol ba'i rigs// klu rigs lnga yi gdon dag ni// 'jug pa'i sgo ni rnam pa lnga// gnas ni rnam pa lnga ru gnas pa'o// gab pa'i yul ni rnam pa lnga// de ltar gnas pa'i rgyu brtags dang// rnam smin rig dang gsor rung brtag/ rgyal rigs klu yi 'jug sa ni// spyi bo'i gtsug nas 'jug par nges// de nyid brtag pa rab tu gces// mi yi rigs dang klu yi rigs// sbyar nas brtags pa 'di ltar bya// zhugs ni zin pa'i brtags pa dang// phyis ni 'jug tu 'gro ba brtag/ spyi gtsug thegs pa'i rtags rnams ni// gsang ba'i gnas su 'byung bar nges// gnas pa'i sa ni mgrin pa'o// gab pa'i sa ni snying ga'o// rgyal rigs klu yis zin pa de// snying ni mi dga' 'gro snying 'dod// ri bos mnan snyam byed pa'o// dmangs rigs dag gi mi dag la// rgyal rigs klu yi rtags rnams byung ba na// mi de mi thar stong nyid bsgom// rgyal rigs rje'u rigs mi dag la// gong gi rtags de byung ba na// sngags dang rdzas kyi bsrung ba 'bad// des ni gdon las thar bar 'gyur// bram ze'i rigs dang gdol ba la// rgyal rigs klu yi thebs gyur na// drag po'i las byas thar bar 'gyur// de dag rgyal rigs gdon gyi brtags pa'o// rje rigs klu yi brtags pa ni// 'jug pa'i sgo ni smin brag go/ smin pa'i 'bras bu mig la'o// glo bar gnas zhing za bar byed// gab pa'i yul ni rus pa khol// rje'u rigs klu yis zin pa'i mi// smin ma za zhing 'phrug par byed// lus la rma dang skrangs pa 'byung// rus pa khol zhing na tsha che// de ltar byung pa'i mi de yang// rje'u rigs klu yis zin par nges// cho ga'i sbyor ba 'bad par bya// rgyal rigs mi la zin gyur na// yun ring bar du mi thar bas// dbang dang bsgrub pa chen po dang// rigs sngags rgyun du bzlas pas thar// dmangs rigs mi la zhugs pa na// zhi ba'i las rnams brtsams pas 'grub// rje'u rigs mi la zhugs pa na// drag po'i sngags dang sbyin sreg gis// myur du bgegs las thar bar 'gyur// bram ze'i rigs la zhugs pa na// gsang sngags bzlas zhing lha bsgom pas// myur du gdon las thal bar 'gyur// gdol ba'i rigs la zhugs pa na// chu yi hom dang gtor mas 'grub// des ni rje'u rigs gdon las thar// bram ze'i rigs kyi klu rnams ni// zhugs pa'i brtag pa 'di ltar ro//

'jug pa'i sgo ni gsang ba'i gnas// 'bras bu smin pa'i sa nyid ni// lus la sha bkra shu+u ba 'byung// mchin par gnas shing khrag la za// gab pa'i sa ni sha mthong bas// bram ze'i rigs kyi rtags rnams ni// kha sna skam zhing chu dad che// sna nas khrag ni rgyun du 'byung// gzhogs ni g.yas pa na ba dang// phyis ni rkang la zha bar nges// mig gi bkrag dang sha bkrag shor// shes pa nyams pa'i rtags rnams ni// bram ze'i rigs kyis zin par nges// rgyal rigs mi la zin gyur na// rab tu thar bar dka' bar nges// dmangs rigs mi la zin gyur na// spos dang tsan dan dri zhim dang// chu gtsang chu yis sbyar byas la// nad pa'i lus rnams bkrus byas pas// zla ba drug nas thar bar nges// rje'u rigs mi la zin gyur na// drag po'i las rnams brtsams pas 'grub// bram ze'i rigs rnams zin gyur na// sngags dang phyag rgya bstan pas 'grub// gdol ba'i rigs rnams zin gyur na// mnan dang sbyin sreg byas pas 'grub// de ltar sbyor ba rab byas na// bram ze'i rigs las thar bar 'gyur// dmangs rigs gdon gyi brtag thabs ni// 'jug sa mig la 'jug par nges// mkhal mar gnas zhing rtsa la za// gab pa'i sa ni tshigs pa'o// mig rtsa dmar zhing gsus pa che// smin pa'i sa ni rkang mthil lo// tshigs pa na zhing dran pa nyams// tshig pa za zhing nyams mi dga'// phyis ni kyog por 'gro bar nges// ngo bkrag 'chor yang so yang dkar// phyis ni mdze ru 'gro bar nges// de rnams rtags dang ldan pa la// dmangs rigs gdon du rig par bya// rgyal rigs mi la zin pa na// sna tshogs sbyor ba byas pa yis// myur du gdon las thar bar 'gyur// rje'u rigs mi la zin pa na// bdag nyid dbang chen 'bar bar bsgom// shin tu khros pa'i ngang du gsal// dbu gsum phyag brgyad zhabs bzhi 'jigs// rta mgo gsum ni drag tu 'tsher// sku mdog sngo nag rab tu 'jigs// dur khrod rgyan gyis sku la brgyan pa'o// g.yas kyi dang po kha T+wAM ga/ bar ma rnge'u chung rab tu 'dzin// de yi 'og mas ral gri phyar// tha ma gnyis ni mda' gzhu 'geng// g.yon gyi dang po mdung thung ngo// 'og mas gser gyi zhags pa brkyang// de yi 'og ma be con bsnams// g.yas kyi zhabs brgyad lha chen mnan// g.yon gyi zhabs brgyad klu brgyad brdzis// de ltar gsal bar bsgoms nas ni// rigs gsum khro bo mdun du bsam// gsang sngags bzlas pa rdzogs pa yis// dmangs rigs gdon las thar bar 'gyur// gdol ba'i rigs kyi rtags rnams ni// 'jug pa'i sgo ni rkang mthil nas// gnas ni mcher par gnas pa la// rtsa rnams la yang za bar byed// gab pa'i sa ni chu rgyus

na// 'bras bu smin ma mtshul khung ste// na tsha rab tu che ba dang// lus la khu 'phrigs mang po 'ong// sog phrag dag ni 'khyug pa dang// skabs su gro 'khyug tshig pa za// shes pa 'thib cing nyal la dga'// kha zas dag ni skyugs par byed// phyis ni tshogs su chad par nges// rtags ni de dang ldan pa na// gdol rigs klu yis zin par nges// nad kyang glo bur thug gis 'ong// de la bcos zhing bskrad pa'i thabs// 'di ltar rab tu brtsams par bya// rgyal rigs la sogs mi rnams la// gnon par byed pa'i bgegs bskrad pa// zhi rgyas dbang drag rdzogs par bya// de ltar sbyor ba rab byas na// gdol rigs klu las thar bar 'gyur// klu rigs lnga yi gdon rnams ni// rgyal rigs dag gis zin gyur na// thar bar dka' zhing nad kyang 'ong// drag po'i sbyor bas bskrad par bya// drag po'i las kyis ma thar na// zhi rgyas spyod pa'i las kyis bskrad// rje'u rigs klu yis zin gyur na// nad kyi dpyad ni gsum 'ong ste// de dag dang po bcos pa'i thabs// dang po bden bdar zas kyis mchod// des kyang phan par ma gyur na// drag po'i las la nan cher bya// bram ze'i rigs kyis zin gyur na// dang po khrus dang gtsang mchod// des kyang phan par ma gyur na// zhi ba'i las la phal cher 'bad// dmangs rigs gdon gyis zin pa na// zas dang gtor mas mchod par bya// des kyang phan par ma gyur na// rgyas pa nyid la 'bad par bya// gdol ba'i rigs kyis zin gyur na// dang po chu yi hom khung bya// de yis phan par ma gyur na// dbang gi sbyin sreg rdzogs par bya// rigs lnga klu yis zin gyur na// dang po zhi ba'i sbyor ba bya// chab gtor dang ni 'o mas mchod// chab gtor rgyas par bya ba ni// mtsho yi chu dang lteng ka'i chu// lu ma'i chu dang rdzing bu'i chu// khron pa'i chu dang 'bab pa'i chu// chu sna tshogs tshad blangs la yang// shin tu gtsang ba'i snod du blug/ ba dmar dag gi 'o ma dang// me tog mdzes pas brgyan par bya// sa bzang dang ni gu gul dkar// klu sman sna tshogs dag dang ni// bag zan dag dang sbyar bya zhing// klu yi gzugs ni sna tshogs bya// chu de'i nang du gzhug par bya// pad+ma 'dab brgyad dkar po ste// ge sar chu yi snod der gzhag/ 'bras chen la sogs zas bzang dang// 'o ma sman du sbyar ba yi// gtor ma gcig ni gzhag par bya// mchod pa'i yo byad tshogs pa dang// bdag nyid khrus ni rab byas la// gos ni gtsang ma gon par bya// spos dang dri sna tshogs kyis byugs// chu de'i nang du blugs pa'i rdzas// me tog spos dang tsan+dan dang// rin po che rnams brdar la blug/ rtsa ba'i gsang sngags rjes nyid du// sngags 'dis klu rnams mchod par bya// sarba pany+tsa

nA ga shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ gsang sngags de yis mchod pa'o// gtor ma gsang sngags 'di yis 'bul// sarba pany+tsa nA ga i daM ba liM gr-ih+NA gr-ih+NA pa ya swA hA/ lan bdun dag gis klu rnams mchod// ut+pal lta ba'i phyag rgya yis// gtsang ma'i klu rnams mchod par bsam// chu dang bcas pa'i gtor ma ni// klu rnams gnas pa'i sa ru bskyal// des ni klu yi gdon rnams thub// des kyang gdon dang ma bral na// drag po'i las rnams brtsam par bya// dbang chen ting 'dzin rab ldan pas// bdag gi thugs ka'i hU~M nyid las// phyag na rdo rje gtum por bsam// bdag nyid dpung pa g.yas pa na// yi ge hrIHgcig chad pa las// khro bo rta mgrin dmar por bsam// rta mgrin de las 'od 'phros pas// gshin rje'i gshed dang mi g.yo mgon// shin tu gtum pa'i khro bor bsam// de ltar lha rnams bskyed pa dang// thog ma'i gsang sngags rjes dag tu// gsang sngags 'di yis klu rnams bsad// oM badzra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha na nA ga mA ra la myogs myogs/ nA ga mA ra ya thums/ nA ga mA ra ya shigaro la rmugs/ shag mA ra ya/ snying khrag tshal ba baM ril gtub gtub/ gsang sngags des ni klu rnams gsod// 'byung po thams cad tshar gcod byed// dregs pa thams cad 'dul ba yis// de ltar gsang sngags dag la bskyar// klu yi rigs rnams gsad pa yi// sbyor ba de nyid brtson par bya// rgyal rigs klu yi rtags byung na// ras sam gro ga shing shun la// rgyal rigs klu yi gzugs bris la// ling+ga de yi snying ga ru// nA ga mA ra ya zhes bri// ling+ga de yi g.yas phyogs su// rgyal rigs mA ra ya zhes bri// g.yon du nA ga gtubs dang myogs zhes bri// de ltar ling+ga byas pa yis// mgrin par ling+ga re re bri// de ltar ling+ga byas zin nas// brub khung gru gsum sngon por bya// de yi tha ma zlum por brtsigs// zlum po'i kha dog sngo nag la// me ri yis ni mdzes par bri// zlum por brtsegs pa'i steng dag tu// rdo rje be con gzugs nyid bri// gru gsum brtsegs pa'i steng dag tu// kha T+wAM rdo rje rgya gram bri// de yi nang du ling+ga gzhug/ ske tshe nyung dkar nyung nag dang// btsan dug la sogs dug rnams dang// dur khrod thal ba'i rdzas rnams ni// dur phor dag gi nang du blug/ de la gsang sngags rab btab cing// ling+ga de la brab par bya// bal po se'u'i lcug ma'am// snyag shad dag gi lcug ma yis// nad pa'i snying ga dag nas ded// lus kun khyab bar brdol bya zhing// bdag nyid glang la lan gsum bskor// sa la lan ni gsum brdab cing// ling+ga de la bstim par bya// gsang sngags bzlas pa rab tu bya// bdag nyid dbang chen ldan pa yis// gsang sngags bzla zhing lcug mas brdegs// klad skor sa la

brdab pa dang/ ling+ga dag la yang yang bstim// bcom ldan pad+ma rta mchog dang// phyag rdor la sogs 'khor rnams la// gtor ma rgyan ldan dag gis kyang// dus gsum dag tu mchod par bya// mtshams ni ma thon bar du yang// dpal gyi gtor ma gta' ru bzung// zhag bdun bar du bsgrub pa dang// de nas ling+ga de nyid ni// yugs sa mo yi zhabs mas gtum// bra ma'i shing gi me yis sbar// dug dang gong gi thun gyis brab// drag sngags de nyid rab tu bzlas// bdag nyid khro bo'i ting 'dzin brtan// thun dang lcug mas rab tu brab/ thun dang lcug mas brab tshe na// nad pa'i lus kyi nad rnams kun// phyag na rdo rje'i mthu rtsal dang// gshin rje gshed kyi brtul shug dang// rta mgrin rgyal po'i drag shul dang// mi g.yo ba yi drag sngags dang// rten 'brel rdzas kyi bden pa yis// nad pa'i lus kyi nad rnams kun// thon nas 'byung po'i ling gar bstim// de nas me sbar drag sngags bzlas// de nas byin sreg zin pa dang// bag zan dag gis gzugs byas la// bsreg pa'i thal ba dag dang bcas// kham sa'i blug ma'i nang du gzhug/ thun gyis brabs la lcug mas brab// chu mig shar du bltas pa yi// 'gram du 'dom gsum tshad du sba// de ltar sbyor ba chen po ni// nyi shu rtsa brgyad byas gyur na// rgyal rigs gdon las thar bar 'gyur// gang dag mi yi rigs rnams la// rje rigs klu yis zin gyur na// drag po'i las kyis gso byed pa'i// sbyor ba 'di la brtson par bya// de gnyis sbyor ba chen po ni// bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje yi// bdag nyid ting 'dzin ldan pa yis// 'brub khung gong dang 'dra ba las// drag po'i thun dang sbyor ba ni// ra phag tshil dang bong tshil dang// ba tshil khyi tshil la sogs pa// sbyin sreg rdzas su rgyas par gsungs// ling ga rnam pa gsum bya ste// ming byang gong dang 'dra ba'o// rma bya mdzes pas lus la byab// ling+ga nyid la bstim zhing bzlas// seng lding phur pa sor brgyad la// dbang chen gsang sngags bris pa yang// bdag nyid thong ga g.yas pa la// le brgan dar gyis dril la gdags// lcags kyi phur bu sor bzhi la// rdo rje gtum po'i sngags bris la// bdag gi thong ga g.yon pa la// dar sngon dag gis dril la gdags// de nas ting 'dzin ldan pa des// rma byas byab cing ling gar bstim// ling+ga gcig la thun gyis brab// gcig la nad pa'i nad rnams bstim// gcig la tshil bu'i dud bas bdug/ da ltar gsang ba rab ldan pas// bsgrub pa'i tshad ni gong dang mthun// ling+ga ro ras dag gis gtum// skyer ba'i shing gi me sbar zhing// ling+ga gnyis ni bsregs par bya// des ni sbyor ba zin pa dang// chu mig nub tu blta ba'i

sar// ling+ga gcig dang bcas pa ni// gong dang 'dra bar sba bar bya// de ltar sbyor ba nyid byas na// rje'u rigs gdon las thar bar 'gyur// bram ze'i rigs kyi rtags byung na// bdag nyid rnal 'byor chen po nyid// gshin rje gshed kyi ting 'dzin gyis// skyer pa'i phur pa sor bzhi la// gshin rje gshed kyi sngags bris la// bdag nyid thong ga g.yon pa na// dar ser dag gis dril la btag/ dbang chen phur pa gong dang mtshungs// beng dug btsan dug la sogs te// dug gi rnam pa ci snyed dang// khrag sna ci snyed yod pa dang// khyi lud dri chen mngal khrag dang// yugs sa mo yi zhabs ma ni// thun dang brab ba'i rdzas su bstan// phag pa dag gi sna rtse la// gsang sngags bzla' zhing lus la byab// ling+ga nyid la bstim par bya// de nas bsgrub pa tha ma la// dug shing skyar ba'i me sbar zhing// rdzas rnams thab tu bsreg par bya// khrag gis gtor zhing ling ga bsreg/ de la sbyor ba zin pa dang// thal ba ling gar bcas pa ni// chu mig lho ngos blta ba ru// gong dang 'dra bar sba bar bya// bram ze'i rigs las thar bar 'gyur// dmangs rigs rtags ni byung ba na// bcom ldan rta mgrin dmar po bsgom// dbang chen phur pa gong dang 'dra// ra gan phur ba sor bzhi la// rta mgrin dag gi sngags bris la// bdag nyid thong ga g.yon pa la// dar sna tshog kyis dril la gdags// shog bu'i ling+ga brgya rtsa bsreg/ bca' lug gong dang 'dra ba la// dbus kyi chu mig dag tu yang// gong dang 'dra bar sba bar bya// de ni dmangs rigs gdon las thar// gdol pa'i rigs kyi rtags byung na// 'phags pa'i rgyal po mi g.yo bsgom// rdzas dang bya thabs gong dang 'dra// dbang chen phur pa gong dang 'dra// dngul gyi phur pa sor bzhi la// mi g.yo ba yi sngags bris la// bdag nyid thong ga g.yon pa la// dar dkar dag gis dril la gdags// de nas sbyor ba zin pa dang// zla gam mdzo mo'i me sbar zhing// ling+ga bsreg cing gsang sngags bzlas// chu mig byang du blta bar yang// gong dang 'dra bar sba bar bya// des ni gdol pa'i gdon las thar// rigs lnga klu yi zin gyur na// res 'ga' na zhing res 'ga' grang// shes pa rmugs shing nyal la dga'// skyur dang dmar la mi dga' zhing// dkar dang mngar la dga' ba na// klu rigs lnga yi zin pa nges// rmi lam dag la byol song dang// khyi dang phag dang nya sbrul dang// sems can gzugs ni sna tshogs 'byung// de rnams bcos par bya ba'i thabs// sna tshogs sbyor ba rab tu bya// de ltar gsad par bya ba'i thabs// drag sngags 'di yis bya bar gsungs// oM shrI badzra tsaN+Da nA ga'i ro snying sha ku ru mA ra ya dza dz+wa/ nA ga duSh+tan phaT/ nA

ga snying thig mA ra ya phaT/ nA ga'i srog kha long/ ldar ya phaT/ gsang sngags de skad bzlas pa yis// klu rnams thams cad dbang med par// srog rtsa drangs nas brgyal ste 'chi// yang na 'dar zhing skrag pa yis// mig rtsa rig rig gzhan du bros// skrag cing sdangs pas bka' nyan byed// sbyor ba yang dang yang bya zhing// gsang sngags lan 'bum bzlas pa na// rigs lnga'i klu rnams bskrad bar byed// drags na rang ngam 'khor la ldog/ phyir mi ldog pa'i bya thabs la// bdag nyid dbang du bsgom pa yis// skra ni spyi bo'i gtsug tu bcings// rma bya'i sgro ni spyi bor btsugs// g.yas pas ral gri rab tu thogs// g.yon pa dag ni phur ba'o// phag pa'i sna ni dbung pa g.yas// sing ldeng phur pa thang ga g.yas// lcags phur thong ga g.yon du'o// gla rtsi btsan dug ske la'o// yungs kar rdo rje rtse dgu'o// des ni phyir la ldog mi 'gyur// de nas sbyor ba ci byas kyang// rang la ldog pa'i ming med do// des ni klu rnams gdon las thar// sa bdag rigs kyis zin pa na// rtags dang 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid bstan// 'jug pa'i sa la nges pa med// lus po'i bkrag ni ser por 'gyur// mkhris pa dag la gnas bcas nas// chu ser dag la za bar byed// lus kyi stobs rnams shor ba dang// zas ni mngar skyur ci zos pa// khong par dros na skyugs par byed// rkang pa kyog dang lag pa kyog/ me mi thub la 'gro mi nus// sa la nyal zhing 'dod chags che// dang po skya rbab dag tu 'gyur// lus po'i sha skam 'gram sha med// dri chu'i mdog ni chu rtsa'i khu// pho stod mi bde skad kyang 'gags// gtam ni smra snying mi 'dod cing// so yi rtsi 'chor rkang mthil ser// mtheb dang 'dzub mo'i bar sha shor// sen mo nyid kyang ser po la// mchin pa na zhing yan lag na// phyis ni skam por 'gro bar nges// de lta bu yi rtags rnams ni// sa bdag gdon du shes par bya// de dag dang po bcos pa'i thabs// sa sna mi mthun sna tshogs dang// rin chen gtor mas mchod par bya// klu yi skabs nas 'byung ba bzhin// 'dir yang sbyor ba de ltar brtsam// klu yi gzugs brnyan ma gtogs pa// bum pa'i sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// klu yi skabs dang mthun pa'o// rin chen gtor ma sna tshogs dang// klu yi skabs nas byung ba yi// mchod pa'i sngags dang gtor sngags so// phyag rgya bum pa lta bus mchod// sa bdag gnas pa'i sa ru bskyal// de ni sa bdag gdon las thar// de yis thar bar ma gyur na// drag po'i sbyor ba brtsams par bya// shin tu dben pa'i gnas nyid du// 'bug khung gru gsum rtse sprad gsum// sa bzang dag gi 'das pas brtsig/ gcig ni dkar po bsku bar bya// gnyis ni nag

dang dmar po bya// de yi phyi rim gru bzhi ste// gru bzhi'i ngos la me ri bri// kha la rdo rjes bskor bar bya// gru gsum kha ni thod pas bskor// bag zan grog mkhar sa dag la// rnga mong gzugs ni nag po bya// de yi steng du bskyon byas la// rtsangs pa'i gzugs dang dmigs pas bskyon// rtsangs pa de yi snying ga ru// yi ge dag ni sngon por bri// gro ga shing shun dag la yang// sa bdag mA ra ya zhes bri// gzugs kyi khong par gzhugs par bya// de ni lho phyogs kha bstan la// brub khung nang du gzhugs par bya// shog shog ling ga re re la// snying gar sa bdag mA ra ya// sngags de bris la brub khung nang// dpal gyi gtor ma dag kyang bya// bdag nyid dbang chen rab gsal pas// brub khung steng du gtor ma bzhag/ gtor ma'i nang du gzugs de gzhug/ bdag nyid dpral ba'i hU~M nyid las// 'phags pa mi g.yo zhes bya ba'i// khro rgyal ral gri thog par bsam// bdag gi mdun du yod pa yi// mi der mi g.yo'i dbang bskur bya// bdag nyid dpal chen ldan pa yis// slob ma mtshan ldan de la yang// shin tu rno ba'i ral gri bskur// nad pa de la bskor bya zhing// ral gri glang la bskor bar bya// nad pa'i lus la thug par bya// gzugs de la yang bstim par bya// slob dpon gsang ba'i dbang thob des// gsang sngags 'di ni drag tu bzlas// hriHbadzra pA Ni nA ga du/ snying khrag tshal pa snying khrag la hab hab hub hub// mA ra ya snying la dza du ya dza dza/ de nas slob dpon mtshan ldan des// rtsa ba'i sngags kyi rjes su yang// sngags 'di bzlas shing ral gri phyar/ mA hA nA ga pa ti s+pha ra na phaT phaT/ ral gri dag la bzla bya zhing// nad pa de yi gzugs la bstim// de nas gang yang rung ba'i mis// gzugs de lho phyogs dag tu bskyal// de nas log nas 'ong ba dang// slob dpon de yis sbyin sreg bya// tsher ma can gyi shing dag la// raM dang ldan pas me nyid sbar// des ni sa bdag gnod las thar// phyis ni ldang bar mi nus so// gang dag gnyan gyis zin gyur na// rtags ni 'di rnams 'byung bar nges// 'jug pa'i sgo ni gsus pa'o// snying gar gnas shing chu ser 'bud// skad ni 'dzer zhing sha mdog nag/ sha yi rgyu yang chung bar 'gyur// yang na rdzis pa dag tu 'gyur// lag pa'i mkhrig ma phra bar nges// don med rma rnams 'byung ba dang// dbang po'i chags pa mi skye dang// gsus pa na zhing skam par byed// tshigs pa na zhing chu ser 'byung// skabs su khol bur na ba dang// smin ma'i bkrag ni nyams par 'gyur// mdze yi rtags rnams 'byung ba dang// rkang pa'i mthil nas 'phrig pa rnams// gnyan gyi nad du shes par bya// 'gro bar byed pa'i tshe na yang/ rkang pa 'khor

zhing lus po 'khyom// kha dang sna dang mig rnams nas// chu ni dus min 'byung ba dang// phyis kyang gnyan gyi mdze ru 'gro/ de la sogs pa'i mdze rigs ni// rnam pa brgyad nyid ldan pa na// gnyan gyi gdon gyis zin par nges// de dag bcos pa'i thabs 'di'o// dang po zhi bas mchod par bya// chab gtor mchod rten gdab par bya// des kyang phan par ma gyur na// dbang chen ting 'dzin ldan pa yis// gru gsum thab khung brtsig par bya// brub khung nag por brtsigs pa'i steng// kha T+wAM rdo rje'i gzugs su bri// dur khrod shing dang tsher ma'i shing// dug shing tshogs kyis gru gsum brtsigs// gdon gyi gzugs ni sngo skyar bya// bal nag skra ni thur la bsnyil// snying gar yi ge pre nyid bri// skud pa nag po sum bsgril gyis// ling+ga de yi ske la gdags// phur pa bzhi la phyogs bzhir brtod// gri dang gdug pa'i mtshon cha bsnams// bdag nyid kha yang lho ru bstan// de nas ting 'dzin ldan pa yis// bgegs rnams bkug cing gzugs la bstim// skud pa nag po gzung bya zhing// gsang sngags 'di yis ling+ga bcing// oM hrIHbadzra b+han+d+ha hU~M/ duSh+ta g+h+r-i h+na ban+d+ha hU~M/ gsang sngags bzla zhing ling+ga bcing// de ltar yang nas yang byas shing// rmi lam khugs par mthong ba dang// gdab pa'i gnas lngar phur bu gdab// de nas gri yis gtub par bya// rdo rjes brdung zhing sngags 'di bzlas// shrI badzra pA Ni/ sa nA ga du ling snying la gtub/ snying khrag tshal pa mA ra ya rbad// de nas brdungs shing hom du bsreg/ de nas brub khung de nyid du// gru gsum bzhin du gting du brko// sol ba la sogs tho ral rnams// gting du brub cing sa yis brdzis// de yi steng du bzhag pa'i rdzas// g.yam pa sngon po leb mo la// rdo rje rgya gram bris pas bcad// dbang chen ting 'dzin ldan pa yis// khro bo brjid pa'i stobs kyis 'gro// dbang gi rta bro brdung bar bya// ha ha zhes bya gad rgyangs sgrogs// pad+mAn+ta kr-ita glu chen blangs// de nas gri yis btsab par bya// de yi gsang sngags 'di dag go/ tshe da tshe da mA ra ya/ khA be na hU~M phaT/ lan ni nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod// phyis ni mi ldang ba yi sngags 'di yin// duSh+ta kra ha na// s+t+waM b+ha na ku ru lam// de nyid bco brgyad dag gis 'grub// de ltar bco brgyad byas gyur na// gnyan gyi gdon las thar bar gyur// sbyor ba 'di nyid byas pa na// sa bdag gdon las thar bar 'gyur// de ltar las rnams rdzogs byas na// klu dang gnyan dang sa bdag dang// sa gdon las ni rab tu thar// mdze yi nad rnams zhi bar 'gyur// des ni las rnams myur pa'o// gang dag mi yi rigs rnams la// mdze la sogs pa'i nad rnams ni// rims dang smyo 'bogs nad la sogs// ma mo'i gdon las

gyur pas na// ma mo'i rigs la bsam yas kyang// gdon ni rnam pa lnga ru 'dus// sa la dbang pa'i ma mo dang// 'byung ba chu la dbang ba dang// me la dbang ba'i ma mo dang// de bzhin rlung la dbang ba dang// nam mkha' dag la dbang pa'o// de dag srung ba'i thabs la yang// rnam pa gnyis su nga yis bshad// gzhan dag mngags pa'i pho nya dang// 'phral gyi gdan rnams las kyi 'phro// rnam pa gnyis su nga yis bshad// bsrung ba'i thabs ni re re'o// brtag pa'i thabs ni 'di lta ste// gzhan gyis mngags ba'i gdon rnams ni// gdon gyis zin pa'i mi de yang// gdong ni nag la skam pa'o// lus po lji zhing tshig pa za// mig rtsa dmar zhing khro la dga'// shes pa bying zhing pho mchin na// rmi lam chu bo chen po rmi// de ltar byung ba'i mi de yang// sngags pa'i mthu yis zin par nges// de dag bcos pa'i thabs nyid ni// dang po mdos dang zhi bas bzlog/ des kyang thar bar ma gyur na// dbang chen ting 'dzin ldan pa yis// bdag nyid mal gyi 'og tu yang// gru gsum dag ni nag por bya// nang du sngags pa'i gzugs brnyan rnams// ma mo'i gzugs brnyan gzhug par bya// steng du dur khrod rdo leb la// gling bzhi ri rab bris pas mnan// dbang chen ting 'dzin ldan pa yis// de yi steng du nyal bya zhing// 'khor lo nyid kyang bskor bar bya// gsang sngags 'di ni mtshan brgya bzlas// hri hri ma tri mA ra ya bzlog/ ma tri ma tri rang la mA ra ya zlog zlog/ rbad rbad// rtsa ba'i gsang sngags lan bdun brjod// de nas sngags de nus tshad bgrang// des ni byad kha thams cad bzlog/ ma mo'i phyir bzlog gsang ba'o// rnam smin yin na thar bar dka'// dge sbyor rdzogs na bzlog ba srid// 'phral gyi gdon du gyur ba na// sa la dbang ba'i rtags rnams ni// 'di lta nyid du 'byung bar nges// lus po lji zhing nyal la dga'// dran pa nyams shing shi 'bras 'don// shes pa bying nas mgo bo 'khor// mig kyang mi mthong khrag lta bu// rna ba 'on nas sgra mi thos// rkang lag 'dar zhing glo snying rmugs// de lta bu yi rtags rnams ni// tha ma mdze ru 'gro bar nges// de ni sa la dbang ba'o// de la bzlog pa bya ba'i thabs// dang po zhi ba'i las kyis mchod// des kyang thar par ma gyur na// rigs gsum rtse mor phyin la yang// brub khung zur gsum gting du brko// ma mo'i gzugs dang ming bris la// rlung dang 'tshub ma'i tshe na bsreg/ thal ba rlung la phyogs bzhir gtor// gsang sngags dus der 'di nyid bzlas// tri tri zhung zhung/ ya su trag rag sha trag ni hed hed// snying khrag gzhib gzhib/ ma ta ra ni'i snying khrag la mA ra ya rbad/ sngags brgya rtsa brgyad brjod pa

yis// klu mo sa gdon gsod par byed// sngags de rgyun du bzlas pa na// sa la dbang ba'i gdon las thar// chu la dbang ba ma mo'i gdon// skyes bu gang la zhugs pa yis// rtags ni 'di ltar 'ong bar nges// gdon de zhugs pa'i mi de yang// lus po tsha zhing kha sna gsher/ snying yanga'aphar zhing chu mi thub// khong pa tsha zhing lus po 'dar// mig kyang gyen la zlog par byed/ mgo dang yan lag na bar byed// shes pa gsal zhing ldang mi nus// mig rtsa nag cing so nag pa// chu la dbang ba yin par nges// gdon de nyid las thar ba'i thabs// sbyor ba'i thab 'di sngags pas brtsam// sna tshogs chu rnams blangs pa yang// rdzas nag dag gis brub khung bya// de yi nang du chu rnams blug/ ma mo'i gzugs dang ling+ga bya// chu yi nang du nub par gzhug/ dur khrod skud pa sum sgril gyis// ling+ga'i snying gar brtod la drang// dur khrod thal ba la sogs pa'i// sa sna tshogs tshad dag dang ni// mkhar gong btags pa'i phye ma dang// so dog zangs phye lcags phye dang// sna tshogs rdo yi phye ma dang// yungs kar nyung nag ske tshe dang// ra dug bong dug btsan dug dang// dug sna ci snyed yod pa dang// ra khrag khyi khrag mi khrag dang// rta khrag la sogs khrag sna rnams// mu zi khyi lud gu gul dang// shu dag ba bla mi gtsang rdzas// dri ma can gyi rdzas sna tshogs// rang rang dag gi mi mthun pa'i// dang po rdo yi thun gyis brab// de nas 'bru yi rigs kyis brab// de nas dug sna tshogs kyis brdeg/ de nas khrag la bsngags shing blug/ de nas sa yis brab par bya// de nas de yi 'dag pa rnams// bsdus la ma mo'i gzugs brnyan bya// khong du ma mo'i ming byang gzhug/ thun gyis brab cing gsang sngags bzlas// sngags 'dis ma mo'i srog gcod pa'o// hU~M hri ma mo'i snying khos// rag mo'i sha rus la rgyug sring/ mA ra ya dza dza/ dbang chen ting 'dzin ldan pa yis// gsang sngags de ni brgya rtsa bzlas// thun la bzlas shing brab par bya// de nas gzugs brnyan de nyid ni// dur khrod grog po sum mdor mnan// gru gsum dong du spyi tshug mnan// bsgrub pa zhag lnga dag tu bya// lan ni sum cu byas pa yi// chu yi gdon las thar bar 'gyur// ma mo'i gdon ni chu la dbang// chu la dbang ba'i gdon de yang// sa yi sbyor bas bskrad par byed// sbyor ba de ltar byas pa na// chu la dbang ba'i ma mo yi// gdon las rab tu thar ba'o// gang dag me la dbang ba'i gdon dag ni// skyes bu gang la zhugs pa'i rtags// 'di ltar rab tu shes par bya// me la dbang pa'i ma mo'i gdon// zhugs pa'i rtags ni 'di lta ste// gdon de zhugs pa'i mi de ni// kha sna skam zhing lus po tsha// lus kyi sha yi rtags rnams

ni// dmar po'i thig le skabs skabs yod// res 'ga' skrangs shing res 'ga' zhi/ lus po skam la gnag par byed// lag pa sprid la rkang pa 'khor// dmar la dga' zhing za la rngam// skad kyang phra zhing mgrin pa phra// mgo bo phyed mar na ba dang// 'khor la khro zhing mig rtsa dmar// nyi ma phyed nas mtshan mo 'thib// shes pa mi gsal bying bar byed// mgo dang yan lag na ba na// me la dbang ba'i gdon yin no// de dag bzlog cing bcos pa'i thabs// dang po me yi hom gyis mchod// des kyang phan par ma gyur na// drag po'i sbyor ba brtsam par bya// 'brub khung gong dang 'dra ba las// shing gi rnam pa 'di lta'o// pha dgu ma dgu bu dgu'i shing// de la sogs pa'i shing sna tshogs// sna tshogs shing gi hom byas la// ma mo'i gzugs dang ming byang bri// ling ga brgya ni rtsa brgyad bya// hom gyi rtse mor btags nas kyang// sna tshogs thun gyis brab par bya// rgya mtsho chu dang lteng ka'i chu// lu ma dang ni 'bab chu dang// nags kyi chu dang gangs chu dang// sna tshogs pa yi chu blangs la// khrag sna'i tshogs dang bsre bar bya// drag sngags 'di yis ma mo bskrad/ dbang chen ting 'dzin ldan byas la// drag sngags 'di yis chu la dbab// hri ma ma nan/ tri'u tri'u/ sha tri'i sha tri'u/ rag mo mA' ra ya nan/ dum bu dum bu rbad rbad// drag sngags 'di ni bzla bya zhing// shing la me sbar chu yis brab// de nas chu dang thal ba bcas pa bsdus// ma mo de yi gzugs su bya// skud pa sngo dmar lus la bcings// thun gyis brab cing phur pas brdeg/ de nas gzugs de yang bsdus la// dur khrod ro bsreg 'og tu mnan// des ni ma mo'i srog rtsa 'joms// me la dbang ba'i ma mo'i rigs// sbyor ba de yis brlag par byed// des ni gdon las thar ba'o// gang dag mi yi rigs rnams la// rlung la dbang ba'i ma mo yis// gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags rnams ni// 'di ltar byung na rigs par bya// dbang du gyur pa'i mi de ni// shes pa yang zhing 'gro la dga'// snying rtsa 'dar zhing spyod pa rtsing// dran pa nyams shing 'o dod 'bod// dben pa'i phyogs su song nas ni// glu yang len snying 'dod pa 'byung// dgong mo nyi ma nub kha ru// snying yang mi dga' glu len cing// lab lob mang po'i gtam la dga'// mi dang dus gsum 'grogs par byed// snying dang glo ba nang rol grang// gzhogs ni g.yon pa na ba na// snying yang sing sing byed bar nges// lus la nag po'i thig le 'byung// rtags de rnams dang ldan pa na// rlung la dbang ba'i gdon yin no// de dag bcos shing bskrad pa'i thabs// dang po zhi ba'i gtor mas mchod// des kyang phan par ma gyur na// drag po'i sbyor ba 'di dag brtsam// 'brub

khung gong dang 'dra ba las// bdag nyid dpal chen thugs ka nas// yi ge yaM zhes chad pa las// brub khung nang du 'od du bsam// de nyid 'od du zhu ba las// rlung gi dkyil 'khor zla gam bsam// rlung gi
