dkyil 'khor de nyid du// ma mo'i gzugs nyid bsam par bya// brub khung nang du ling+ga gzhug/ thun gyis brab cing gzugs der bsam// tsher ma can gyi me sbar la// drag sngags 'di ni rab tu brjod/ hri ta sa ma ma tri/ ya rbad hU~M/ snying rtsa dur ling dza dza/ drag sngags lan ni nyi shu gcig/ bzlas pas ma mo bskrad par nges// me spar thun dang sngags kyis gzir// sbyor ba lan ni nyi shu gcig/ byas shing gzugs la bstim byas na// rlung la dbang ba'i nad las thar// gang dag mi yi rigs rnams la// nam mkha'i ma mos zin pa yi// rtags ni 'di ltar 'byung bar nges// lus sems lji zhing mig kyang ser// mgo bo zing long byed pa dang// mig kyang zing long sna rtsa dmar// shes pa 'thib cing nyal la dga'// smad tshigs na zhing mjing pa reng// shes pa 'khyam nas na ba ni// nam mkha'i mo gdon yin par nges// de dag bcos shing bskrad pa'i thabs// dang po zhi ba'i gtor mas mchod// des kyang phan par ma gyur na// drag po'i sbyor ba brtsam par bya// bdag nyid dpal chen thugs ka nas// yi ge e nyid chad pa las// brub khung de yi nang du yang// e gnas nam mkha' gru gsum bsam// de yi dkyil du ma mo bsam// gzugs dang ling+ga nyid kyang ngo// thun gyis brab cing drag sngags bzlas// thog ma'i gsang sngags rjes nyid du// drag sngags 'di nyid btags pas 'grub// ma tri nA ga pra shA ma na ya swA hA/ gsang sngags de nyid bzla bya zhing// gang du dgos pa'i sbyor ba rnams// skabs 'dir thams cad rdzogs par byed// lan ni brgya rtsa byas pa na// nam mkha'i ma mo'i gdon las thar// gdon de brtags pas ma shes na// sna tshogs sbyor ba rdzogs par bya// des ni ma mo'i gdon las thar// 'byung po'i gdon gyi nad rnams ni// glo bur dag tu 'byung bar nges// de dag rnams las thar ba'i thabs// bdag nyid dbang chen brjid par bsgom// sku ni ri rab brjid pa tsam// stong gsum 'jig rten khyab par bsgom// phyag na rdo rje thugs kar bsgom// de yis bgegs rnams 'joms par bsam// dpral bar 'phags pa mi g.yo bsam// mgrin par rta mgrin rgyal po bsam// lte bar gshin rje gshed po bsam// de ltar bskyed rim rdzogs nas ni// bgegs rnams gang yin mdun na bsam// bdag nyid lha yi thugs ka na// phyag na rdo rje gtum po bsam// de yis bgegs ni brdungs par bsam// thams cad 'joms par byed pa

yi// gsang sngags dam pa 'di rnams so// oM pad+mAn+ta kr-ita ha ya grI ba hu lu hu lu/ badzra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hU~M phaT/ ya mAn+ta ka hring hring/ badzra tsaN+Da me ro ling hU~M phaT/ gsang sngags bzla zhing lha tshogs bsgom// sngags de bzlas shing ling+ga brab// de ltar rgyun du bzla bya zhing// lha tshogs mnyes pa'i gtor ma 'og nas gong gi gsang sngags zhes pa 'di'o/ dang// thugs dam bskul zhing bstod pa bya// dngos grub myur du 'byung bar nges// des ni sna tshogs gdon 'joms pa'o// gang dag mi yi rigs rnams la// rgyal po'i gdon gyis 'tshe byed na// de dag bskrad pa'i sbyor ba brtsam// rgyal po zin pa'i mi de la// rtags ni 'di ltar 'byung bar nges// snying mi dga' zhing glu chung len// don med 'gro snying 'dod pa ste// mgo dang mjing pa stod mi bde// glo snying 'dar zhing mig rtsa rig/ snying ga mi bde mchin pa 'phyangs// yang na gsus pa sgal la 'byar bar byed// rmi lam stag dang seng ge dang// 'bag dang rol mo rgya rta'i tshogs// btsun pa mi chen rmi ba rnams// lha khang gsung rab mchod rten rnams// mchod pa rgyas par rmi ba dang// snying dang srog rtsa 'dar zhing na// so 'thab dbugs kyang rgod par byed// yang na kha yang 'dzum pa ste// mjing pa yo zhing rgod kha snyi// de lta bu yi rtags rnams ni// rgyal po'i gdon gyis zin par nges// de dag bcos shing bskrad thabs ni// bdag nyid sngags pa'i mdun nyid du// brub khung gru gsum gru gang ste// nang du rgyal po'i ling gzud de// gzugs kyi rgyu ni 'di lta ste// shel la sogs te rin chen lnga// sa bzang dag dang sbyar ba ni// gru gang dag gi tshad du bya// de nas brub khung nang du gzhug/ khyi lud bong tshil ra tshil dang// khyi tshil mi tshil ba tshil dang// rta bon dang ni mu zi dang// lcags phye zangs phye yungs kar dang// pha wang long bu dug sna tshogs// mi khrag dang ni rta khyi'i khrag/ khrag sna dag ni sna tshogs dang// thun dang zor gyi rdzas rnams bsag/ lcags kyi phur pa sor brgyad pa// sngags 'di bzlas shing gzug pa'o// oM pad+ma hrIHbadzra pA Ni sar// rA tsa'i snying khrag la tshal pa mA ra ya dza/ sngags de lan ni brgya rtsa brgyad// phur pa dag la bzla' bya zhing// thun gyis brab cing phur pas brdag/ tsher ma'i shing gis me sbar zhing// dar dang za 'og stag gzugs ras// lpags ras sbyang ras g.yi ras rnams// mer bsreg gzugs la me yang sbar// de ltar lan bdun byas pa na// rgyal po'i gdon rnams skrod par nges// gang zhig dam sri'i gdon rnams ni// mi yi lus la zhugs gyur na// rtags ni 'di ltar 'byung bar nges// kha sha srab cing mig kyang 'tshag/ rgyu zhabs na zhing so yang na// mkhal ma 'phrig cing na bar byed// skad kyang

'gags la snying mi dga'// rmi lam na yang bud med 'byung// chas bzang byung na zhen pa'i rtags// gos ngan byung na 'jug pa'i rtags// rtags de rnams dang ldan gyur na// dam sri gdon phran gnod par nges// de dag bsad cing bskrad pa'i thabs// sbyor ba 'di nyid brtsams par bya// rnal 'byor ting 'dzin ldan pa des// gru gsum dong ni gting du brkos// nang du dam sri'i ming byang bcug/ bong bu ga pa'i 'bras bu la// sngags 'di bzlas shing nyal khar brdung// dbang chen ting 'dzin ldan par bsgom/ klu 'dul dbang chen sku la bstod// sngags 'di brgya rtsa brjod cing brdung/ shan tri bu sham/ dam sri mA ra ya tri nan/ mA ra ya rbad du ma dza dza dza/ sngags de bzlas shing mtshan mo brdung// phyag na rdo rjes bkug par bsam// rta mgrin dmar pos bzung bar bsam// gshin rje gshed kyis bsdam par bsam// mi g.yo bas ni gtub par bsam// des ni dam sri'i gdon las thar// gang dag mi yi rigs rnams la// gdon rnams gnod pa'i rmi lam ni// bye brag bshad pa 'di lta ste// gdon phran gdon dang srid pa'i 'dre// srid pa'i 'dre rnams rmi ltas ni// rang gi sha yang za ba dang// rgya gram dag tu nyal ba dang// dud 'grau'i tshogs ni mang po dang// lus la srog chags zhugs pa dang// 'dam rdzab nyal dang mtsho la bying// gos rnams med dang btson du bzung// rgya la btsud dang skra bkru lus la rma byung dang// bya rnams sha la za zhing lding// de lta bu yi rtags rnams ni// srid pa'i 'dre ru shes par bya// 'phral gyi gdon du gyur pa'i rtags// rmi lam rtags ni 'di ltar 'byung// slob dpon phyogs kyi 'dre gdon na// slob dpon lta bur sprul nas 'ong// zhang po'i phyogs kyi 'dre gdon na// zhang po lta bur brdzu nas 'ong// sru mo'i phyogs kyi 'dre gdon na// sru mo lta bur sprul nas 'ong// pha tshan phyogs nas 'dre gdon na// pha khu rgan rab dag tu 'ong// pha mes dag tu zhugs pa na// pha mes dag tu bcas nas 'ong// rang gi tshe la zhugs pa na// na mnyam dag tu sprul nas 'ong// ma yi rigs su zhugs pa na// ma yi phyogs kyi cho 'phrul 'ong// zhang po'i drin la 'dre gdon na// bdag nyid ma ltar sprul nas 'ong// de ltar gdon kyi rnam pa ni// lan gsum btud nas byung ba na// nges par de yi phyogs nas gdon// de dag las ni thar ba'i thabs// gong gi gsang sngags bzlas pa'o// des ni gnod pa rnams las thar// rtags de rnams ni byung ba na// gsang sngags bzlas pa brtson par bya'o// de ltar gsang sngags rab bzlas na// 'byung po'i gdon las thar bar nges// gang dag mi yi rigs rnams la// rmi lam sum cu rtsa gnyis rmi ba na// sngags 'di

lan bdun brjod pa yis// rmi lam ngan pa bzlog pa'o// oM sarba pra b+hany+tsa kra duSh+ta ya bzlog/ de ltar sngags de bzlas pa na// rmi lam nges par bzlog pa'o// gang dag mi yi rigs rnams la// 'gong po khyim du zhugs gyur na// bsam pa 'grub par mi byed cing// 'khor dang longs spyod nyams pa ni// 'gong po yi dwags gnod par byed// 'gong po thams cad kha 'ching ba// drag sngags 'di yi kha 'ching ba'o// 'gong po hab sha trig nan/ tha tri myags thum ril rbad/ de ltar gnod pa'i mi de yis// bong bu gwa pa'i rna mchog tu// 'gong po'i gzugs dang ming bcug la// zangs kyi sho dang rdo sho dang// rus pa'i sho yang nang du brub// yungs kar dag la sngags bzlas shing// ra yi sgang stog dag gis 'bud// de ltar drag sngags bzlas byas na// 'gong po thams cad kha 'ching bya// gang dag mi yi rigs rnams la// lhog 'bras phol dang skrangs pa'i nad rnams dang// sbrul gyis zin dang gag ba'i nad rnams dang// rma rnams 'tsho med skrangs par gyur ba la// gsang sngags bzlas shing sbyor ba 'di lta ste// dur khrod sa dang tsha tsha sa sna dang// mi yi dri chen spyang ki dang// wa dang khyi dang phag pa dang// lcags dang zangs dang dug sna dang// dri chu dang ni dri chen sbyar// 'dag pa sbyar zhang byug par bya// drag sngags 'di yis gdab par bya// lus la byugs na nad rnams 'joms// gsang sngags gong ma'i rjes dag tu// drag sngags 'di ni rab tu bshad// a hring hring sing sing swA hA/ de nyid gdab cing 'dag pa byugs// de ltar rgyun du byas pa na// gong gi nad rnams zhi bar gsungs// gang dag mi yi rigs rnams la// dug la sogs pa'i nad kyi rigs// sha dug sbyar dug rtsi dug ni// de dag zhi bar bya ba'i thabs// bdag nyid dbang chen mgrin pa ru// rma bya mdangs ldan bsgom par bya// chu gtsang 'khar phor nang du'o// rang la tsha ba 'dus gyur bas// mchil ma chu yi nang du bor// sha dug lo dug zla dug dang// sbyar ba'i dug rnams thub par gsungs// gzhan dag bsrung bar byed pa na// thugs kar sngags bzlas mchil ma'o// de dag rgyun du byas shing gdab// dug gi ro rnams 'drong bar bsam// sngags 'di 'bum gyis 'grub par nges// oM sang ha ka li ha sa hU~M/ ka ba da tsa re/ ma hA de ba'i gling srung/ oM tsan 'bis/ he b+his/ ma hA b+his/ ko ro tsa b+his dza/ zhes pa'i sngags de bzlas shing sbur bar bya// des ni dug rnams 'joms pa'o// mdze dug la sogs rtsi dug la// ga pur bzang po zhe gcig dang// chu gtsang dag tu sbyar byas nas// sngags 'di brgya rtsa gdab par bya// des ni lus kun khrus byas nas// ba spu'i bu gar skam du gzhug/ des ni rtsi dug

thams cad thub// de yi sngags ni 'di skad do// oM khrag nyal ra ma swA hA/ sngags de brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas zhing// ga bur sbyor ba dag byas na// rtsi yi dug las thar bar gsungs// lnga brgya dus kyi tha ma ru// sangs rgyas bstan pa nub kha ru// dug gi sbyor ba rgya cher 'byung// de dag sngags kyis bsrung ba ni// sbyor dug sha dug rtsi dug ni// gong du gsang sngags bstan pa'o// btsan dug dag gi sngags 'di'o// oM krang kring sod/ khrug le hri// sngags 'di brgya rtsa bzlas byas nas// srin lag gnyis kyi bar dag tu// btsan dug blangs te zos gyur kyang// sngags kyi nus pas thub par nges// dus ni snyig ma'i dus de ru// sangs rgyas bstan pa nub pa'i rtags// dug gi sbyor ba 'byung bar nges// mdze nad la sogs nad rnams ni// nad ni bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi 'byung// de dag 'byung ba'i dus nyid du// rdzogs pa rang byung rgyud 'di gsungs// le'u 'di dag 'byung ba yis// sems can kun gyi mgon du gyur// 'di ltar spyod pa rdzogs byas nas// nad rnams zhi bar ngas bshad do// gang dag mi yi rigs rnams la// mtshan mo'i 'dre dang gdon gyis gnod byed na// tshon sna lnga yi skud pa la// rtsa ba'i mdud pa lnga bor te// rtsa ba'i gsang sngags brgya rtsa bzlas// lus sam mgul du btags gyur na// gdon de nyid las thar bar 'gyur// lnga brgya dus kyi tha ma la// phyugs nad sna tshogs 'byung bar nges// de dag zhi bar byed ba'i thabs// srung ba mtshams kyi 'khor lo las// sde brgyad drag sngags tha mar bri// dar ram ras ni ser pos gril// skyer ba'i phur pa sor bzhi la// gsang sngags nus tshad bzlas pa ni// mgul du btags pas phyugs nad chad// gang dag mi yi rigs rnams la// rims nad dag gis btab gyur na// de dag rnams la thar pa'i thabs// sbyor ba 'di nyid byas pas thub// khrus ni sna tshogs byas nas ni// nam langs pa yi dri chu yis// dang po tha ma pho nas bar mas khrus byas zhing// ltor yang bag tsam gtong bar bya// sna bug nang du bag tsam blugs// rtsa ba'i sngags ni bzlas bya zhing// de ltar rgyun du byas pa na// 'gos nad rims las thar bar nges// de ltar sbyor ba byas pa yis// nad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar 'gyur// lnga brgya dus kyi tha ma la// nad kyi sdug bsngal bsam mi khyab// de rnams zhi bar bya ba'i phyir// dbang chen gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs// de nas gsang sngags bstan pa gnas// de nas gdon rnams 'joms byed pa'i// gsang sngags 'di ni rgyas par 'gyur// lo ni lnga brgya bar du gnas// de nas gsang sngags bstan pa ni// yun ring gnas par ngas ma bshad// gsang sngags 'di ni shin tu gsang// de phyir bgegs

rnams 'joms pa'o// de nas dbang chen 'khor bcas la// bstod pa'i glu chen 'di skad do// hrIH/ rig pa ye shes nyid las bskyed pa'i lha// dbang chen kun 'dus dbang gi rgyal po khyod// dbang gi mdog dmar bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar// zhal gsum phyag drug khro rgyal rta skad mtsher// shin tu brjid dang dur khrod chas kyis brgyan// zhabs bzhi bgrad cing rgya mtsho'i klu rnams brdzis// zhal nas tshems brdar klu yi gshed mar mdzad// spyan rtsa rig cing ma mo pho nyar 'gyed// dbu dgu phyag ni bco brgyad ste// zhabs brgyad khro rgyal klu brgyad brdzis// dmar nag sku ni sna tshogs ston// dregs pa can rnams zhal du rngub// dbang gi sku mdog dmar 'phro ba// srid pa gsum nyid dbang du sdud// rta skad phyogs bcur sgrogs pa yis// dus gsum khro bo dam la sdud// rta bro thang gsum brjid pa yis// srid gsum 'byung po'i snying la brdung// phyag mtshan mang po bsnams pa yis// klu rnams thams cad thal bar rlogs// kun la byams pa'i khro rgyal klu 'dul khyod// dbang chen sku la gnyis med yid phyag bstod/ hU~M// khro bo'i rgyal po rta mgrin dbang gi sku// hrIHdang phaTaHkyis klu+u rnams za bar byed// mig nas me 'bar rgya mtsho'i klu rnams bsreg/ shangs nas rlung 'tshubs 'jig rten khams kun 'khrugs// lcags kyi rmig pas klu yi snying nas 'dren// klu yi snying 'byin klu rnams bsreg par byed// gsod byed khro rgyal chen po yis// dgra bgegs snying khrag rngam pa'i zhal gyis gsol// dbang chen khyed kyi thugs ka nas// gsang ba'i bdag po gos sngon can// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog sngo// g.yas pa'i phyag na bsnams pa ni// klu 'dul gser gyis rdo rje bsnams// zung zhig gtogs shig rnam par chings// g.yon pa'i phyag na bsnams pa ni// sbrul zhags phur bu phyogs bcur 'debs// drongs shing khug cig snying la ya// bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje ni// sna tshogs mchog gi sku 'bar zhing// sku ni ri rab lta bur brjid// gsung sgras stong gsum zil gyis gnon// thugs ni chos nyid byams par ldan// ral pa kham nag gyen du brdzes// gsus pa che la sbrul yang za// klu rnams za ba'i mche ba gtsigs// ral pa gyen du brdzes pa yis// klu yi 'jig rten dbang du bsdu// ag tshom me ltar 'bar ba yis// mi yi 'jig rten skyob par byed// zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum tshul bstan pas// klu rnams skrod par byed pa'o// bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje ni// lha chen brgyad ni phyag gis sgrol// klu chen brgyad ni zhabs kyis mnan// bdud dang ma mo'i srog rtsa 'phrog/ rgyal 'gong kun gyi don snying 'byin// ma bdud thams cad gsod bar

byed// phyag na rdo rje stobs po che// ri rab gling bzhir bcas pa ni// khyod kyi lag pa g.yas pa yis// 'phangs pas 'jig rten 'khrug par byed// rgya mtsho'i gting na gnas pa yi// klu rnams khyod kyi zas su za// ri rab ngos kyi klu rnams ni// dpag tshad brgyad khrir 'phen par byed// klu 'dul khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// khro bo'i rgyal po rta skad 'tsher// dbang chen khyed kyi thugs ka nas// phyag na rdo rje pho nyar 'gyed// dbang chen khyod gyi dpral ba na/ hU~M/ khro rgyal 'phags pa mi g.yo ba// sku mdog nag po 'jigs pa'i sku// zhal gcig phyag gnyis brjid pa che// g.yas pas ral gri bsnams pa yis// khams gsum sems can skyes rtsad gcod// g.yon pas sdigs mdzub zhags pa bsnams// thams cad chings shig rnam par sdoms/ 'phags pa'i rgyal po mi g.yo ba// rdungs shig khro bo'i rgyal po khyod// dgra dang bgegs rnams rdul du rlogs// khro bo'i rgyal po mi g.yo mgon// klu 'dul 'jigs pa'i sku la bstod/ hU~M/ bcom ldan dbang chen mgrin pa nas// sprul pa'i rta mgrin dmar po byung// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dmar// g.yas pas be con bsnams pa yis// srid pa'i 'byung po rdul du brlag/ g.yon pas sdigs mdzub bsgrengs pa yis// thams cad ma lus sgrol bar byed// rta mgrin rta skad ba yis// klu la sogs pa'i bgegs rnams 'joms// sku ni me yi tsha tsha 'phro// gdon bgegs thams cad thal bar brlag/ sprul cig rol cig rta mgrin rgyal// 'byung po 'joms la phyag 'tshal bstod// bcom ldan dpal chen lte ba nas// khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing/ kam kam tshig tshig ral ba me ltar 'bar// g.yas na 'khor lo rtsibs stong bskor// srid gsum ma mo gsod par byed// dbang du sdus shig gshin rje gshed// g.yon pas sbrul zhags sdigs mdzub bsgrengs// dam tshig nyams pa'i gshed ma mdzad// ma mo'i sku 'dul khro rgyal gshin rje gshed// mthing nag 'jig byed khro rgyal dgra bo'i gshed// thams cad 'ching byed zhags pa klad la bskor// ma mo'i gshed byed khro rgyal gshin rje'i gshed// sku mdog gsal 'gyur ma mo gcer bur 'gyur// 'jig byed rngam pa'i khro rgyal tshogs dang bcas// glo snying zhal du gsol zhing snying khrag dron mo 'jibs// mi mgo klad khrag nyid kyi zhal du gsol// khro rgyal 'jig byed ha la ha la'i sku// ljags 'dril tsam gyis rdo rje'i thog chen 'bebs// kun gyi gshed byed ma mo 'dul// ma mo dbang du bsdu la phyag 'tshal bstod// pad+ma dbang gi sku ni brjid pa che// bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje klu 'dul brjid// mi g.yo mgon pos bdud dang srin po 'dul// gshin rje

gshed kyi dgra bo ma rungs 'joms// rta mgrin nyid kyis thams cad 'gugs bar byed// khro rgyal bgegs rnams 'joms la phyag 'tshal bstod// hrI ta ya pad+ma kro ta hU~M hU~M mA ra ya dza dza/ gsang sngags dbang pos bskul byas la// bgegs rnams 'dul ba'i ting 'dzin ldan// de ltar las rnams rdzogs par bya'o// dkyil 'khor sbyor ba rdzogs par bya'o// sngags dang phyag rgya'i dbang rdzogs bya// bcom ldan dbang chen sku nyid la// 'khor gyi lha dang klus bstod nas// rang rang stan la mngon par 'dug/ yi dwags rnams ni bred cing sngangs// 'byung po sha za'i gdon las thar// las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// chen po las ni shin tu che// dbang chen gsang ba'i rgyud 'di ni// rab tu 'byung bar dka' ba ste// lnga brgya dus kyi tha ma la// rgyud 'di 'byung zhing las rnams 'grub// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang mnyam par sbyor// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// rgyud rgyal gsang ba 'di nyid ni// thams cad 'dul byed gnyen po ste// thams cad rang rang bde la 'god pa'o// e ma ho// dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i bkod pa 'di// 'di ltar rab tu bya bar gsang// dbus su dmar nag gru gsum mdzes// zla gam gsum ni sngo nag bri// de yi phyi rim dag tu yang// gru bzhi sgo dang bcas pa bri// phyi rim zlum po mu khyud bri// de ltar dkyil 'khor bris byas la// dbus su dpal gyi gtor ma dang// dbang chen bsgrub pa'i rdzas ni bzhag/ zla gam gsum gyi steng dag tu// lcags kyi phur pa re re la// dar dmar gdugs ni phub pa'o// sgo bzhir dgram pa'i rdzas rnams ni// shar du shel gyi phur pa la// dar dkar gdugs dang bcas pa'o// lho ru skyer ba'i phur pa la// dar ser gtsang ma'i gdugs kyis phub// nub tu sing ldeng phur pa la// dar dmar dag gi gdugs kyis phub// byang du lcags kyi phur pa la// dar ljang dag gi gdugs kyis phub// byang shar mtshams kyi gru chad steng// lcags kyi phur pa dag btsugs la// dar tshon dag gi cod pan btags// shar lho mtshams gyi gru chad steng// dug rnams byugs pa'i phur pa ste// dar nag dag gi cod pan btags pa'o// lho nub mtshams su bzhag pa ni// seng ldeng phur pa khrag gis byugs// dar nag cod pan btags pa'o// nub byang mtshams su mchog phur ni// mthing nag dar gyi cod pan btags// gru chad phyi ma bzhi po la// gtor ma re re gzhag par bya// de ltar rdzas rnams bshams pa'o// bsgrub pa'i skabs su shes par bya// bsnyen pa'i skabs su dpal gtor dag gis so// las la sbyor ba'i dus tsam nas// khrag dang dug thun thun rdzas bsag/ rang rang thun dang 'dra bar bshad/ des ni las rnams 'grub

par gsungs// gang zhig longs spyod nyams pa yis// 'di ltar spyad na dngos grub 'byung// tshe dang bsod nams rgyas par 'phel// skye dang mi skye'i sdug bsngal bral// 'dis ni bsam pa nye bar 'grub pa'o// zhes rdzogs pa rang byung chen po'i rgyud las/ thams cad zlog byed mtshon cha'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ sarba ma kha su ra a ma tha ga su nA ma/ bod skad du/ bdud rtsi nang du thams cad sbyor ba'i lung zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan che mchog he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid che mchog he ru ka zhes bya bar gyur nas/ bdud rtsi thal ba'i sbyor ba'i le'u 'di gsungs so// kye ma ko'u rI 'khor rnams nyon// khams gsum rnam rgyal yum nyid kyis// b+ha ga'i dbyings nas bka' stsal pa// bdud rtsi sbyor ba 'di nyid las// sbyor ba dam pa 'di lta ste// sku yi sbyor ba bdud rtsi 'di// thang las byung ba'i bdud rtsi dang// nam mkha' dag las byung ba dang// de bzhin rang las byung ba dang// sna tshogs dag ni rdzas bsags la// sman ni rnam pa ci snyed dang/ de bzhin dug kyang rab tu gsungs// dug lnga bdud rtsi'i sel ba'i phyir// rtsa ba lnga yi sbyor ba las// yan lag bsam gyis mi khyab bstan// sbyor ba'i rdzas kyi them las ni// oM dang AHdang hU~M dag gis// sbyor ba byin gyis brlabs nas ni// bdud rtsi chen po bsgrub pa 'di// shin tu dben zhing nyams dga' ba'i// gnas ni rab tu btsal nas kyang// gnas kyi mtshan nyid brtags pa nas// 'jug pa'i dus nyid bstan pa'o// gnas kyi mtshan nyid brtag pa ni// nags tshal rab tu mang ba'o// bya skad sna tshogs sgrogs pa dang// brag ri mtho bar 'dug pa dang// me tog sna tshogs 'khrungs pa dang// gtsang ma'i chu 'bab nyi ma rtag/ bcud dang 'bras bu smin pa ru// gnas ni zla gam dbyibs dag tu// bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor zhal phye ste// dkyil 'khor mda' gang tshad du bya// yug gis ma phogs dpangs mtho ba// shin tu byugs pas legs pa la// dri chus chag chag legs btab la// de nas chag de bskam pa dang// phyi rol dag tu song la ni/ cha gsum btang dang phyi bshags rnams// gzhung dang mthun par rab byas la// phyi mtshams la sogs de bzhin bya// de nas nang du 'ongs nas ni// nang mtshams gsang ba'i mtshams yang gcad// de nas nang bshags tshul bzhin bya// de nas dkyil 'khor de nyid la// chang phud gtsang ma ma nyams pas// chag chag legs par gdab par bya// de nas dkyil 'khor de nyid la// tshangs thig la sogs thig rnams ni// gnam thig sa thig tshul bzhin bya// de nas tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis// dkyil 'khor

de la dgod par bya// dbus kyi pho brang zlum po la// dkyil du mthing nag gru gsum ste// zla gam dbus kyi kha dog ni// ser dang dmar dang dkar ba'o// de yi tha ma dag tu ni// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dag tu bya// 'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi rtse mo la// nor bu 'od 'bar re re bya// 'khor lo'i mdog ni ser por btang// de yi phyi rim gru bzhi'i steng// ljang gu'i mdog ni rab tu gsungs// de yi phyi rim dag tu yang// zlum po sgo dang bcas pa bri// dkyil 'khor chen po de nyid kyi// gru chad bzhi yi zur dag tu// bsgrub pa'i yum bzhi gzhag par bya// de nas bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid bstan// de nas rdo rje khams gsum gnam zhal mas// bdud rtsi chen po'i sbyor ba dang// bdud rtsi'i snod dang dam rdzas gzhag/ gtso bo yab la rab tu zhus// kye ma khro bdag chen po'i sku// dkyil 'khor chen po de nyid la// bsgrub pa'i rdzas ni ji ltar dgod// nye ba'i 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ de nas mngon rdzogs rgyal po yis// yum gyi b+ha ga dam pa las// sbyor ba brda' yis rab bskul nas// nye ba'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// nyon cig nye ba'i 'khor rnams nyon// bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor de nyid kyis// steng du rdzas rnams bsags pa ni// mthing nag dbus kyi steng nyid du// rigs bzang b+han+d+ha mtshan ldan dang// dmangs rigs mo yi b+han d+ha gnyis// kha dog rigs dang ri mo gnyis// pho la 'khor lo dpag bsam shing// yi ge lta bu'i ri mo rnams// pho la byung na bzang bar bshad// pad+ma dag dang me yi ris// mtshan ma lta bur byung ba ni// mo yi rigs la bzang bar bshad// dbyibs dang kha dog rab brtags la// dbus su rab tu gzhag par bya/ 'khor lo'i rtsibs ma re re la// bum pa mdzes pa re re gzhug/ bum pa de dag re re yi// rtsa ru phur pa re re la// khro bo bcu yi sngags rnams kun// re re dag la bris la bkod// phur pa bcu po dag la gdags// dar dmar cod pan re re btags// de yi phyi rim gru chad la// mda' dang me long dar sna dang// ral gri gtor ma re re bzhag/ dkyil 'khor de la sgo bzhi la// bum pa rigs dang mthun pa re// ras dkar mgul chings dag dang bcas// shar du mdzes pa'i spyan phye la// lho yi bum pa de nyid las// mdzes pa'i zhal nyid bri bar bya// nub byang gnyis la ma dang hU~M// legs par bris la dgod par bya// de nas nye ba'i 'khor rnams kyis// gtso bo yab la don zhus pa// kye kye bcom ldan he ru ka/ dam rdzas mtshan nyid de ltar na// sman gyi rigs rnams gsung du gsol// de nas rnam grol he ru kas// nye ba'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// kye ma nyon cig yum gyi tshogs// sman gyi rigs rnams 'di lta ste// rigs ni lnga ru nga yis

bshad// rtsa ba 'bras bu lnga ru bshad// bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor de nyid kyis// dbus kyi thod pa dag tu yang// dri chen skam po srang gcig bzhag/ shar gyi bum ba'i nang dag tu// byang chub sems ni srang phyed bzhag/ lho ru bsgral ba'i mAM sa nyid// mig dang sna la gzhi blangs la// de bzhin snying dang mkhal ma dang// mchin pa la sogs srang gsum bzhag/ nub tu sna tshogs rak+ta nyid// bsgral ba'i rak+ta sna tshogs ni// srang gsum tshad dang mnyam par bzhag/ byang gi bum pa'i nang dag tu// dri chu sna tshogs bsres pa ni// phul thag gang gi tshad du bya// de nas shar du phor snod dag tu ni// ra sa ya na la sogs te// nyung kar gu gul dag dang ni// rdo rje phur ba dag dang ni// go ro tsa na chen po dang// rak+ta la sogs gzhag par bya// de nas dkyil 'khor lho phyogs su// bsgrub pa'i yum nyid bzhag nas ni// rgyan cha sna tshogs rab tu brgyan// dpral bar thal chen mtshan ma btab// dkyil 'khor dbus kyi phyogs dag tu// sgrub po yab yum 'dug nas ni// dkyil 'khor byang gi phyogs dag tu// dgra bgegs zlog pa'i mtshon cha bzhag/ dbus kyi pho thod dag la yang// gong gi ri mo med pa na// rdo rje nyid dang hri dang tha// dmangs rigs mo yi b+han+d+ha la// gong gi ri mo med pa na// pad+ma dang ni oM zhes bris// de yi nang du blug pa'i sman// sha chen dang ni khrag chen dang// de bzhin rin chen byang chub sems// dri chu la sogs gtso bo lnga// de yi 'bras bu chen po ni// mig dang sna dang rna ba lce// tsit+ta la sogs cha mnyam ste// srang ni phyed dang gsum dag bzhag/ de yi 'phrod du bstan pa ni// gur gum dang ni tsan dan dang// spang spos dang ni rgya spos dang// de bzhin sprul spru ma'am sbrub ma rnam lnga yang// cha mnyam srang phye tshad du bzhag/ de yi 'bras bu sbyar ba ni// mi dang rta dang khyi dang ni// de bzhin glang dang lug la sogs// mkhris pa lnga dang klad pa lnga// rgyungs pa lnga dang dri chen lnga// cha mnyam srang gi phyed dang gnyis// de yi 'phrod nyid sman bstan pa// ga pur dang ni mu tig dang// lan tshwa dang ni rgya skag dang// shing tsha dag dang cha mnyam la// zho gcig dag gi tshad du bya// de rnams tshad du bstan pa yin// dmangs rigs dri chen dag dang ni// rta dkar dang ni glang po che// khyi dkar dag dang shang shang gi/ dri chen dag ni cha mnyam la/ zho phyed dag gi tshad du bya// de yi 'phrod du bstan pa ni// khyi sha dang ni kham bu dang// snying ni zho sha dag dang a ru ra// sug sme nyid dang cha mnyam la// zho gcig dag gi tshad du bya// 'bras dang til dang gur gum dang// dri chu cha mnyam sbyar bar bya// tshad ni gsum mam gcig tu btang// shing thog a 'bras skyu ru ra// ba ru ra dang li ga dur// thal

dkar rdo rje dag dang ni// cha mnyam sbyar de zho phyed tsam// nA ga ge sar klu sman dang// gla rtsi dang ni tsan dan dang// kha ru tsha dang rgya spos dang// dza ti pha la shu mo za// cha snyoms sbrang rtsi dag tu sbyar// gser dang dngul dang zangs dang lcags// g.yu dang dung dang ra gan dang// zhib tu brdar la cha snyoms la// drod la phab nas zho gcig btang// des ni 'od rnams 'byung bar 'gyur// dkar po'i rus dang byi la'i snying// dwa ba'i khu ba dag dang sbyar// sran ma gsum gyi tshad du btang// zhag bdun bsgrub pa byas pa na// dri ni sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur// gla rtsi dang ni tsan dan dang// seng ge'i lci ba go shir Sha// gur gum chu dang sbyar byas nas// nam gnyis dag ni btang gyur nas// zhag lnga lon pa dag dang ni// dri zhim pa dang du ba 'byung// de ltar rang rang snod dag tu// dkyil 'khor mtha' mar bshams nas ni// tshes ni brgyad la zhugs pa dang// zhag gcig dbang gi bro brdung zhing// dkyil 'khor de la byin brlab bya// de nas sman gyi rigs rnams kun// kha dog rigs rnams mig gis dbye// kha dog dkar ba thams cad kun// rdo rje rigs kyi sman du bshad// de bzhin ser dang dmar ba dang// ljang dang mthing ga la sogs rnams// rigs ni so sor phye ba rnams// dkyil 'khor shar gyi phyogs nyid du// lcags kyi gtun bus rab tu btags// yum dang rdo rje rgyal pos btags// shin tu zhib par btag bya zhing// sngags 'dis rab tu btag par bya// oM a mr-i ta badzra ha na ha na hU~M/ de skad brjod cing sman rnams btags// de nas sman rnams thogs pa dang// gsang ba rdo rje slob dpon gyis// byin brlab bya zhing sman rnams bsre// bsrung ba'i sngags 'di kun gyis bzlas// oM a mr-i ta mu sa le swA hA/ de skad brjod cing zhib tu bsnyams// de dag sman gyi rigs rnams kun// glang po che las byung ba lnga// 'o ma snyug sgong dag gis dgang// dri chu 'o kon tsam du sbyar// dmangs rigs mo yi b+han+d+ha ru// shong tshad blugs la pho yis dgag/ 'phel nas gnyis ka khengs pa dang// dngos grub chen po thob par gsungs// gang yang rung ba'i thod pa lngar// lhag ma blugs la gru bzhir bzhag/ sna tshogs dar gyis kha bcad de// dbus kyi b+han+d+ha kha sbyar la// dar dmar dag gis thum bur g.yogs// mched lcam du yod gzungs thag btag/ de nas ras dkar gtsang ma yis// yol ba dag ni rab tu bya// 'dzab tu bgrang ba'i sngags 'di'o// oM AHhU~M/ sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta hU~M hrIHTha/ dbyangs dang bcas pas rab tu bgrang// phrin las gang yang rung ba bsrang// de nas rtags rnams byung ba dang// dngos grub blang ba'i cho ga bya// de nas bdag nyid ting 'dzin

gyis// dpal chen che mchog he ru kar// rab tu gsal bar bsgom pa ni// dbu mang phyag kyang mang po ste// smug nag sku ni rab tu 'bar// dbu ni nyi shu rtsa gcig ste// phyag kyang bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis te// dkyil 'khor dus gcig bsgom pa'o// bdag nyid gtso bo bskyed pa'i sngags// oM badzra ma hA shrI he ru ka raM dz+wa la hU~M/ bdag nyid gtso bor gsal bar bsgom// gsang ba'i yum kyang yab dang 'dra// sngags 'das yum nyid gsal bar bskyed// oM ma hA kro d+hI shwa rI sarba ta thA ga ta mu dra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M/ de ltar bskyed rim rdzogs nas ni// sgrub po yab yum nyid du sbyar// yab yum spos chu 'o mas bkru// gur gum sran ma'i ril bu tsam// pad+ma'i nang du dril te gzhug/ de nas sbyor ba rab byas nas// byang chub sems dang rak+ta sbyar// de nyid dbus su gzhag par bya// de nas nub ni gnyis pa nas// gu h+ye'i sngags 'di rab tu bgrang// oM badzra tsit+ta sa ma ya hU~M/ rab 'bring tha ma gsum du bgrang// de nas dkyil 'khor de nyid phyogs// dbus su byang sems rnam snang ste// shar gyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// rdo rje dri chu sna tshogs te// lho ru byang g.yag sha chen dang// sha ba'i sha rnams dgong pa'o// nub kyi 'khor lo de nyid la// 'byung ba lnga yi rak+ta dang// mAM sa dang ni rak+ta la sogs pa'i// sna tshogs rak+ta gzhag par bya// byang du bsgral ba'i dri chu gzhag/ sman gyi rigs rnams gsal ba dang// sngags 'dis thams cad byin gyis brlob// oM swa hU~M hrIHhA/ rtsa ba'i snying por shes par bya/ zho sha snying dang mkhal zho sha// ko ro zho sha dag dang ni// shu dang ku re rta dang shu dag sre me dang// nab se shu dag dag dang a ru ra// ra mo sha gdang skyer bI kha n+Ta dag dang ni// skyes pa'i chu dang sbyar ba ni// srang phyed dag gi tshad du bya// sman gyi sbyor ba de dag kun// dkyil 'khor byang du kha dog dbye// shar du sman nyid btag par bya// lho ru 'khar gzhong nang du ni// sman sna tshogs tshad bsag par bya// sna tshogs sbyar ba nus pa che/ sman gyi rigs ni sna tshogs kun// bsre pa'i sngags ni 'di dag brjod// a mr-i bi sho d+ha ya/ bsre dang btsag pa'i sngags su brjod// de nas rab 'bring rtags byung nas// dngos grub dbab pa'i sngags 'di'o// oM ma hA sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta su kha hri pheM pheM// g.yab dor la sogs sna tshogs bya// sman gyi rang bzhin de dag kun// mchog chen lag pa g.yon gyis dkrugs// mchog chen gling bu 'bud pas g.yab// dung dang rnga dang dril bu dang// cang te'u pi wang la sogs sgra// sgra ni sna tshogs dkrol zhing 'bud// de nas dkyil 'khor ngos bzhi nas// mched lcam rnams kyis dbyangs 'di blang// rang byung gdod nas dag pa yi// rtsa brgyad stong la sbyar ba'i sman// ra sA ya na la sogs

rdzas// rtsa ba 'bum phrag yongs kyi bcud// gnyis med bde chen las byung ba'i// byang chub sems ni rdo rje ste// sha chen mchod pa rin po che// zas mchog tshe yi rin po che// pad+ma me tog yang dag ldan// rdo rje chu ste dri chu mchog/ ga pur shel gyi spos phor gsum// rin chen me ltar 'bar ba'i mchog/ rin chen 'bum phrag yangs pa'i bcud// rigs lnga dam tshig lnga yi dngos// ye shes lnga rdzogs grub pa'i rdzas// rgyud lnga'i sems can kun sgrol ba// dug lnga sel ba'i thabs mchog ste// thams cad bdud rtsi'i rnal 'byor che// ma lus 'dus pa'i bdud rtsi che// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor phyir// gcig tu dpa' bo'i ro rnams dang// gnyis su med par rang sbyar nas// dus gsum bud+d+ha thams cad dang// rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams la mchod// dbyangs de blangs shing dngos grub blang// de nas yum gyis sman blangs la// gzhung bzhin dag gi cho ga brjod// de nas nub ni lnga pa na// bdud rtsi byin brlabs sngags 'di brjod/ badzra a mr-i ta/ oM AHhU~M hrIHTha/ de ltar byin brlabs rdzogs nas ni// dngos grub blangs ba'i sngags 'di brjod// a ho su kha d+harma kA ya ni// oM a mr-i ta sid+d+hi hrIH/ sngags kyi yi ge de dag kun// 'od du zhu nas dngos grub blang// yi ge de dag re re las// lha yi sku ni re re ste// yi ge mthu nus dngos grub blang// de nas dngos grub rdzogs nas ni// slob ma de la dngos grub dbang nyid bskur// dbang gi gnas lnga bstan pa ni// spyi gtsug bde ba'i dkyil 'khor der// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya long kha sbub tsam// de yi steng du oM nyid bsam// lce nyid pad+mar gyur steng du// yi ge AHnyid 'od 'bar bsam// thugs kar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam// de yi steng du hU~M nyid bsam// lte bar rat+na thur brgyad steng dag tu// rin chen 'od 'bar steng du yang// yi ge swA nyid rab tu bsam// gsang ba'i gnas su hA nyid bsam// yi ge 'bru ni lnga po las// rigs lnga'i sku ni 'od 'bar te// 'od zer lnga lnga rab tu 'bar/ phyag rgya 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad 'bar// de nas dngos grub dbang rdzogs nas// 'od zer gtso bo'i dbang nyid bskur// oM dkar spyi bor bsam par bya// lce la AHdmar 'od 'bar bsam// snying gar hU~M nyid mthing ga'o// lte bar yi ge swA ser bsam// gsang ba'i yi ge hA nyid ljang gu'o// dkar dmar 'od ni mdangs dang ldan// rang nyid bsam zhing bu la spro// de nas bu la 'dus gyur pas// phyag mtshan yi ge dag tu gyur// oM las 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad 'bar// 'bar nas dri chen bdud rtsir zhu// hU~M las rdo rje rtse lnga 'bar// 'bar nas byang chub sems su zhu// swa las rin chen 'od 'bar te// 'bar nas mAM sa bdud

rtsir zhu// hrIHlas 'od zer sna tshogs 'phros// 'phros nas rak+ta'i thig le zhu// hA las sku ni 'od 'bar bsam// 'bar nas dri chu bdud rtsir zhu// bu yi dbang nyid rdzogs nas ni// slob dpon gsang ba'i yum ldan des// dbang bskur tshig ni 'di skad brjod// ho gdod nas rnam dag ma skyes chos kyi dbyings// dag dang ma dag rnam rtog mtha' las 'das// dug gsum gcig la sku bstan spyi shol med// dngos grub brlan can sna tshogs 'bar ba can// su 'dod sbyin gyis 'di la da tshur longs// skam par 'brengs pa'i gti mug mthun pa la// sprin mthongs khud par nyi shar dro ba ltar// bdud rtsi'i rgyal po dbang chen 'di sbyin pas// rig 'dzin rgyal po gtso bo'i go 'phang 'thob// tshe dang skad dang yid du 'ong ba dang// bgegs rnams zhi la sogs pa ste// nad dang bral nas ci 'dod pa// yon tan brgya rtsa 'di yis 'thob// de skad rab tu brjod par bya// de nas slob ma'i dbang bskur rnams// thams cad rim pa rdzogs par bya// bdud rtsi gtso bo'i dbang bskur te// gtso bo gsang gnas spyi bor bskur// kha ni mi dbye gtso bor bskur// sngags 'dis thams cad kun la bskur// oM AHhU~M/ ra sa ya ta ra sa ya na dz+nyAn gu Na sid+d+hi yin nam dza na g+hu na si ti hU~M hrIHdzA/ zhes pas kun la dbang du bskur// bum pa la sogs sman sna rnams// rim re bskur zhing rim re bsgom// spyi gtsug dbang rten ral pa la// dar gyi cod pan re re la// sngags 'di lan brgyad brjod cing gdags/ oM shrI pa Ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M/ de skad brjod cing dbang de bskur// nas ni 'bras bu bdun nyid la// gong ma'i sngags ni bdun brjod la// kun la zhag grangs tsam re gdags// gsang ba'i mtshan yang gdags par bya// dbang gi dngos grub de dag kun// gzhan gyis mi 'phrog zil gnon phyir// sbyin sreg cho ga rgyas par bya// dbang dang sman gyi sbyor ba rnams// shin tu rgyas pa nyid du bya// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul dang// sman gyi byin brlabs nus mthus ni// nad dang 'byung po thams cad sel// skye med byang chub 'bras bu thob// rig 'dzin gsum gyi 'bras bu thob// de yang bsgrub pa chen po'i tshe// lha yi sku ni bsgom par bstan// de bzhin snying po dag kyang bstan// gsang sngags gsung gi dngos grub ni// thams cad 'grub par gdod mi za// bdud rtsi chen po thal ba'i lung// lung 'di bdag gis rab bshad pas// bsgrub pa chen po thams cad kyi// mig dang dbang po lta bur 'gyur// kye ma nyon cig ye shes 'khor chen nyid// bdud rtsi chen po'i nges tshig 'di// thams cad nges par lung 'di bstan// rnam grol he ru ka yis kyang// bdud rtsi'i nges tshig 'di dag gsungs// bdud

kyis 'khor ba'i gcong rong 'don// rtsi yis ye shes thabs la slon// bdud ni 'khor ba chen po la// rtsi yis chos nyid don la skyel// bdud rtsi'i don dag gad rgyangs che// bdud ni bar chod bgegs chen la// rtsi yis che mchog lta bur 'gyur// bdud ni khu rlangs sprin lta bur/ nyi ma lta bu'i rtsi btab nas// ye shes don la thogs pa med// bdud ni mun khung lta bu la// mar me lta bu'i rtsi btab nas// snang ba thams cad thogs med 'gyur// kye ma che mchog he ru ka/ nam mkha' lta bu'i rtsi chen la// sprin phung lta bu'i bdud kyis bsgribs// shel sgong lta bu'i rtsi 'di la// dri ma lta bu'i bdud kyis bsgribs// bdud rtsi chen po mchog gi lung// 'di ni snang ba go 'byed pa'o// ma rig bdud la rig pa rtsi'i// rgya yis btab cing 'gyur ba med// de bzhin bdud rtsi'i sbyor ba 'di// he ru ka yis rab tu gsungs// zhes rdzogs pa rang byung chen po'i rgyud las/ dbang thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid bstan pa'i rgyud/ bdud rtsi thal sbyor gyi lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// rdzogs so////
rgya gar skad du/ du pa sarba g+ha na su ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ thams cad sgrol byed tshogs kyi lung zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rigs lnga 'khor dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang gi spyan sngar rigs lnga'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis// btud de thal mo sbyar nas/ rang rang gi 'khor 'khos te/ tshogs chen po'i mchod pa 'di smras so// kye sems dpa' chen po nyon/ gang dag mi yi rigs rnams kun// 'khor dang longs spyod nyams pa dang// longs spyod chung bar gyur pa dang// rgyu yi tshogs la brten 'dod na// bsod nams skye bar 'dod pa yis// tshogs kyi mchod pa bsham par bya// phyi mtshams spyi bshags rdzogs byas la// zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs su gsol// rdzas dang yo byad ci 'byor bshams// kha zas 'byor bshams sna tshogs pa'o// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus dag tu// zangs chen nang du tshogs kyis bkang// ka ra bu ram la sogs pa'i// dkar dang gtsang ma'i gtor ma dang// bshos zan brgya dang rtsa brgyad dang// zhi ba'i lha tshogs mnyes pa yi// rdzas ni sna tshogs gzhag par bya'o// de ltar sngon 'gro rdzogs nas ni// zhi ba'i phrin las rdzogs bya zhing// mchod pa sna tshogs dbul bar bya// bsgrub pa'i rdzas de thams cad la// yi ge 'bru gsum byin gyis brlabs// bdag

nyid ting 'dzin ldan byas la// zhag gsum tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor// dus bzhir tshogs kyi rgyun mi gcad// de ltar ting 'dzin byin brlabs nas// tshogs rnams spyan drang 'di skad do// lcags kyu'i phyag rgya thugs kar bca'// lcags kyu'i bar nas dzaH'phros pas// zhi ba'i lha tshogs spyan drangs bsam// de nas spyan drangs 'di skad do// hU~M/ bde bar gshegs so rigs lnga'i tshogs// rgyal ba rgya mtsho 'khor dang bcas// sems dpa' dang ni sems ma dang// thub drug kun bzang yab yum dang/ sgo ba yab yum 'khor bcas dang// zhi ba'i pho brang 'khor bcas rnams// tshogs kyi gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol// tshogs mchog dkyil 'khor spyan 'dren gyis// rin chen gar dang gzi mdangs 'phro ba'i tshul// tshogs kyi mchod pa rab 'byams ma lus kun// longs spyod tshogs kyi gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol// gnyis med 'khril sbyor yum bcas gshegs su gsol// de nas tshogs bsgral ba ni// ral gri'-i phyag rgya bca' la// tshogs ni dum bur gtub byed la// bsgral ba'i mchod pa 'di skad do// hU~M/ tshogs rje tshogs bdag dbang dang ldan// slob dpon 'khor bcas dgongs su gsol// gnyis med dbyings las bskyed pa yi// zhi ba'i lha tshogs dgongs su gsol// bdag nyid dpa' bo'i stobs dag gis// thabs mkhas thugs rje'i byin rlabs las// bza' btung rgyu'ang bsgral bar bya// tshogs kyi rgyu ni byang chub sems// byang chub rgyu ni stong bdag med// rig pa med pas rig las 'das// mtshan ma'i yul med mngon sangs rgyas// bsgral ba'i rgyu med dbyings su bsgral// sarba pra pa na hU~M khA hi khA hi/ de nas mchod pa ni 'di skad do// hU~M/ rnam par snang mdzad bkra shis 'byung ba'i gter// yid bzhin 'dzum pa'i sems kyi tshogs 'di bsngo// bza' bca' dang ni longs spyod thams cad bsngo// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// rgyal ba'i sku la bzhengs bzhugs mi mnga' yang// 'gro ba'i don la dgongs pas tshogs 'di bzhes// shar phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng na// bcom ldan mi bskyod rdo rje la// byang chub sems dang gnyis med phyir// dag pa'i 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phro// yab yum gnyis med tshul gyis bzhes su gsol// lho phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng na// rin chen 'byung ldan sna tshogs cirayang sprul// 'khor dang longs spyod bcas te 'bul lags na// yab yum gnyis med tshul gyis bzhes su gsol// nub phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng na// snang ba mtha' yas sprul sku byang chub sems// sems can don la dgongs pa'i thugs rje can// rig pa gnyis med tshul gyis khyab mdzad pa// mAM sa dang ni ro

mchog tshogs 'di ni// yab yum gnyis med tshul gyis bzhes su gsol// byang phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng na// don yod grub pa gnyis med gar bsgyur zhing// 'du 'bral med pa'i tshul du yab yum sbyor// longs spyod ma lus 'dus pa'i rdzas chen 'di// bdag nyid mnyam par bzhag pa'i tshul 'dis 'bul lags na// yab yum gnyis med tshul gyis bzhes su gsol// byang shar 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng na// rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis med gyur pa'i tshul// phyag na rdo rje dpa' bo'i tshul gyis bstan// spyan ras gzigs dbang 'gro ba stobs kyis 'dul// sku mdog 'od zer lnga yi phreng ba can// dgyes te 'dzum pa'i tshul gyis glu blangs pas// sems dpa'i tshogs la gnyis med mchod par 'bul// pi lbang sgra dang gling bu'i sgra 'byin pa// sna tshogs sgra yi mchod pa dam pa 'bul// rdzas dang longs spyod thams cad mchod pa'i mthus// sems dpa' sems ma rnams la mchod par 'bul// rin chen sems dpa' pad ma'i sems dpa' dang// chos kyi sems dpa' las kyi sems dpa' la// gnyis med mthun sbyor tshogs mchod dam pa 'bul// phyogs skyong yab yum dang ni thub pa drug/ zhi ba'i lha tshogs kun la mchod par 'bul// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro// 'dod yon lnga ldan mchod par 'bul// a li u li hA li ta pa li/ zhes rdzogs pa rang byung chen po'i rgyud las/ zhi ba'i tshogs bsgral ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ bud+d+ha ling kro ha su ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ khro bo'i rang bzhin du tshogs bsgral ba'i lung zhes bya ba// bcom ldan 'das pad ma dbang gi lha la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas yang khro bo'i lha tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras so// kye kye rang rang 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams nyon// gang zhig longs spyod 'phel 'dod pas// sbyor sgrol tshogs kyi mchod pa bsham// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs su gsol// khro ba'i rdzas dang longs spyod bsags// khro bo'i phrin las rdzogs par bya'o// gsang sngags byin brlab ldan par bya// bsgral ba'i mchod pa 'di skad do// hU~M/ bdag nyid pad+ma gar ldan pas// thabs mkhas pad+ma dbang chen gyis/ 'gyings ba'i stabs kyis gar byas pas// bsgral ba'i rgyu rnams dbyings su bsgral// bsgral ba'i rgyu la bsam yas kyang// srog can dang ni srog med rgyu// 'di ni srog med rgyu yin pas// ging chen shes rab thabs ldan pas// gzung 'dzin rkang pa bsnol nas ni// gnyis med byang chub sems su bsgral/ pra be sha ya hU~M A be sha ya A be sha ya phaT phaT/ de ltar tshogs de bsgral byas la// cha gsum dag tu gcad par bya// rdo rje rgyal pos las

kyi dri chab kyis// tshogs de bsangs shing mchod par bya// dang po dpa' bo sgegs pas mchod// gnyis pa dri med drin chen 'khor los mchog/ gsum pa gnyis med bshags pas mchod// de ltar khro bo'i mchod rdzogs bya'o// zhes rdzogs pa rang byung chen po'i rgyud las/ khro bo rang bzhin gyi tshogs kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ ti sta sarba ka ya nA ma/ bod skad du/ spyi tshogs bsgral ba'i lung zhes bya ba// bcom ldan dbang chen 'dus pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas yang 'khor nye ba'i sras mchog rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye kye bcom ldan dbang gi lha// 'das pa'i 'khor rnams khro gnyer la// spyi tshogs bsgral ba bstan du gsol// de skad zhu ba phul gyur nas// rang rang stan la nye bar 'dug/ de nas nyid kyis rab tu bshad// kye ma 'dus pa chen po nyon// tshogs kyi lung 'dir bsgral 'dod pas// bsgral dang spyan 'dren mchod rdzogs bya// dpa' bo sba bshags pa dang// bstab pa gsum gyi mchod pa bya// de nas ging chen rgyan ldan des// sngags dang phyag rgyas byin brlabs pas// ting 'dzin rta mchog skur ldan pas// mchod pa'i phyag rgyas nyer mchod de// lha mo bzhi yis nyer mchod de// 'di skad brjod cing glu chen blang/ hU~M/ mchod pa'i glu tshig dbyangs ldan pa'i// zhi khro tshogs dang sems dpa' la// gnyis med gar gyis mchod pa 'bul// chos dang sems dang yid kyis mchod// e ma sangs rgyas kun sbyor ba'i// mnyam pa'i mchod pa chen pos mchod// spyan las mchod pa'i lha 'phros pas// gzugs kyi mchod pa sna tshogs 'byung// lag gnyis gar bsgyur bum 'dzin mas// rgyal ba mnyes nas spyan la thim// sgra las mchod pa'i lhar gyur pas// sgra yi mchod pa sna tshogs 'byung// lag gnyis gar bsgyur rol mo mas// rgyal ba mchod byas snyan la thim// shangs las mchod pa'i lhar gyur nas// dri yi mchod pa sna tshogs 'byung// spros pas rgyal ba'i sku mchod nas// lag gnyis gar bsgyur d+hU pe mas// rgyal ba mnyes byas shangs la thim// ljags las mchod pa'i lhar gyur pas// ro yi mchod pa sna tshogs byung// spros pas rgyal ba'i sku mchod nas// lag gnyis gar bsgyur ni wi tes// rgyal ba'i sku mchod ljags la thim// mchod pa'i lha mo de dag kyang// lag pas gar bsgyur rkang pas stabs// gnyis med mchod pa rol mo dang// pi wang 'dzin dang spos phor 'dzin// zhal zas sna tshogs 'dzin byed cing// mchod pa'i glu dang stabs dang ni// gar gyis thams cad tshim par mchod// yang dag sku dang chos kyi sku// sangs rgyas zhing khams rab 'byams su// lha mo bzhi yis khengs gyur te//

thams cad mchod pas mnyes byas pa// khro rgyal khrag 'thung thams cad dang// zhi ba rnams la yang mchod par 'bul// a la la ste mchod par bzhes/ oM badzra g+han+d+he g+han/ badzra d+hU pe d+hU/ puSh+pe pu/ oM badzra ni wi te dza/ oM badzra Ar+ya te dza ting hU~M dza/ hU~M/ rgyal ba zhi khro kun la mchod pa ni// rang bzhin ma bskyed rdzogs pa yi// ye shes lha tshogs rol cig dgongs su gsol// rnga dang gling bu dang ni dung mchog gis// rgyal ba zhi khro'i tshogs la mchod pa 'bul// cha lang dang ni pi wang sgra mchog dang// mchog chen la sogs sgra yi rol mo yis// rgyal ba zhi khro'i tshogs la mchod pa 'bul/ hU~M/ bu ram dang ni ka ra sbrang rtsi yis// rgyal ba zhi khro'i tshogs la mchod pa 'bul// chang dang mAM sa ke'u 'bras la sogs// ro ldan bro mchog ye shes mchod pa yis// rgyal ba zhi khro'i tshogs la mchod pa 'bul// rak+ta dang ni bdud rtsi chen po dang/ dri chu dri chen byang sems dkar dmar gyis// rgyal ba zhi khro'i tshogs la mchod pa 'bul// dza gad la sogs ro mchog brgya rnams ni// rgyal ba zhi khro'i tshogs la mchod pa 'bul// hU~M spos dang rgya spos dang ni tsan+dan dang// dri mchog la sogs dri sna tshogs rnams kyis// rgyal ba zhi khro'i tshogs la mchod pa 'bul// hU~M ras mchog dang ni dar mchog dam pa dang// 'jam zhing dro ba'i reg bya sna tshogs kyis// rgyal ba zhi khro'i tshogs la mchod pa 'bul// sems mchod dang ni yid kyi mchod pa yis// rgyal ba zhi khro'i tshogs la mchod pa 'bul// rnam shes la sogs tshogs kyi mchod pa yis// rgyal ba zhi khro'i tshogs la mchod pa 'bul// rta dang glang chen la sogs gser dang dngul// baiDUr+ya dang man shel byi ru yis// rgyal ba zhi khro'i tshogs la mchod pa 'bul// dung dang rdo yi dbyig dang zangs lcags dang// g.yu dang nor dang 'bru dang bang mdzod kyis// rgyal ba zhi khro'i tshogs la mchod pa 'bul// gos dang stan dang mal cha la sogs te// sna tshogs gzugs kyi mchod pa dam pa bzhes/ hU~M/ bcom ldan rgyal ba zhi khro'i lha tshogs la// rnal 'byor tshogs mchod 'bul lo bzhes su gsol// yo byad sna tshogs pa yi mchod pa 'dis// rgyal ba zhi khro'i thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ oM tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i yon tan kyis// tshe rabs snga phyi med pa'i sgrib pa rnams// zhi khro'i spyan sngar skad cig tsam gyis byang/ tshe rabs phy-i ma gnas ni gar skyes kyang// yo byad chung ba dag tu mi 'gro zhing// rtag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur// rin po che dang 'bru la longs spyod cing// rdzas dang longs spyod ldan pa'i skyes bur 'gyur// de bas lhag pa'i yon tan 'di ltar 'thob// ye shes bar dor rang snang dag pa mthong// de la goms nas mi 'gyur sa la

gnas// sprul pa stong gsum gang bar 'gyed par gyur// de ltar bu yi yon tan thob par 'gyur// yon tan tshogs kyi mchod pa dam pa 'dis// rgyal ba zhi khro'i tshogs la mchod par 'bul// a la la ste mchod par bzhes// a la la ho thugs rjes dgongs su gsol// a la la ste thugs rjes dgyes pas bzhes// rnal 'byor bdag la dngos grub stsal du gsol// bdag la dbang bskur tshogs mchod dgyes par rol// a li u li tA li ta pA li/ khA hi khA hi/ mAM sa/ rak+ta/ tsit+ta/ ma hA ba su ta/ go ro tsa na ba lid+ta khA hi/ des ni tshogs gyi las thams cad shes par bya'o// zhes rdzogs pa rang byung chen po'i rgyud las/ spyi tshogs bsgral ba'i lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ sarba shAn ting bo d+hi sa twa a b+hi Shiny+tsa nA ma// bod skad du/ zhi ba byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas dbang thams cad kyi bdag nyid dbang gi sku des/ phyi nang snod bcud thams cad dbang gis rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs nas/ zhi ba byang chub sems kyi ngang du dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba 'di rnam par bshad do// gsal bar bya'o// mngon par bstan no// rgyas par bkral lo// rig par yongs su snang ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das des/ 'khor gyi sras mchog rnams la bos te/ 'di skad gsungs so// kye ma kye ma 'khor nyon cig/ ma rtogs pa rnams rtogs byed pa'i// dbang gi rgyal po 'di bstan pas// ma smin pa rnams smin par 'gyur// dbang gi ngo bo 'di bstan pas// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa ste// byang chub nyid du nye bar bstan// rig pa'i ye shes mi gsal ba// dbang 'di bskur bas gsal bar 'gyur// de rnams gsal bar 'dod pa na// dbang bskur dam pa 'di nyid bstan// grong rdal chen po'i dbus dag tu// rnal 'byor pa yis don mi 'grub// grong dang grong khyer zad mtha' dang// nags sam ri brag lung stong du// rnal 'byor bdag gi don la 'jug/ bsgrub pa la brtson rigs snang brtag/ rdzogs pa chen po'i don bstan pa'o// theg pa phyi nang thams cad kyi// dbang rnams 'di yis legs par bshad// de la dbang bskur byed tsam na// phyi mtshams la sogs rdzogs par bya// sta gon cho ga'i gzhung rdzogs bya// khrus dang rdo rje'i chu yang blud// dam tshig mna' chu dam mna' bskyal// dkyil 'khor bri ba gru bzhi'am// 'dom gang gru bzhi gnas dang sbyar// thig dang tshon rnams byin gyis brlab// mu khyud zlum po pho brang mdzes// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi rigs dang sbyar// mu khyud dmar

po rdo rje'i ra// phyi rim gru bzhi gru chad ljang// gru bzhi dag gi phyi rim du// mu khyud ljang gu zlum por bshad// zla gam bzhi ni kha dog ser// phyi rim gru bzhi sgo dang bcas// gru chad rigs dang 'dra bar bshad// phyi rim bar du za ra tshag/ sgo ni rigs dang 'dra ba la// mu khyud zlum po sgo khyud bcas// de ltar dkyil 'khor gsal bris la// rdzas dang yo byad tshogs par dgram// dbang bskur yo byad sna tshogs gzhag/ rtags kyi phyag rgya sna tshogs snang// mtha' yas sems kyi dbang du'o// bya phyir dkyil 'khor rdzas tshogs bya// rten pa dang ni brten pa can// las rnams rdzogs phyir gzhag par bya// gsang ba'i rtags nyid bstan pa yi// rdzas kyi rnam pa 'di lta ste// dbus su man+dzil steng dag tu// zangs kyi nang du gtor ma'o// gtor ma'i kha ni dar dkar mdzes// 'khor lo rtsibs dang lte ba la// rma bya'i mdangs ni re re gzug/ rtsibs mchan gtor ma'i kha ru yang// me long skyon med re re bzhag/ gru chad ljang gu'i steng dag tu// snying po dang bcas ral gri bzhag/ zla gam ser po'i steng dag tu// nas kyi gdan ni 'dab ma brgyad// steng du dum pa re re bzhag/ dar dkar mdzes pa'i mgul chings dang// nang du chu gtsang 'o ma ste// tsan dan chu dang spos chu dang// byang phyogs dag tu gur gum chu// kha rgyan dag dang bcas pa'o// sgo bzhir mda' ni mdzes pa la// me long dar sna bcas pa'o// kha tshar ma nyams ras dag gis// dkyil 'khor dag gi phyi yol bya// steng na sna tshogs dar gyi gdugs// de ltar dkyil 'khor rgyan bkram zhing// bu rnams spos kyi chu yis bkru// rdo rje'i gral phyag byas nas ni// rdo rje'i gral la 'khod par bya// de nas slob dpon dbang ldan des// sta gon cho ga rdzogs par bya// dkyil 'khor gnas par bya ba dang// bum pa sta gon gnas par bya// slob ma sta gon gnas bya dang// sta gon cho ga'i ting 'dzin bsar// de nas rigs kyi slob ma rnams// gral du snang bas go bar bya// gral du bkod pa'i skal ldan la// dbang rdzogs byas la man ngag byin// phyi nang gsang ba yongs rdzogs kyi// dbang bskur rdzogs par byed pa na// dang po zhi ba'i dbang rdzogs bya// rten 'brel rdzas kyi don mtshon nas// sku gsum 'bras bu thob pa'o// de rnams mtshon byed gsang dbang ni// phrin las rdzogs par 'dod pas na// slob dpon dbang dang ldan pa des// dbang bskur rgyan rnams gon pas ni// phrin las 'di rnams rdzogs par bya// stobs ldan pad+ma dbang gi sku// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ye shes lnga ldan 'di// bu yi dbang rnams rdzogs par bgyi 'tshal na// bdag la dbang rtsol bu la gnang bar mdzod/ dkyil 'khor zhal blta man ngag thob bya'i

phyir// 'dir mchis zhal ston dpa' bos gnang bar mdzod// 'dod chags spangs nas dag pa'i lam du 'jug/ zhe sdang spangs nas dal gyi sku dang sbyor// gti mug spangs nas shes rab yul la 'jug/ 'khor ba spangs nas ye shes blta ba'i phyir// 'dir rig dkyil 'khor bu la snang ba'i phyir// rdo rje che ge mo 'khor dang bcas pa rig pa'i yul blta bas// slob ma dkyil 'khor 'dir chug las rnams sgrub par gyis// ho rdo rje slob dpon gnyen gyi dbu bzung nas// yi dam lha dang mkha' 'gro dam tshig can// thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol// dam tshig nod kyis bdag la gnang bar mdzod// dkyil 'khor 'dir chug bdag la dbang bskur gsol// rdo rje slob dpon gsang ba bdag la bskur// hU~M rdo rje dam tshig khro chu khol ma 'di// khyod la gtad kyis thub par gyis// nyams na dmyal ba'i rgyu yin te// thub na yon tan brgya rtsa 'thob// de bas khyed kyis gus pas longs/ sa ma ya s+t+wam/ bag sha ni ho// rdo rje'i dam tshig bdag gis blang bar bya// bskal pa zhig kyang mi gtang gzung bar bgyid// dngos grub chu bos bdag gi dri ma 'khru// myur du dam tshig chu bo bdag la stsol// rdo rje dri chu bdag gis gzung bar bgyi// oM badzra tiSh+Tha lhan/ chos nyid rang rtags srog gi 'khor lo yi// rdo rje dril bu khyod kyis yang dag zung// chos nyid gsung sgras thams cad zil gnon phyir// dril bu dkrol zhing rdo rje yang dag gsor// chos nyid stong pa ye shes dag pa yi// rnam dag don lnga ye shes bum pa 'dis// skal ldan 'di la dbang bskur bas// stong rig gsal ba'i don ldan shog/ oM badzra tsit+ta ya tiSh+Tha badzra yA mi stAM/ hU~M stong nyid ye shes las byung ba'i// chos sku dag pa'i rang bzhin las// ye shes dag pa'i pho brang 'dir// bkra shis dag pa'i bum pa 'dis// skal ldan 'di la dbang bskur gsol// oM rat+na e wa ti dza hU~M/ hU~M rtog pa'i dri ma sel ba'i bum pa 'di// dag pa'i ye shes gnyis dang sbyor// ye shes ston pa'i bum pa rab mdzes pas// skal ldan 'di la dbang bskur gsol// oM pad+ma du ti shri haM ba gtam/ hU~M byang chub las byung bdud rtsi'i snod// nyon mongs sel ba'i bum pa 'di// skal ldan skyes bu 'di la dbang bskur gsol// oM karma dz+nyA na ta ma bag sha hU~M/ ye shes gsal ba'i sgo bzhir ldan// shes rab bskyed pa'i mda' bzhi yis// skal ldan 'di la dbang bskur bas// snang ba bzhi dang 'phrad par shog/ oM dzaHhU~M baM hoHkha gad ta dza ya/ shes rab don ston ral gri bzhis// skal ldan 'di la dbang bskur bas// mnyam pa nyid kyi don rtogs shog/ oM badzra prad dz+nyA ma hA tam pa ga sha hU~M/ chos nyid rnam dag stong pa'i rgyu// yi ge hU~M las 'od zer 'phros// thams cad

de yi don la gnas// chos dbyings ye shes mtshon pa'i dpe// me long 'di la brten pa yis// skal ldan 'di la dbang bskur ro// chos dbyings ye shes don rtogs shog/ oM d+harma d+ha tu dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ nyon mongs dag pa ye shes rgyu// gsal 'grib med pa'i don bstan pa// rdzas kyi me long dam pa 'dis// skal ldan 'di la dbang bskur ro// me long ye shes don rtogs shog/ oM A dar+sha dz+nyA na badzra swa b+ha wa At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ yab yum gnyis med dkyil 'khor ldan// ye shes stong gsal mnyam pa'i me long 'dis// skal ldan 'di la dbang bskur ro// mnyam nyid ye shes don rtogs shog/ oM rat+na dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ thams cad 'byung ba ye shes dag pa'i rdzas// skal ldan 'di la dbang bskur ro// sor rtogs ye shes dbang thob shogaoM pad+ma a ti badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ thams cad gnyis med gcig tu 'dus pa'i ye shes te// chos rnams bya bar rdzogs par mdzad pa yi// skal ldan 'di la dbang bskur ro// bya grub ye shes don rtogs shog/ oM karma dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ kha dog thams cad ston mdzad pa'i// lhun grub dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis// mu khyud ra ba ston mdzad pa'i// 'od chen rnam lnga'i me tog 'dis// skal ldan 'di la dbang bskur ro// rin chen sbubs su sangs rgyas shog/ oM pra be sha ya du sha hU~M/ sna tshogs pa yi rdzas chen 'dis/ 'di dang phyi ma gnyis ka ru// longs spyod chen po 'phel bar 'gyur// byin brlabs drag po'i gtor ma 'dis// skal ldan 'di la dbang bskur ro// bar chad thams cad bsal ba dang// sangs rgyas byin rlabs snang bar shog/ oM ba lid+ta du sha ni hU~M/ rnam dag dri med chos kyi spyan// do nub khyod la gsal 'gyur shog/ spyi dang rang gi don shes pa// gang yang ma 'gags shes rab spyan// do nub khyod la gsal bar gyis// phyi dang nang med kun gsal ba// rang bzhin ma g.yos rig pa'i spyan// do nub khyod la gsal gyur nas// rigs pa'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar ltos// dngos dang dngos med snang ba dang// bdag gzhan thams cad don gsal ba'o// thams cad mkhyen nyid gzhi yi spyan// do nub khyod la gsal gyur nas// rang rig rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ltos// thogs pa med pa'i spyan lnga yis// dkyil 'khor phyogs mtshams kun la ltos// shar gyi sgo ni rigs pa gsal// rig pa'i ye shes mtshon pa'i phyir// ye shes dag pa'i snang ba 'char// de phyir shar gyi sgo zhes bya// de yang khyod la bstan par bya// ma bred ma sngangs myur du ltos// chags med spyan gyis bltas byas na// 'gyur med ye shes dag pa mthong// lho sgo ye shes bskyed pa'i sgo/ snang ba lhug par 'char ba'i

rtags// ye shes nyi shu rtsa gcig rdzogs// de phyir lho yi sgo zhes bya// snang ba bstan gyis legs par ltos// dus 'dir khyod kyis ma bltas na// phyis nas rnyed par ga la 'gyur// ye shes mig gis ma chags ltos// nub sgo bag chags nub pa'i sgo// dug lnga ye shes lnga ldan 'od// 'od lnga ma 'dres rdzogs pa'i sa// shes rab mig gis bltas byas nas// khyod kyis dkyil 'khor lha tshogs mthong// byang sgo sa lam byang ba'i sgo// sku lnga lhun gyis grub pa'i sgo// las rab rdzogs pa'i sgo chen 'di// mkhyen gsal mig gis myur du ltos// rdo rje rang rtags chen po ni// sems can kun gyi lam rgyud la// dkyil 'khor de bzhin gnas pa yin// rdul tshon dkyil 'khor 'di bzhin du// rang gi lus la yod pa yin// de bzhin pho brang dkyil 'khor ltos// rang lus gzhal yas khang gi tshul// lha rnams ma bskyed lhun gyis rdzogs// de phyir dbang gi dkyil 'khor ltos// myur du bltas na dngos grub 'thob// oM sarba ta thA ga ta maN+Dal sa twa hU~M/ de ltar rim pa rdzogs par bya// dbang gi mdzad spyod ting 'dzin brtan// las rnams rdzogs par byed pa'o// bu rnams dngos grub 'dod pa la// sta gon lnga brdol ting 'dzin te// mig dang rna ba sna dang lce// yid la sogs pa thams cad la// mnga' gsol byin brlabs mthu brtan pas// dbang po lnga yi dbang thob nas// dngos grub sna tshogs 'thob par nges// de ltar phyi yi dbang rdzogs nas// longs spyod thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur// chos nyid sku yang bag gis mthong// phung po lnga las dbang bskur bas// ye shes lnga nyid rang rdzogs pa'o// zhes rdzogs pa rang byung chen po'i rgyud las/ zhi ba byang chub sems su dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ sarba a bo kro ta su nA ma/ bod skad du/ khro bo thams cad rang bzhin du dbang bskur ba'i lung zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang gi sku la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i rgyal pas 'di skad ces gsungs so// kye kye 'dus pa'i tshogs bcas nyon// khro bo'i dbang bskur rdzogs byed na// mchod pa'i gzhung rnams rdzogs byas la// dkyil 'khor nyid dang rgyan ldan phyir// shin tu dben pa'i nyams dga' bar// gnas kyi mtshan nyid brtag par bya// grong rdal zad pa'i mtha' dag dang// rtsi shing nags tshal smin pa'i sar// me tog sna tshogs 'khrungs pa dang// nub phyogs mtho la shar nyid gdeng// byang nyid skyor ba 'dra ba dang// lho phyogs brdal ba 'dra ba'i gnas// bdag nyid mngon pa'i phyogs dag tu// grogs po sal sul med pa dang// nub na gzugs po med pa

dang// sems can lta bu'i gzugs med dang// rgyab ni brag la gtad pa dang// logs na shing tog sna tshogs 'bar// mdun na ne'u sing chu bo 'bab// yang na tshe zan lta bu'i gnas// ra rgyud rnams ni ma chad par// bya skad sna tshogs sgrogs pa'o// de lta bu yi gnas dag tu// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la// dza gad phud kyis chag chag gdab// de lta bu yi dkyil 'khor la// thig ni rab tu gdab par gsungs// nub nas shar du kha blta la// tshangs pa'i thig ni 'gyur med gdab// de nas lho nas byang du'o// shar lho nas ni nub byang du// lho nub nas ni byang shar du// lho yi tshangs thig steng dag nas// nub kyi tshangs thig steng du'o// shar nyid nas ni lho yi steng// byang shar du ni slob mas gdab// nub nas byang du de bzhin no// nub nas phyed mar gnyis po la// shar phyogs dag tu zings kyi gdab// lho nas byang du de bzhin shes// de dag la ni grub la gtug/ de nas phyed phyed nas ni'o// de ltar yeng ni spras la 'dra// de ltar thig nyid rab rdzogs bya'o// de nas sa tshon byin gyi brlab// dkyil 'khor dag la tshon gyis dgye// dbus kyi thig ni cha gsum la// zlum po mu khyud ljang gu'o// nang du gru gsum mthing nag mdzes// zla gam rnam gsum dbang gi tshul// tshangs thig nas btsal bzhi pa la// mu khyud zlum po dag tu bri// de yi nang du 'khor lo brgyad// kha dog ser po dag tu bya// rtsibs mchan dag ni mdzes mtshon no// tshangs thig dag nas lnga pa la// gru bzhi sgo dang bcas pa bri// gru chad ljang gu mdzes par bya// de nas thig gcig sgo la'o// de ltar grub la sgo yi phyi// sgo ni rigs dang 'dra bar bshad// de nas thig ni bcu pa la// phyi rim zlum po dag tu bri// zlum po bar ni nag pos dgang// rdo rje'i ra bar bcas pa'o// phyogs bzhi zla gam rigs dang 'dra// sgo dang sgo rgyan rab tu mdzes pa'o// de ltar dkyil 'khor rab bris la// mngon pa'i rdzas ni 'di ltar dgram// rdzas rnams byin gyis brlabs nas ni// dkyil 'khor steng du rdzas dgram ste/ dbus kyi gru gsum steng dag du// skyes pa bud med b+han+d+ha gnyis// yang na rabs chad nag po'am// snel gri mo yi thod pa ste// nal bu yod na mchog tu gsungs// yang na longs spyod ldan pa yi// pho thod dag la yi ge b+h+rUM// mo thod dag la ma zhes bri// gang yang rung ba'i thod pa gcig/ yi ge yaM dang ldan pa'o// mo thod nang du blug pa'i rdzas/ bud med bu ma skyes pa'i tshil// pho thod nang du blug pa'i rdzas// byang chub sems ni dkar dang dmar// thod pa gcig gi nang du yang// sha khrag sna tshogs gtor ma'o// pho thod dar dkar dag gis gtum// mo thod dar dmar dag gis dgab// zli

gam gsum gyi steng du yang// rin chen bum pa gsum bzhag ste// rin po che yi snying po gsal// sman ni sna tshogs nang du'o// kha dog dmar po dag gis byugs// dar dmar fag gis mgul chings so// 'khor lo'i steng du sku brgyad do// gru chad steng du rdzas brgyad do// gru tshad dag ni re re la// me long re dang rma bya'o// phyi rim zla gam steng dag tu// shar phyogs zla gam steng dag tu// b+han+d+ha bzhi gling mtshan ldan du// gtor mar bdud rtsi bran ba'o// mthing nag dar gyis kha bcad do// lho phyogs tshil gyi mar me ste// dar ser dag gi yol ba ste// nub tu seng lding phur bu la// le brgan dar gyis gdug kyis dgab// byang chub mar me lnga nyid bltam// dar ljang dag gis yol ba bya// de ltar rdzas rnams tshogs pa dang// de nas dkyil de nyid la// dar dkar dag gis zhal nyid dgab// ras ser kha tshar ma nyams pas// dkyil 'khor de nyid phyi yo la bya// de nas rdzas rnams bkod pa dang// dbang dang rim pa rdzogs par bya// de nas slob dpon dbang ldan des// dbang bskur man ngag lung bstan pas// tshig 'di rnams kyis dbang rdzogs bya'o// dbang gi chas kyis rab rgyas pa'i// las kyi rdo rje rgyal po la// dpral bar thal chen mtshon pa bri// lce la rak+ta'i thig le'o// snying gar zhag gi tho tis te// mgo la dbang zhu legs par brgyan// lag na rdo rje dril bu'am// kha TAM rnge'u chung gis mtshan pa'o// de nas bu la dbang rdzogs bya'o// de nas dbang rnams rdzogs bya yi// mtshan ma rtags kyi thig le bya// de ltar mtshan ma bstan nas ni// 'di ltar tshig dbang bstan pa'o// khro rgyal yab dang yum du bcas// thams cad gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol// bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kun// khro bo'i mtshan thos tsam gyis kyang// thams cad brgyal zhing 'o dod 'bod// sdug bsngal chen pos zin pas na// gnas 'dir ma 'dug gzhan du dengs// ho dgongs shig rol cig khro rgyal rnams// slob ma chug cig gnas par mdzad du gsol// dug gsum rtsad gcod 'khor ba dbyings nas thon// nga ni khro rgyal pad+ma ste// nga ni dkyil 'khor rdzas ston gyis// 'byung po'i tshogs rnams rab tu dengs// khyed la dbang gi skal ba med// dbang mchog thob par mi 'gyur gyis// phyi ma dus kyi tha ma la// ston pa rdo rje mi bskyod pas// khyed la dbang gis brda ston gyis// 'di la skal med der dengs shig/ ho dbang gi skal ba dang mi ldan pa rnams ni/ dbang gi dkyil 'khor 'di yang/ sa tshon gyi dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa dang bcas par mthong bar yin no// rdzas rnams kyang dpa' brtul dang mi ldan pa yin no// gsang ba'i dbang gi dkyil 'khor 'di la yid

mi ches pa dang/ de lta bu yi 'du shes dang ldan pa rnams la/ rin po che 'di yi skal ba med pas/ dbang bskur yang dbang gi nus pa mi 'byung bas/ rigs kyi bu rnams de ltar ma byed cig/ thugs rje'i 'od dang mnyam par gyur ba yis// snang srid thams cad ye shes lnga yi 'od// 'byung ba lnga la ye shes lnga yis khyab// ye shes lnga las byung ba'i 'od lnga 'dis// gnyis med sbyor ba gzhal yas khang// yab lnga'i dngos grub blang ba'i phyir// 'byung ba dag pa'i mar me dam pa 'dis// sems can 'di la dbang bskur bas// rnam par dag pa'i zhing khams su// rgyal ba yab dang mnyam par shog/ oM pu ti sha stom sha ni/ ye shes lnga dang 'od lnga dang// yab lnga dang ni yum lnga yi// dbang bskur dam pa nod pa'i phyir// ye shes rang lus dkyil 'khor ldan// rdo rje'i don dang gnyis med brjid pa'i 'od// dbang gi ye shes 'od mchog dam pa dang// rang gi tsit+ta dkyil na gnas pa'i 'od// ngas bstan khyed kyis nye bar longs// 'di bstan pa yi yon tan gyis// rang snang dag pa mthong bar shog/ oM ma hA su gad sha s+t+waM b+hag sha hU~M/ 'byung chen rnam lnga ye shes lnga las byung// rig pa nyid mtshon ye shes rdzas// kun dang mi mnyam ye shes lnga 'od kyis// 'gyur med pho brang bstan gyis nye bar longs// 'byung ba ye shes dag pa'i rdzas chen 'dis// sems can khyod la dbang bskur bas// ye shes gcig chod 'char bar shog/ oM 'du ka sha ti ta ma bka sha hU~M/ 'byung ba thams cad dbang gi dkyil 'khor te// dri med dbang gi ye shes rol pa yi// dbang bskur sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam pa'i 'od// 'od lnga nyid la rig pa'i sku lnga gsal// ye shes dus dang ldan pa'i rdzas chen 'dis// sems can 'di la dbang bskur bas// ngo bo'i snang ba mthong bar shog/ oM dz+nyA na s+t+waM bag sha hU~M/ rdo rje'i rigs dang bud+d+ha'i rigs// rin chen rigs dang pad+ma'i rigs// las kyi rigs la sogs pa yi// sangs rgyas kun gyi byin brlabs kyis// bdag cag yang dag mthong grol shog/ oM da du sha s+t+waM bag sha hU~M/ b+han d+ha ye shes rnam par dag/ lcang lo dbyings dang 'du 'bral med// rnam dag ye shes gzhal yas khang// sems can 'di la dbang bskur bya// 'di la bskur ba'i yon tan gyis// 'di yi bar chad bsal ba dang// phyi mar gzhal yas khang ldan shog/ oM b+han+da sid+d+hi hU~M/ dgra dang bgegs bzlog phur pa 'dis// gang la btab pa rlag par byed// thal ba bzhin du brlags nas kyang// bgegs zhes bya ba'i ming yang med// rig pa 'di dang dbyer med tshul// rang la yod pa'i ye shes de// bar chad bsal nas mthong bar 'gyur// des na phur pa'i dbang bskur longs// oM badzra ta kI li kI la ya ka sa ya ni hU~M/

rgyal ba kun gyi dbang bskur mdzad pa yi// thod pa mar me tshil chen rnam gsum gyis// sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs kyis// dbang bskur bdag la rdzogs par mdzod// oM ag+ne b+h+rUM/ rig pa dang ni ye shes kyi// snang ba dam pa 'di yin bas// rigs kyi bu khyod myur du ltos// phyi yi dbyings dang rig pa gnyis// 'du 'bral med pa de bzhin no// rdzas kyi dbyings dang rig pa 'dis// do nub khyod la dbang bskur bas// rnam dag dbyings dang ye shes kyi// dbang bskur dam pa 'thob par shog/ oM/ ye shes rig pa'i klong dkyil nas// thugs rje'i stobs ni khyod la snang// dri med 'du 'bral med pa 'dis// do nub khyod la dbang bskur bya'o// oM/ gsang ba dag pas shes rab thabs ltar snang// dbyings dang rig pa gnyis med shes rab thabs// rdo rje'i don nyid rnam sbyar rig par ldan// rtogs pa'i don ldan shes rab dbyings dang ldan// do nub khyod la dbang bskur bar bya'o/ I/ thabs 'di kun la dkon pa'i thabs// shes rab kun la khyab pa'i rtags// nga yis thabs bstan khyed kyis longs// gsang sngags rgyal po'i thabs 'di dag/ do nub khyod la dbang bskur bar bya'o// A/ dbyings dang rig pa gcig gyur nas// rigs lnga rgyal ba yab yum bcur// dbang bskur rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs// dbang ni rang rang tsit+ta'i dkyil// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bstan gyis gus phyag 'tshol// a/ yang dag bde ba'i sa la mi 'gyur 'khor lo bskor// 'di yang khyod kyi rang rtags te// do nub nga yis bstan par bya// oM tsakra si ti hU~M/ theg pa dgu dang ye shes dgu// sa dgu lam dgu ston pa'i rgyu// ma rig pa las thar pa'i ye shes te// 'gro ba 'dul byed sprul pa'i sku thob ste// kun gyi mtshon byed mchod rten dam pa 'dis// do nub khyod la dbang bskur bas// sprul pa sku yi sa thob shog/ oM pra ti sha dza/ sprul pa'i sku las thugs rje 'byung ba'i phyir// sprul skur gyur nas 'gro ba 'dren pa dang// ye shes thabs kyi pha rol sgrol gyur cig/ oM badzra tsaN+Da ni sha ya na hU~M/ ye shes bskyed pa'i shes rab me chen 'dis// 'gro ba ma rig sgron mar gsal// skye med dbyings su sgrol byed me chen 'dis// do nub khyod la dbang bskur bas// skye med ye shes don rtogs shog/ oM ag+ne ka la sha a/ rig pa'i ye shes dgos 'dod skong mdzad pa'i// ye shes 'gag med shes rab don ldan zhing// sna tshogs cir yang ston pa rig pa'i dbang// dgos 'dod skongs mdzad rin chen dbang bskur bas// rig pa ngo bo nyid dang ldan gyur cig/ oM rat+na e bam hU~M/ dri med skyon bral ye shes dag pa'i rdzas// rig pa chags med sems las grol ba ste// rnam rtog med pa'i rig pa chos kyi sku// dri

med skyon bral pad+ma'i sdong po 'dis// skal ldan khyod la dbang bskur ro// oM pad+ma kro ti ni hU~M/ shes rab dang ni gnyis med sbyor ba mdzad// dkyil 'khor nyid dang ye shes rgyu+u la rol// gnyis med mtshon pa'i shes rab ral gri 'dis// skal ldan khyod la dbang bskur bas// shes rab chen pos rang rgyud grol bar gyis// oM pra dz+nyA kA ya sid+d+hi hU~M/ dkyil 'khor dang ni dbyings kyi ye shes dang// dbyings dang ye shes don sbyar bas// phyi dbyings dang ni nang ye shes// gsang ba'i ye shes chos nyid dbang du 'dus// dbyer med tshul gyis de bzhin gnas pa rnams// nga yis bstan gyis nga la legs bar nyon// ye shes dag pa'i rdzas kyi sprin chen 'dis// do nub khyod la dbang bskur bas// dbyings dang ye shes rtogs nas kyang// thugs rje phyogs bcur mdzad par shog/ oM d+hA tu dz+nyA na hrI trAM/ stong pa nyid dang ye shes sku// sna tshogs 'byung ba rol pa'i sku// chos sku mtshan ma'i sku mchog 'dis// sems can khyod la dbang bskur bas// mthar phyin 'bras bu thob par shog/ oM badzra kA ya hU~M/ skye dang 'chi med rdo rje'i sku// stong nyid rdo rje'i snying po can// dag pa'i ye shes mtshon pa'i phyir// dri ma dngas pa'i gzugs skur ldan// chos dbyings dag pa'i ye shes mtshon// skye med mtshon pa'i sku mchog 'dis// do nub khyod la dbang bskur ro// oM a ka sha ya ni hU~M/ rdo rje 'gyur med rig pa'i dus// rang rtags mtshan pa dbang gi sku// 'gyur med kun rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi// sa lam mthar phyin grol bar shog/ oM badzra kra sa ma hU~M/ snying po'i don nyid rnam sbyang phyir// ye shes dag pa'i lam chen dang// snying po rang chas rdo rje'i don// sangs rgyas bzhi yi snying por bcas// de bzhin kun la gnas pa yin// snying po'i don nyid 'di bstan pas// rtogs pa rgyud la skye 'gyur shog/ oM badzra tsit+ta kA ya hU~M/ sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur ni// bum pa 'di la mdzad pa yin// dbang bskur 'di la byin gyis brlab// cho 'phrul rgyas par ston pa yi// bum pa 'di la phrin las rdzogs// ye shes dag pa'i dbang bskur 'dis// ma rig 'khor ba'i rgyun gcad phyir// do nub khyod la dbang bskur ro// oM badzra do sha hU~M/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas// rgyal ba yab lnga yum lngar gsal// thabs dang shes rab don ldan pas// longs spyod rdzogs sku snang bar gsal// rnam dag sangs rgyas mdzad spyod de// de gnas brtan pa thob bya ste// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam pa yi// ye shes dag pa'i tshom bu 'dis// do nub khyod la dbang bskur bas// rang snang bar dor brtan par shog/ oM badzra si ta ka hU~M/ ye shes rang rtags rdo rje'i don nyid ldan// skye 'jig bral ba'i sku yang 'od gsal bzhugs// 'chi dang bral

ba'i gsung gi zer la rol// skye dang 'chi med rdo rje dus mtshon sku// skye ba med pa'i yi ge a dkar 'di// sems can rnams la rtag par yod pa ste// de yi don ni mtshon pa'i 'od lnga gsal// yang dag pa dang dbyer med mnyam pa yin// don mtshon ye shes rang rtags mnyam sbyar bas// sangs rgyas kun dang dgongs pa mnyam pa yin// rdo rje skye med rang rtags mnyam pa 'dis/ sems can khyod la dbang bskur bas// skye med ye shes rtogs nas sangs rgyas shog/ oM badzra tan ma ka ra hU~M/ chos nyid stong pa ye shes dag pa'i rgyu// gsang sngags lam la sbyor ba ste// stong nyid bum pa sman gyis gtams// bdud rtsir dbang rdzogs dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa ste// 'jig rten 'di na nad med 'tsho ba dang// phyi ma ye shes rtogs nas grol gyur cig/ bdud rtsi dag pa'i bkra shis bum pa 'dis// skal ldan 'di la dbang bskur bas// rnam dag bdud rtsi ye shes don ldan shog/ oM dz+nyA na At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ stong pa nyid dang ye shes kyi// dbang bskur bdag gis blang ba'i phyir// rdzas mchog dam pa bdud rtsi'i bum pa 'di// skye med dbyings nas ye shes mtshon pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas lam dang ye shes dag pa'i lam// lam mchog sbyangs nas ye shes lnga dang sbyar// 'du 'bral med pa'i rig pa rtog med par// dbang bskur 'khor ba'i sa las mthar phyin nas// ye shes rtogs pa'i don chen de thob nas// rin chen lhun gyis grub pa'i sa chen der// sprul pa 'gags med phyogs bcur gsal bar mdzod// de la gnas nas sems can don la sbyor// de ltar yon tan kun ldan bum pa 'dis// do nub khyod la dbang bskur bas// stong nyid snying po mthar phyin shog/ oM badzra b+hi AHhU~M/ ye shes rgyu mtshon dag pa'i rig pa dang// gsang sngags kun gyi ye shes mtshon pa'i phyir// rdzas kyi bum pa stong nyid dag pa 'dis// gzhon nu bum pa'i sku la mthar phyin pa'i// rang bzhin ma 'gags nyi ma'i 'od bzhin gsal// thugs rje kun nas 'gro ba yongs la khyab// stong gsum ldan pas chos nyid dag pa'i don// rang gi de bzhin nyid kyi bum pa 'di// dag pa'i lam mtshon bkra shis bum pa dang// dag pa'i don nyid ye shes rnam lngar sbyar// rgyu mtshan dag pa'i bkra shis bum pa 'dis// kun gyi don nyid ye shes mtshon pa'i phyir// dag pa'i lam dang ye shes gsang lam dang// lam chen 'bras bu'i dus 'dis mtshon pa'i phyir// do nub khyod la dbang bskur ro// oM AHhU~M hrIHrnam dag ye shes thod pa'i gzhal yas khang// rigs lnga lhun grub ye shes thod pa 'di// gang zag dag pa'i zhing du yaM gang du yang byung gis spyod// yi ge yaM ldan rdo rje thod pa ste// yaM gyis de bzhin mkha' la rab bskyod

nas// 'gro ba dbyings su 'dren mdzad dbyings kyi ye shes thod pa 'di// dag pa'i don ldan gzhal yas khang gi tshul// rnam dag don spyod rin chen thod pa 'di// dgos 'dod re ba thams cad skong mdzad pa'i// rin chen zur brgyad bkra shis thod pa 'dis// sems dang ye shes so sor 'byed// rab tu gsang byed bkra shis thod pa 'dis// skal ldan khyod la dbang bskur bas// gzhal yas khang du yaM gis bskyod gyur shog/ oM badzra b+han+da hU~M yAMHbskyed pa'i ye shes ma yin te// rdzogs pa kun la khyab pa'i don// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyar bas// yi ge 'bru bstan dbyings su 'khyil// b+h+ruM gyis ma bskyod chos nyid mkha'// ye shes dag pa'i thod pa 'dis// skal ldan khyod la dbang bskur bas// dbyings las phyir mi ldog par shog/ oM b+han+da dz+nyA na du yaM ni hU~M/ shes rab dang ni sku gsung thugs// ngo bo 'gyur med chos kyi don// rang bzhin 'gag med longs sku'i don// thugs rje'i sprul pa phyogs bcur 'phro// sku gsum don ldan yi ge e// sna tshogs e yis gzhal yas khang// e dang ldan pa'i thod pa 'dis// skal ldan 'di la dbang bskur bas// sku gsum 'bras bu mthar phyin shog/ oM AM trAM hU~M b+h+rUM phaT/ shes rab don byed ye shes don// rang rig sgron me 'od chen ldan// shes rab bskyed pa'i po ti 'dis// skal ldan khyod la dbang bskur bas// shes rab rtogs pa'i don ldan shog/ oM pra dz+nyA sha ya hU~M/ hU~M snang zhing srid pa'i chos rnams la// ma rmongs ci bzhin shes gyur pa'i// phyi nang snang ba'i chos rnams la// gang la thogs med shes gyur nas// bsam gtan ldan zhing sku 'bar dang// 'gro ba pha rol sgrol bar shog/ oM badzra gad ma hU~M/ shar nyid rdo rje dbyings kyi sgo// tshom bu blta na 'di ltos shig/ lho sgo longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sgo/ ye shes blta na 'dir ltos shig/ nub sgo sku lnga mthar phyin sgo/ rigs nyid blta na 'dir ltos shig/ byang sgo rdo rje snying po'i sgo// rigs lnga blta na 'dir ltos shig/ pho brang pad+ma rnam dag sku// rang lus blta na 'dir ltos shig/ oM maN+Da la a hU~M/ rang rtags rdo rje'i don nyid de// dar dang 'bru yi rang rtags kyis// 'jig rten 'di yi bar chad bsal ba'i phyir// dbang rtags rdo rje nyid dang 'du 'bral med// 'jig rten lha dang mkha' 'gro rnams// 'di la bsrung zhing bskyab pa dang// dbang rtags 'di ni mthong ba tsam gyis kyang// bgegs rnams brgyal zhing gzhan du 'bros// yams dang rims nad kun las thar ba dang// dbang rtags 'di yis rab tu bskyab pa'i phyir// gnod sbyin rnams dang gsang ba'i rigs rnams dang// de bzhin mkha' 'gro'i rigs dang ni// pad+ma dang ni de bzhin las kyi rigs// sa dang bar

snang gnas pa dang// ri rab dang ni mtsho la gnas// mkha' 'gro dang ni bcas pa yis// 'di la sku yi bsrung bar gyis// nad dang yams las thar bar mdzod// dbang rtags 'di nyid btags pa yis// lam chen lnga po bstan par gyis// rdo rje don dang 'bral ba med pa dang// yang dag sa la de bzhin gnas pa dang// gsang sngags kun gyi dgongs pa lon par shog/ oM badzra duSh+tan sarba swA hA na hU~M/ las kyi rigs kyi gsang mtshan gang yin pas// sems dpa' las kyi rigs rnams kyis// skal ldan 'di la dbang bskur ro// rin chen rigs kyi gsang mtshan gang yin pas// skal ldan 'di la dbang bskur ro// pad+ma rigs kyi gsang mtshan gang yin pas// skal ldan 'di la dbang bskur ro// rdo rje rigs kyi gsang mtshan gang yin pas// skal ldan 'di la dbang bskur ro// de bzhin rigs kyi gsang mtshan gang yin pas// skal ldan 'di la dbang bskur ro// de la sogs pa'i bde gshegs thams cad kyi// gsang mtshan dam pa gang yin pas// skal ldan 'di la dbang bskur ro// oM badzra rat+na pad+ma karma bud+d+ha s+t+waM/ de ltar dbang rnams rdzogs par bya// de ni phyi dbang rdzas kyis bskur// legs par bshad cing bkrol ba'o// rdzogs pa chen po'i lung bstan pas// ting nge 'dzin las ma yengs par// ting 'dzin brtan na dngos grub 'thob// ces rdzogs pa rang byung chen po'i rgyud las/ khro bo'i rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ rat+na A yur+dz+nyA na pri ti nA ma/ bod skad du/ tshe dbang rin po che ye shes kyi lung zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag med kyi lha la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas pad+ma'i sku la tshe dpag med kyis bskor te/ 'di skad ces gsol pa/ kye kye bcom ldan dbang phyug che// klu 'dul dbang gi rgyal po nyid// tshe dang ye shes lhun rdzogs pas// tshe dbang dbang chen bdag gis smra// dpa' bo nyid kyis gnang bar mdzod// de nas dbang gi rgyal po yis// tshe mchog nyid la lung bstan te// kye kye tshe mchog rin chen phreng// khyod kyis legs par tshe mchog smros// de nas nyid kyis rab tu smras// tshe dbang rin chen skur byed na// 'di ltar las rnams rdzogs par bya// shin tu dben pa'i gnas dag tu// dkyil 'khor mda' gang gru bzhi ste// thig rnams gzhung dang mthun pa ste// tshon rnams byin gyis brlab bya ste// tshon rnams rab tu dgye bar bya// dbus su gru bzhi lam pa ste// phyi rim dag ni zlum por bya// de yi spyi rim gru bzhi ste// sgo dang bcas par rab tu bshad// phyi rim zlum po rdo ra bcas// de ltar dkyil 'khor gsal bris

la// dgod pa'i rdzas ni 'di lta ste// bum pa mdzes par dkar gsum ste// dar dmar dag gis mgul chings te// sna tshogs 'bru yi gdan la bzhag/ 'bras chang dag ni nang du'o// sha dang mar dang bu ram
